1-1-message: \C[3]Alice and Reko were talking in the lobby.
\."...If it's nothin', then I'm outta here."
\."...I found them at the Prize Exchange."

\."I was surprised.
 I thought you'd long since thrown them out..."

\."When you sent me that letter telling me
 you were cutting contact, rather than shock..."
\."You are... a musical demon overflowing with talent."

\."I thought you were quick to forget your garbage,
 deadweight brother, living life as it suited you."
\."I told myself that... to find relief."
\."To confirm that my actions had no effect on you..."

\."The traces of use... and of careful maintenance
 to conceal that fact... The more I look at them,
 the more they look like traces of your suffering."

\."Let me apologize.
 I made you and our parents... suffer for so long..."

\."It may sound flimsy!
 But it's how I really feel...!!"
\.\C[3]Reko took the bongos, seeming unable to bear it...

\."Didn't I tell ya? I was always thinking
 I'd throw these damn things out."
\."Don't act like a big brother, Alice."
\."You and me are complete strangers now."

\."You think this crap'll let us reconcile?
 You even realized you took a person's life...?"

\."...For 2 and a half years,
 I've never once forgotten about my crime..."
\."Then why would you ever interact with me again?!"
\.\C[3]I'd believed they would be able to reconcile.
\.\C[3]I'd never seen Reko look so terrifying.
\.\C[3]This wasn't a matter for an outsider to speak on.
\.\C[4](For now... talking with Alice is a priority.)
\.\C[3]Alice was picking up the pieces of the broken bongos.
\.\C[3]Very delicately, not missing a single small piece.
\."At least... not when she's around me."
\."I ask that you don't hate Reko."

\."Just because you saw one side of her...
 doesn't mean that's all she is."
\."You've helped me this far, Sara Chidouin."
\."I feel... I was finally able to take a step."
\C[3]As Alice left...\! I saw he was crying.

\.\C[4](A Reko I don't know...
 That only Alice knows...)
\.\C[3]Time passed me by as I racked my brain.
1-1-choice:
Go after Reko
Talk to Alice

1-1-message: \."Wasn't it a bond between you two?!"

\."A bond?! As if...!
 It was a shackle...! A chain connecting me to him!!"

\."That's right, I've always kept it in!
 The resentment I wouldn't let out on him...!!"
\."Then why did you treasure the bongos until now?!"
\."Hell if I know!! I just couldn't toss 'em!"
\."...I didn't want you to see this, Sara."

\."I admit I lost my cool.
 But listen, this is our problem...!"
\."I didn't do that 'cause I wanted to...!!"
\."I'm not gonna... be able to look you in the eye..."
\.\C[3]I can't imagine Reko truly hates him.
\.\C[3]But I couldn't do anything for their relationship.
\.\C[3]I heard a feeble voice behind me.

\."I... trust you, you know...
 For real..."

\."...No. It's because I like you
 that I can't turn a blind eye."

\."I... trust you too, you know...
 For real..."

\.\C[3]Hearing Reko's voice on the verge of tears,
I couldn't bring myself to turn around.
1-1-choice:
That went too far
Was that how you really feel?

1-1-message: \.\C[3]There's not a single person in the lobby.

\.\C[3]Looking to the windows,
the morning sun shone radiantly into my eyes.

\.\C[4](Today is the fourth day...!
 The time limit's up!)
\."Hmph... That wasn't so bad, was it?"

\."What is it, Sara Chidouin?
 You seem surprised..."

\."Dammit...! In the end...
 We've still got no means of escape!"

\."Now, now... Maybe we should be glad
 we're still alive, huh?"

\."The loner's a loner, but still stubborn, woof!
 What a world, meow!"

\."But I'm glad no one had to be sacrificed!
 Truly...!!"
\.\C[4](Not a single one of us is missing!)
\.\C[4](This won't go how the kidnappers expect!!)

\."Don't make light of us!!
 We're MORE stubborn than roaches!!"

\."Yeah, yeah. Guess I underestimated that.
\! Honestly, figured at least one of y'all'd die."

\."Well, whatever.
 There's a place I wantcha all to come to."
\."What?! Don't tell me... The Main Game already?!"

\.\C[10]"Not just yet...
 Gotta save the most fun for last..."

\.\C[10]"Great design, right?
 I want you to go through there."

\.\C[10]"Scratch that - you ARE gonna come through
 if you don't wanna get killed!"

\."...Don't worry. We won all within the rules.
 Shouldn't be anything too absurd..."
\."Guess we gotta, meow. Let's go, woof..."
2-1-message: \C[3]The room is dark; I can hardly see anything.
2-1-choice:
Proceed ahead
Cancel

2-1-message: \."Whoa, you're in a real hurry, huh?"
\."You wanna meet Reko that badly, ya bastard?"

\."...Why are you saying it like that?!
 Talk, you damn doll!!"
\."Ahaha... Fine... I'll let you meet her."
\."But first, I got a quiz for ya!"
\.\C[10]"What's the current status of Reko Yabusame?"
\.\C[10]"2. Dead from a trap in this room."

\.\C[10]"3. Watching over y'all as a severed head.
 ...Pick one!"

\."Stop it, stop it!!
 I can't believe that... I can't!!"
\."If you want her that bad, have her. Catch!"
\.\C[10]"You got a big hole in your stomach."
\."Aww, that's not great. You're gonna die, huh?"
\.\C[3]As my mind went blank, I heard footsteps approach.
\."You dumbass!! Bro!! Don't die on me!!"

\."Open your eyes!! Bro!!
 It's me!! It's Reko!!"

\.\C[3]I looked to the center of the room,
and saw an open pillar of sorts.
\.\C[4](Don't tell me... Reko was in there from the start?!)
\."Well? This is the Room of Lies!"

\."The correct answer to the quiz was
 "the real Reko is alive and tied up"!"

\."Didn't even notice it was a doll's head...
 Goes to show how much a sibling bond is worth!"

\."The moment it exploded...
 The trap should've been over with."

\."If you'd released me right away,
 I could've at least told him I was alive!!"

\."Huhhh? What he was thinking doesn't change
 that he was gonna die, does it?"

\."It changes everything!!
 It's totally different, dammit...!"

\."Hey, you should know... If you kill a Floor Master,
 y'all are \C[2]all gonna die\C[0]."

\."We're being tested as Floor Masters too!
 Get me?"
\."Well... That's only if you beat me anyhow..."

1-1-message:
\.\C[3]This is a waiting room
for until the next episode is released.

\.\C[3]If you save here, when the next episode is out,
you can, you know... continue on all nicely.

\.\C[3]Well then...
Thank you very much for staying with it this far.

\."Aren't you late. Welcome to the Room of Lies!
 The stage is all set!"

\."W... Who's this chick?!
 Doesn't she look exactly like me?!"

\."S-She was really... here...
 Then am I... seriously a duplicate...?"

\."Huh? Confessing it that easily?
 So boring! See, I was thinking of having a quiz..."
\."Ahaha... You guys ever heard of doppelgangers?"

\."Someone witnessing you somewhere you never went.
 Or else, you meeting another you..."

\."In some countries, that phenomenon...
 is considered an omen of death."

\.\C[3]As soon as he finished talking,
a sound began ringing out.

\."W... What the hell...?!
 Why'd my collar start making that noise?!"

\."...We don't need two Reko Yabusames.
 Only one needs to survive..."
\."Graaah...!! I'm gonna tear this thing off...!!"

\.\C[10]"Ahaha... I wonder what type of death
 that collar will give...? Can't wait to see..."
\.\C[10]"You three idiot girls are just so friendly..."
\.\C[10]"Well then... I'll let you choose who to save."

\."Save whoever you like more!
 And if you don't pick either, both'll die."

\.\C[4](We abandoned Gin to protect the life
 of the fake Reko... and yet...!)

\."Don't be so self-centered, Sara Chidouin.
 The one I'm saying I'll let choose is..."
\."Nao Egokoro! I'm gonna have you pick!"

\."Don't be stupid...!!
 It's just about choosing the real one, right?!"
\."*sigh*... You're just full of complaints, huh?"
\."As a special service, how about you use this?"
\.\C[3]The knife Kai used to commit suicide.
\."Nao!! Pick me if you don't wanna suffer!!"
\."I'm serious!! This ain't just a threat...!!"

\."If I'm gonna die... then not only Nao...!!
 Sara!! I'm takin' you with me too...!!"

\."Even in this short time, I understood...
 You can't possibly hurt a friend."

\."Reko is my friend, too...
 I need to save her..."

\.\sp[12]"You never... intended on letting
 the fake survive from the start, did you...?"

"Ahh, it was the exploding type.
\! Well, simple is best!"

\."Wake her up! Nao!! Sara!!
 Won't you explain?!"

\."Ahh, couldn't even come to see her die...
 Some siblings you are, huh?"

\."You see how much she's bleeding?
 C'mon, you know it."

\."This is the fake Reko's blood, right?!
 I won't be fooled!!"

\."Look, collapsed over there!
 The headless Reko is the fake."

\."Reko is so much stronger, luckier,
 and more hateful than me...!!"
\."She's... a person whose life has value...!!"
\.\C[10]"She's garbage now. It's just a corpse."

\."If you kill a Floor Master,
 all y'all are gonna die, y'know..."
\."Oh well. Seems I'll just have to kill you too!"

2-1-message:
\."Hmm... Normally, this is when I'd drive you off.
 But I'm a good mood right now..."
\."Urk... I'm good, meow. I'm scared, woof."

\."Mwahaha... Suit yourself.
 You've missed your chance..."
"Mwaha... My mind is clear as a spring morning..."
3-1-message: \."I'll tell you right away if I find anything, Sara."
3-2-message: \."I'll tell you right away if I find anything, Sara."
\."Did you just see something too, Sara?"
\."Wahaha... You had the same eyes as me."

\."The eyes of a shrewd detective
 who never overlooks the heart's unrest..."

\."You sensed something shady about Nao.
 Must be the result of spending days with her..."

\."Dunno. Unfortunately, we don't exactly
 have time to confirm that right now."

\."Let's do what we have to.
 There's only ever one option to take."

\."So, the Room of Rubble is past the Ruined Corridor.
 Let's go."
4-1-message:
"It is certainly within your options
 to spend some time together, you two."
4-2-message: \C[3]I can't tell anything about Gashu's heart.

"...To sense someone's heart,
 you need to have spent time together."
4-4-message: "Is something the matter?"
\."No, nothing."
\."If you have any worries, please inform me."
4-5-message: \."Urk... Smells like a fancy house, meow..."
\."Please, sniff as much as you'd like."
4-6-message: "Could I tempt you to some tea?"
4-7-message: "It isn't the time to be sniffing people, meow!!"
6-1-message: \.\C[4](Not good! Alice has lost himself in rage...!)

\."He doesn't have a gun right now...!
 I've been waiting for this moment!!"
"Go on, Alice! Question him about how to escape!"
\."Hmph, escape? That might be nice, too."

\."He doesn't have a gun right now...!
 I've been waiting for this moment!!"

\."Hmph, you make me laugh.
 So even you value your life."

\."You have it wrong!
 I must protect all of your lives...!!"

\."Huh?! As you murder us one after another...?
 Don't screw with me!!"
\."Now tell me where the exit is! Or else you're...!"

\."Be serious with me!!
 Then how are you gonna leave when it's all over?!"
\.\C[3]Alice reached his hand toward Gashu's neck.
\."What is THAT?! Please, enough of these games...!!"
\C[4](A collar...! Even the Floor Masters are...?!)
\."What do you want that would make you do this...?!"

\."It is all for our mission.
 The mission of everyone here."

\."Now, I will excuse myself.
 Please continue to spend your time before
 the Main Game well, so as to leave no regrets."

\."Ahaha. Good on you, miss Sara.
 That's our dependable leader."

\."Speaking of which, I've got something
 important to talk about with you and Keiji."
6-1-choice:
Make him stop
Go for it, Alice!
6-3-message: \."Really got on your bad side, huh..."
\.\C[4](I wonder, does he mean that literally...?)

\.\C[4](Maybe he means something more like
 striking a temporary truce.)

\."Thank goodness... I was afraid I'd get
 pelted with abuse and insults..."
\."You think we can at this point...?"
\."S-Sorry. But I'm thinking about what I've done."

\."I'm not going to let the Main Game happen!
 Look at my eyes...!"

\."W-What do you mean by that?
 I don't understand."
\."Huh? We've quarreled a bunch, haven't we?"
\."But I realized, you know, it can't go on like this."
\."I mean, our real enemy is the kidnappers, right?"

"Hold on now, what's this?! Sou! Old buddy, old pal!
 Haven't we always been the bestest of friends?!"

\."S-Sorry.
 I'm not really one for that sort of energy..."
\.\C[4](Neither am I, but I'm trying over here...!)

\."Still, I'm glad.
 I seriously do want to reconcile with you, miss Sara."

\."I don't want the kidnappers
 to make us dance for them any longer."

\."I want to put an end to this ridiculous Death Game.
 I want us to escape."
\."And of course, I mean all of us...!"
\."So how about we all share this laptop?"\.
\."It's my bad for taking it from you, but..."

\."In the end, I couldn't see what was on it
 because the password had been changed."

\."That explains why you suddenly feel like
 joining up with us, who know the password."
\."Enough with the bargaining. There isn't time."
\."We have the password. Sou has the laptop."
\."I really do just want to reconcile, though..."

\."Well, whatever.
 Okay, as a proof of rebuilt friendship..."
\."Here, Kanna, you make good with miss Sara too."
\."Well, at least shake hands with Kanna!"
\.\C[3]The moment I pulled back my hand...
\.\C[3]But that was all at Sou's instigation.
\."Yo. Sara, Kanna. I've been watching you guys."

\."I dunno what happened...
 But if there's no ill feelings, then great."

\."Um, Reko, will you look at it with us?
 At Kai's laptop!"
\."Tha's perfect. You come over here too!"

\."Hmph... So this is what's on
 that aproned rascal's laptop."

\.\C[4](If there are any clues
 we can use to escape in here...!)
6-3-choice:
Let's do it
Let's not
I don't understand
We've always been friends
6-4-message: \C[3]Kanna and Q-taro... seem kind of happy.
6-6-message: \."Um, we're in a little bit of a hurry, so..."

\."...Gashu is watching.
 Let's leave without drawing suspicion."
6-7-message:
\."Go on, then.
 We'll do what each of us needs to do."
6-8-message: \."Big sis Sara, don't sniff it! Run away!"
7-1-message:
"Yo, you two.
 What's the hurry?"
\."...On a date."
\."Bastard...! Get away from Sara!"
\.\C[4](This isn't the time for jokes...!!)
7-3-message:
"Damn beanie bastard...
 What's he planning with Kanna in tow?"
7-6-message:
"I bet I really would be happier
 forgetting painful memories, but..."
15-1-message:
\C[4](I'll go to the Medical Office...
 Everyone should be waiting there.)
15-3-message:
\.\C[3]Glancing at each other's faces,
and seeing looks of anxiety mixed with trust.
\."I hid it 'cause the suspicious loner was there..."
\."But I might've found a way out, woof!"

\."I don't wanna trouble you guys anymore, meow!
 So I'll do my best, woof!"
\.\C[4](I feel so uneasy... Is everything going to be okay?)
15-5-message: \."Oh, I just figured I shouldn't be sitting still..."

\."...I thought, I should be thinking about
 a way for us to escape, too..."
\."I'll tell you right away if I find anything, Sara."
\."Maybe I'll lend you my aid, Sara."
\.\C[3]You can now use Keiji's partner ability.

\."My detective sight...
 It should be at least a little useful."
\.\C[3]Touch the icon to activate your partner's ability.
15-9-message: \."Ehehe, you came at a good time."

\."D... Don't give me that displeased look...
 I just wanted to talk for a bit."
\."Huh? Wow, you're actually listening to me..."
\."Tha's right! There ain't no time, Sou."
\."S... Said it outright... Boy, that hurts."

\."It ain't anything bad, Sara.
 Won't you listen?"
\.\C[4](Have the three of them been working together...?)
15-12-message:
\."Mya!! Don't interfere, woof!
 We're in a hurry, meow!!"

\."But it would be dangerous
 if you tripped in your haste."

\."Move it, Floor Master.
 ...You trying to stall or something?"

\."Absolutely not.
 I simply spoke up out of concern. ...Go ahead."
\.\C[4](We need to head for Nao's bedroom!)
15-14-message:
"Hey, Sara.
 What're we getting started here?"

"You, Sara Chidouin.
 What's about to transpire here?"
15-16-message: "All right, everybody. Let's head for the exit!"
\."Hold up...!! I wanna hear the details!"
\."I'll explain later... There's no time now."
\."Whoever wants to escape, come to the stairs."
\."...If you wanna stay, I won't stop you."
\."I didn't say I wouldn't come along, you know!!"

A small chip removed from Rio Laizer's head.
Capable of nullifying the facility's security.

2-1-message:
\."Huh...? O-Of course...
 I guess I didn't mention it, did I...?"

\."I'm just thinking... Once we go in the room,
 we might only have one chance..."
\."So... Would you let me check the chip first?"
\."Yes. If it's broken, this plan will be a failure..."

\."I just feel like...
 you aren't your usual self..."
\.\C[4](I want to believe you too, Nao!)
\.\C[4](I'll close my eyes... and take a deep breath.)
\.\C[4](I'll look at Nao again with a clear head.)
\.\C[4](The way I did when I was Keiji...!)
\.\C[4](I'll close my eyes... and take a deep breath.)

Is the secret room really here?
Let's hurry

Hand over the chip
Don't hand it over

I do trust you
I can't trust you
2-3-message:
\."We're allies. If you're just going to trick me,
 I'd rather we stand together and share our worries."
\."...You saw right through me, didn't you."
\."I don't know anything about this secret room."
\."I do... know how we can find out."
\."I'd love to know what YOUR plans are going forward."

\."Come on... Have you even thought about
 \C[2]how you'll use this chip\C[0]?"
\."We know how...! Please, give it back!"
\."What a liar you are, miss Sara."

\."Hold on a second.
 Why do you know about the chip...?!"

"If we just mess around with it,
 we'll figure something out!"

\."No you won't. Precision machinery
 is a lot more delicate than you are, miss Sara."
\."Hmph. This isn't the time for childish arguments."

"I need to go and \C[2]analyze\C[0] the chip
 with this \C[2]laptop\C[0]."
\."Ahaha. At least you're being honest, miss Sara."

\."You having this is like
 casting pearls before swine."

"You're the worst, meow!!
 You used big sis Nao for that, woof?!"
\."She's a good kid, unlike you two."

\."Alright, miss Nao.
 Hand me the chip."

\.\C[3]Nao grabbed the laptop, pushed Sou away,
and took off running.

\."Hang on! The chip and the laptop...?!
 Where are you going with those?!"

\."Big sis Sara, let's go after her, woof!
 She went toward the lobby, meow!!"
2-3-choice:
We know how to use it
Why do you know about it?
We'll figure something out
We don't know

\."But I'm havin' a humdinger of a time
 on account'a findin' diddly squat."
\."Well, but I guess there's one thing..."
\."Are you looking for leads on escape, Q-taro?"

\."Don't casually switch over to conversation!!
 You freaked me out!!"
\."Kai's laptop... 's pretty much all I got..."

\."Would be nice to persuade Sou...
 But he ain't leavin' his room."

\."And Kanna's with him too...
 Hope he don't use her for nothin' evil."
2-1-choice:
What are you doing now?
Scare him from behind
2-2-message:
"Maybe the reason he's not entirely at wit's end...
 is because he's got lots of tokens."
3-1-message: "Can't spare the time to reapply my makeup..."
"Can't believe you, Kanna... Is Sou really...?"
\.\C[3]Reko slapped my shoulder with an accepting smile.
\."Wha?! Sara!! You just made eye contact, right?!"
\."Sorry... I thought I'd be butting in."

\."Huh, is that why...
 I was feeling a little down..."

\."I see you've got some color back in your face.
 Glad you're okay, Sara."

\."It's fine, don't say a thing.
 We actually kept looking at the laptop..."

\."If I knew a little more about computers,
 maybe I could do something..."

\."But that ain't happening.
 Gotta think of something else..."
3-2-message: \."Hmm? You want a hug, Gin? C'mere."
\."Stop it, woof!! I'm seriously searching, meow!!"
\."Hahaha! Sure you are, sure you are!"
3-3-message:
\C[3]Whenever Kanna looks uneasy,
Alice lowers his head a little.
\.\C[4](Such scary eyes... And yet he's talking with Kanna...)

\."Hmph... For how blue in the face you were
 when you ran off, you're looking better now."

\."Me, worried...? That's for someone
 far more gullible... Fool..."

\."Though it's fine.
 You've always been too nosy..."

\."It's our fate to fight...
 It's best you drop half-baked ideas of friendship."
\.\C[4](I ignore him, and suddenly he gets chatty...)

\."Sara Chidouin, after you left,
 we did continue to investigate the laptop..."

\."But there was no great information.
 ...I'm just letting you know."

\."More importantly, would you take my place
 as Kanna Kizuchi's conversation partner?"

\."She's treating me just like a friend.
 Has she not forgotten I'm a murderer...?"
3-4-message: \.\C[4](Wonder what kind of smell that is...)
4-1-message:
"Kanna... needs to search for
 anything she can do too...!"
"Yes... Sou really has done a lot to help us escape..."
\."Yeah... I just wasn't feeling well earlier."
\."Nah, I'm fine... You were sitting here first."
\."T-Then I'll sit on your lap, Sara!"
\."No thanks... Anyway, what's this about Sou?"
\."Talking about Sou? Let me hear it."
\."Earlier... I went to return the laptop to Sou..."

\."And it looked like he was making progress
 on a plan to escape...!"
\.\C[4](Was what he said before really true...?)

\."I'm sure Sou can come up with a way
 for all of us to leave...!"

\."...Whatever role card you have...
 It doesn't matter, Sara."
4-2-message: *sniff sniff*...
\."Yaaah!! Nooo!!"
\."Meooow?! That hurt, woof!!"
\."Huh...?! I-I'm sorry..."

\.\C[3]There doesn't seem to be a plug nor a cord
that would be needed to power a computer.

4-1-message: \.\C[3]A Ring-Up Box has appeared in the back of my room.
\.\C[3]Here in my room, I'm all alone.

\.\C[3]Back there, I tried to cheer everyone up
so they wouldn't be uneasy.
\.\C[3]I told myself I couldn't give in around them.
\.\C[4](But when I'm alone... I'm so cowardly...)
\.\C[3]Suddenly, the tablet began making a sound.
\.\C[3]The \C[2]Trading Phase\C[3] of the Main Game will now begin.
\.\C[3]My heartbeat is loud and out of control.
\{\C[10]Anything but the one that killed Joe...
\.\C[3]Before I knew it, I'd dropped to the floor.
\.\C[3]I stayed there motionless for a few minutes.

\."Yep. Could you open up?
 Can we talk in there?"

\."Does my voice sound that cute?
 Nope, it's your friendly policeman."

\."Your friendly policeman just wants to
 come in and chat... How about it?"
\.\C[4](Should I open the door and invite him in?)
\."For now, can we... just talk like this?"
\."...Okie-dokie. I'll just get straight to business."
\."...Didn't want to have me at your door, huh?"
\."Hmm. I mean, caution's a good thing and all..."
\."Okie-dokie. I'll just get straight to business."

\."If you're Keiji, you should know the password!
 Tell it to me!"

\."...Now that's a toughie.
 Guess this case is going unsolved."

\.\C[4](I can only imagine Keiji giving
 such an unmotivated reply...)
\."Okie-dokie. I'll just get straight to business."
\."...I'll get straight to the point, Sara."
\.\C[4](S... Shoot! I made a weird sound!)

\."Ahh, thank goodness... If you really were
 the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], I'd have been pretty worried."

\."You make it obvious, but you won't confess...
 Sure enough, you're clever."
\."But you're still a bad liar, huh?"
\."Not gonna trust me at my word though, are you..."
\.\C[3]Keiji slipped by me into the phone booth.
\.\C[3]Keiji went on inserting token after token.
\.\C[3]The first trade has just been performed.

\."Did you just trade?!
 Your \C[2]Keymaster\C[0]... for my \C[4]Commoner\C[0]!!"

\."That proves it to you, right?
 Your friendly policeman's the Keym..."

\."That was a valuable chance for a trade!
 Why did you go and waste it on this?!"
\.\C[4](S... Shoot! I made a weird sound!)

\."Ahh, thank goodness... If you really were
 the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], I'd have been pretty worried."

\."You make it obvious, but you won't confess...
 Sure enough, you're clever."
\."But you're still a bad liar, huh?"
\."Not gonna trust me at my word though, are you..."
\.\C[3]I hear footsteps trailing away from my door.
\.\C[3]The first trade has just been performed.
\.\C[3]Practically on reflex, I opened my door.
\.\C[3]I dragged him into the room and closed the door.

\."That was a valuable chance for a trade!
 Why did you go and waste it on this?!"

\."We've only got 3 hours.
 No time to waste suspecting each other over roles."
\."You must have an idea. Tell it to me."
4-1-choice:
Is that Keiji?
Is that Nao?
..........

Open door and invite in
Don't open and chat
Silently ignore him
Ask him for a password
5-1-message:
"Say, Sara.
 What sorts of methods could we escape by, you think?"

"We could search for an exit
 without letting the kidnappers find us out."

\."That's true. Maybe we can avoid
 the watchful eye of the Floor Masters."

"Let's defeat the kidnappers and return home
 gloriously out the front door."

\."Whoa, so courageous.
 They might have weapons, y'know."
\."...You're makin' me feel bad for Q-taro, Sara."

\."We could cause a stir, to the point that they're like
 "the Death Game is neither here nor there!"..."
\."Hmm. Then what, should we make a time bomb?"
\."Sure enough, the thing we need... is information."
\."Where is this place? What sort of building is it?"

\."If we just had a floor map, at least,
 we'd have half a chance."
\."Which of us would know about something like that?"

"Sou... He's done a lot of suspicious stuff.
 Maybe he knows something..."

\."But I doubt we could investigate him
 even if we had all the time in the world."
\."Mishima died and reappeared as an AI, but..."
\."What if some floor map data was put in him...?"
\."So then, the person I was thinking was..."
\."Okay, I'll confess who I was thinking of."

\."Even if he didn't know the details of the Death Game,
 he might have known something about this facility."
\."So then... the laptop he left behind?"

\."Yep. There's still info
 we haven't checked on that laptop."

\.\C[4](Q-taro got his hands on it once,
 but it ran out of battery...)
\.\C[4](And now, it's back in Sou's hands...)
\."You remember the place we found it?"
\."Well, I did a little detectiving there."

\.\C[4](But before we even came to the third floor...
 Kai was already...)
5-1-choice:
Secretly look for an exit
Defeat our enemy and leave
Destroy the Death Game

\C[3]In front of the monitors is a machine that,
despite its complexity, offers only simple functions.
1-2-message:
\C[3]In front of the monitors is a machine that,
despite its complexity, offers only simple functions.

\C[3]Looking down by the ground,
various wires are connected to the computer.
\."They said it was the blue wire, right?"
\.\C[3]I connected the blue wire to the computer.
\."I'm going to press things at random...!!"
\C[3]My hands move on intuition and instinct.
\.\C[3]As if I knew the answer from the very beginning.
\.\C[3]...made an unpleasant error noise and froze.
\."Sara, don't suddenly turn to desperation on me."
\."Look, by your feet. See those wires?"
\."It was the blue one, yeah? Let's try connecting it."

\.\C[3]Keiji connected a blue wire
on the floor to the computer.
\."Can't refuse a request from you, Sara."

\.\C[3]Keiji connected a blue wire
on the floor to the computer.

\C[3]The top-left monitor shows
some broken bongos in an empty bedroom.

 from the Prize Exchange...!)
\.\C[3]They look slightly repaired from when Reko broke them.
\.\C[4](Alice must have tried to fix them...)
\.\C[4](As if hoping to repair their relationship...)
\.\C[3]But Reko can't apologize any longer.
\.\C[3]They look slightly repaired from when Reko broke them.
\.\C[4](Alice must have tried to fix them...)
\.\C[4](As if hoping to repair their relationship...)
\.\C[3]But Alice can give them to her no longer.

\.\C[4](It doesn't matter right now...
 I can't get stuck on it...)
\C[3]There's nothing of note on the top-left monitor.

17-1-message:
\.\C[4](Is she okay...? She keeps talking with
 the Professor Mishima AI...)
\C[3]The center monitor shows an empty bedroom.

\.\sw[324]"For I was miraculously revived
 so that I could protect you..."\sw[325]

\sw[324]"Now, put on a smile!
 I like to see you cheery, miss Nao."\sw[325]
\sw[324]"Fantastic. What a good student I have, indeed."\sw[325]
\."He was always just an AI that Reko destroyed here."

\."It's a tricky subject, huh?
 AIs are entities of pure data, so..."

"If our enemy's up to it, maybe they're free to
 revive 'em and copy 'em as they like."

\."They might also be able to remake their personalities
 however it suits them, don't you think?"
\."It sure looks like Mishima put her up to something."
\."Maybe that card trade earlier was Nao...!!"

\."But it takes 50 tokens to trade.
 Nao shouldn't have very many, I thought."

\."But wasn't he always just
 an AI that Reko destroyed right here?"
\.\C[4](Reko had a good reason to destroy him, and yet...)
\."Wonder if he's really the same AI...?"

\."Only Nao's room having a monitor in it
 is pretty suspect, too."
\."Maybe the Floor Master is plotting something."
17-1-choice:
What's with that Mishima...?
Nao is acting strange

\.\C[3]Reko's body and Rio Ranger's remains are still there.

19-1-message:
\C[3]We checked all the monitors,
but Gin was nowhere to be found.
\."It's Gashu... I'll shut off the security system."
"Oh dear. Just what are you two up to...?"
\."Hm? Sure are nosy... We're having a moment here."
\."While you're here, though, tell me something."
\."Are there AIs on all these monitors?"

\."Here are assembled AIs of
 all candidates who \C[2]cleared the First Trial\C[0]."

\."Gotcha. You can go.
 We've got... a thing to get back to here, see."
\."Yes. I shall leave you to it..."
\."We should really get back to looking for Gin!"

\."I'm gradually coming to understand
 how our enemy operates..."

\."By the time he comes back safe...
 We should have an escape plan to surprise him with."

\."I know...!
 We should collect Ranger's chip while we still can!"
\."I'm sure... he'll escape and return to us..."

\."And when he does... we should have an escape plan
 worked out to surprise him with."
\."Let's go... To the Room of Lies!"

Back to the first floor!
We should recover Ranger's chip

"AIs, huh..."
\."There's one here... One of him..."
\.\C[4](She must mean Alice...)
"You want to meet him...?"
\."A machine is just a machine."

"However well it imitates a person...
 An AI is still just an AI."
\."It's not... the real thing."
\."...That's right."
\."The real him... is still in the Room of Lies."
\.\C[4](Reko's keeping it all inside...)
\."Probably better that I don't see any AI..."
\."'Cause I'm... not as strong as Nao..."

\.\C[4](Why here...?)

23-1-message: \C[3]Alice is gazing toward the Room of Lies.
"...You need something?"
"Um... Are you okay?"
\."Hmph... Don't worry about it, Sara Chidouin."

\."My feet just naturally came here...
 I won't go any further than this."
"What are you doing here...?"
\."...Nothing."

\."My feet just naturally came here...
 I won't go any further than this."
"...It's nothing."
\."Hmph... Did you talk to me out of pity?"

\."If you just abandon me, you... and I...
 will have it easier."
\."More importantly, Sara Chidouin."
\."Nao... went into the Room of Lies earlier."

\."She said brave things around me...
 But her wounds may be deep after all..."

\."...Check on her if you have the time.
 I don't want to return there anymore..."
\."If I did go back... I'd surely also..."
23-1-choice:
Are you okay?
What are you doing?
It's nothing

2-3-message: \C[4](That's right... There was a trade, huh.)

\.\C[3]I checked my tablet behind my back
so that Gin and Nao wouldn't notice.
"Should we look for that secret room soon, meow?"
\."I might have an idea about it."
\."Err... A certain someone told me about it..."

\."That's amazing, Nao!
 Please, take us there!"
2-3-choice:
Do you really?
Take us there
3-1-message: "Myah! I smell a weird smell, woof!"
\."I dunno... Give me some time, meow."
3-2-message: "Myah! I smell a weird smell, woof!"
\."It's like blood... mixed with something burnt, woof."
\."I think it's coming from that glass door..."
\.\C[4](There should be... that doll of him...)

\.\C[4](Good.
 I didn't want to see him now.)

\.\C[4](...Hey, hold on.
 Then where did that doll disappear to?)

\."Big sis Sara!
 There's a path in the back, woof!"
3-4-message: \C[3]There's a pitch black path further in.
3-5-message: \C[3]There's a pitch black path further in.
4-1-message: \C[3]Sou and Kanna are whispering in the corner.
\.\C[4](Not the kind of thing I can barge into...)
5-1-message:
\."Yeah!! I'm totally better, woof!
 Poison won't scare me anymore, meow!"

\."Guess the antidote Keiji brought worked like a charm!
 Don't see no weird after-effects, neither!"
\."Good showing from your friendly policeman, eh?"

\.\C[4](It really was a close call...
 If Keiji hadn't found the antidote, Gin might have...)

\."The antidote Keiji brought's workin' like a charm!
 Don't feel no weird after-effects, neither!"
\."Good showing from your friendly policeman, eh?"

\.\C[4](It really was a close call... If Keiji hadn't
 found the antidote, both of them might have...)
"Same to you. Your reasoning saved us, Sara."

\."Not to mention your decisiveness in that moment...
 You and Nao are really something."
\."...I allowed the fake Reko to die."
\."...That's about the only thing I could do."

\."Mostly it came down to Q-taro
 putting his life on the line."

"Well, we've been here three whole days.
 All that searching around was worth it."

\.\C[4](Stupid... Why'd I have to say that
 like I'm suspicious of him?)

\."But if Gin had taken all five of those stingers...
 it'd probably be impossible."
\."We owe it to Q-taro for putting his life on the line."
\."...We've lost a lot of allies on the way here."

\."Alice... he may have looked like trouble at first...
 But I don't think he was a bad guy..."

\."You've got the lives you saved right here.
 ...Isn't that right?"
\.\C[3]Gin's smile is helping to save us all.
\.\C[3]If we lost him, too... I'm sure we'd...
\."Haha... What're you crying for? You're a big kid."

\."Sorry, meow... I couldn't do anything...
 So Alice..."
\."Ain't nothing for you to apologize about, Gin."

\."Sorry the real me couldn't be there
 when you were in a pinch."

\."Human or doll, it don't matter.
 Both of 'em were our allies... and..."

\."All the kidnappers are planning here
 is for us to kill each other."

\."You let someone live, and kill someone else.
 That's all it is."

\."So why would you help each other?
 Why try to be kind..."

\."If she'd thought only for herself a little more,
 maybe she wouldn't have had to die like that..."
\."She was lonesome. Despite how it looked..."
\.\C[4](Of course we won't forget. We can't...!)
\."Hmph... Maybe there's something wrong with me, too..."

\."Even though you and I are
 soon going to be killing each other..."

\."I will now begin explanations
 for the second Main Game."
\."Mr. Gin Ibushi... How are you faring?"

\."You think we're just gonna sit here
 and listen to yer damn explanation?"

\."You guys are always pulling tricks!
 I won't trust you, woof!!"

\."W-What the heck, woof!!
 Don't come any closer, meow...!"

\."Just amazing, Mr. Gin Ibushi. Astonishing resilience!
 Why, you're the picture of health already."

\."And \C[2]Uncle Crabstache\C[0]...
 It's an honor to receive such a charming nickname."

\."Mr. Q-taro Burgerberg, you're healthy as well...
 My word, the stamina of a first-class baseball player
 is truly something else!"
\."Oh dear... So there is yet some venom left!"
\."...Um, when are you getting to the explanation?"
\."Well then, I shall explain this Main Game."

\."That said, the basic rules are the same.
 It is a voting game making use of four cards:
 the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0], \C[3]Sage\C[0], \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], and \C[5]Commoner\C[0]..."

\."The \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] is the \C[2]keyman of destruction,
 should they be chosen\C[0]... The one who carries it bears
 great responsibility, but it also serves as armor."

\."The \C[3]Sage\C[0] is a \C[2]superhuman who knows
 the one in possession of the Keymaster role\C[0].
 But once exposed... it is hard to protect oneself."

\."The \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] will \C[2]die unless chosen\C[0].
 They are the sole person who can turn
 defeat into victory, or victory into defeat."

\."And the \C[4]Commoners\C[0] have no power at all...
 But thus they fill the role of guiding the discussion
 in the proper direction."

\."However, this time, we will use data
 in place of paper cards."

\."Card data has already been distributed at random
 to the voting tablets you possess."
\."All that remains is... the permission to access it."
\."Why'd ya hafta make it so roundabout?!"
\."Because this time, you are able to make \C[2]trades\C[0]."
\."Indeed. Now then, let me show you."
\."A phone booth came from the floor...!"

\."You may trade cards by making a request at
 one of these Ring-Up Boxes, situated in each room."

\."They are simple to use.
 Simply \C[2]insert 50 tokens\C[0] and grab the receiver."

\."Of course, just like the Sub-Game,
 you cannot use your own tokens."
\."Oh? I had thought you would be delighted, Mr. Q-taro."

\.\C[4](That's an awful rule! People without tokens
 don't even get the right to trade...!)

\."Trades are 1-on-1 with who you select.
 Please trade freely, with whomever you wish."
\."You have a time limit of approximately 3 hours."

\."When all have returned to their bedrooms,
 that will signal the start of this trading phase."
\."Do not wear such gloomy looks, everyone."

\."Win, and survive.
 For you were all born to win."

\."So then, please return to your rooms
 within 5 minutes."
\."If you do not... You understand, don't you?"

\.\C[3]We look at each other's faces
and try to judge how we're feeling.

\."It's not like we're out of time...!
 There must be something we can do!!"

\.\C[4](That might sound flimsy...
 But I'm not giving up!!)

\."I mean, it ain't like everything's
 going hunky-dory for them neither!"

\."The guy with the 'stache shooting Ranger
 must've been unexpected too, right?!"

\.\C[4](Unexpected... If we look for things our enemy
 didn't expect, there's sure to be a way out of this!)
\."For now, let's go back to our rooms..."

\."And after that, we'll definitely
 find a way to escape."
\."I won't let them have their way!!"

\."I won't give up!
 There must be a way to escape... somewhere...!!"

\."Y-Yes, that's right!
 There just has to be...!!"
\.\C[4](I can't let my feelings give in!)

\."Then I'll head back first.
 Don't want to get killed for being tardy."
5-1-choice:

We'll definitely escape

\."She wasn't here, meow?"

\."It's strange...

\."Just now, Human Flower seeds were injected
 by your necklace through your body."

\."Please be at ease...
 She won't suffer like miss Nao."

\."Roots will spread through her body... and feeling
 a comforting numbness... she'll die beautifully..."
"...This is how the chosen one meets her end."

\."So long as the flowers don't wilt...
 her body will always be preserved beautifully..."
\.\sp[15]\C[10]I'll kill every one of you who killed Kanna...!!
\.\sp[15]\C[10]That's right... and first... will be Sara...

1-1-message: "Hey, you know what a majority vote is?"
\."Well? Gotten used to majority votes yet?"
\."At this rate, you can just vote for you who hate."
\."But it's okay. Just vote for who you hate."
\."Well, keep it up, and vote for who you hate."
\."Kill the people who get in your way."
\."No big, no big. It's not like it's your fault."
\C[3]Reko... has just been staring at the unmoving Alice.
\."Maybe even you going and killing a guy...!!"
\."It's my fault...!! It was all my fault!!"
\."I had so many chances to forgive you...!!"
\."But the Main Game will be very soon..."

\."We were told to assemble, right?!
 I know that!!"

\."But if I see one of those kidnappers' faces right now,
 I know my fists are gonna fly...!!"

\."Y-You can't do that!
 We can't lose you too, Reko...!!"

\."R-Right...? So please...
 Just leave me alone, Nao...!"
\.\C[4](If I don't persuade Reko with Nao, she'll...!)

\.\C[4](If I leave her alone now...
 Reko's heart will...!!)
\."Never mind... for just a little bit..."
\."I can't support everyone like you, Sara..."
\."But I think I can support Reko right now...!!"

\."I'll be right there!
 I'm sure Reko will get back on her feet...!!"
\.\C[4](I'll trust Nao! Off to the Medical Office...!)

\.\C[4](There's... a huge hole in his stomach...)

1-1-message: \C[3]When I woke up... I was on an island.
\."Where in the world might this be...?"

\.\C[3]Following our first meeting in some time,
I was driving my former student, miss \C[2]Nao\C[3], back home.
But along the way, I lost consciousness.
\."I guess... we've been kidnapped after all...?"

\."I mean, I've sure never heard of
 kidnapping people to an island before..."

\."But gathering this many people together...
 What do they intend to do with us?"
\."Anyhow, we oughta get lookin' for a way to escape!"

\."Seems we've got no choice but to work together...
 Cooperation is key."

\."That can wait until we get to know each other.
 Shall we do introductions...?"

\."Err...
 My name's \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0].
 I'm just a high school student."

\."I'm \C[2]Jou Tazuna\C[0], but just call me Joe!
 I'm Sara's bud! Ask me anything about her!"

\."I'm \C[2]Kanna Kizuchi\C[0], a middle schooler!
 ...And she's not here, but I have a big sister!"

\."\C[2]Q-taro Burgerberg\C[0]'s the name!
 I'mma pro baseballer! ...Second-string, tho!"

\."I'm \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0]. I don't really want to say it, but...
 I guess you'd call me a job-hopper."

\."My name's \C[2]Nao Egokoro\C[0]!
 I'm attending art college right now!"

\."I am \C[2]Kai Satou\C[0].
 As you can see, I work as a homemaker."

\."I'm \C[2]Gin Ibushi\C[0], meow! Don't underestimate me
 'cause I'm just a grade-schooler, woof!!"

\."I am \C[2]Kazumi Mishima\C[0].
 I work as a high school teacher,
 teaching the subjects of art and Japanese."

\."...\C[2]Gonbee Yamada\C[0].
 My occupation is that of a model prisoner...
 I won't be taking any further questions."
\."Seems we've got a dangerous one among us..."
\."Um... Come to think of it, what about you?"
\."Eheehee... What fun you look to be having."
\."I am the Island Master, \C[2]Sue Miley\C[0], the Laughing Doll."
\."Well, everyone? Are you pleased with the island?"
\."Ahaha... What a dreadful way to put it."

\."I merely issued you all an invitation
 to this wonderful \C[2]Isle of Memories\C[0]."
\."What in the world do you mean to have us do?"
\."Eheehee... A most wonderful game of survival."

\."It's all very simple.
 You must merely \C[2]survive here\C[0] for \C[2]30 days\C[0]."

\."Go foraging for food, craft defenses for your base,
 and keep your lives amongst dangerous creatures
 and trap-laden facilities."

\."W-What are you talking about?!
 Let us go right now...!!"
\."Ahaha... Please do give it your all."
\."Dammit!! You hold the hell up, lassie!!"

\."Hmph... What of it?
 At a mere 30 days, this is practically a vacation."

\."Nothing we can do.
 Let's all work together to overcome this."

\.\C[3]Touch the face icons to pick each character's action,
then touch "Next" to advance time!

\.\C[3]Also, with a \C[2]right-click\C[3] (or \C[2]two-finger tap\C[3]),
you can look at each character's stats!
(The View button also works!)

\.\C[3]If \C[2]the protagonist dies\C[3] or \C[2]your Base points hit 0\C[3],
it's game over!

18-1-message:
\C[3]\>[Radio]\<
\>Gives somewhat important info for survival.\<
\>Can also listen to music on it.\<

"Hey, bastards! It's the Rio Ranger Station,
 bringing you some hot survival tips!"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 If you choose to have Sara Forage,
 sometimes she'll go foraging a second time!
 ...Bet she's good at finding faults, too."

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When Joe Rests, sometimes he gets buddy-buddy,
 and makes everyone's Fondness go up a li'l.
 ...Everybody's friend, eh? Hate those types."

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When you have Keiji Train, seems that
 he'll train a second time on occasion.
 ...You beefy guys gross me out."

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When Kanna Rests, apparently she'll sometimes
 heal a wounded ally by one stage.
 ...What a hypocrite, right? Don't get betrayed!"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When Q-taro faces a foe in battle,
 he might sometimes block attacks on the base.
 ...Would love to see him die the hero."

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 Even if Sou's about to kick it from starvation,
 he might be able to stick it out!
 ...What are ya, a cactus?"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When you have Reko Train, rest easy,
 'cause it seems she never gets hurt doing it.
 ...Is she a robot made of steel or what?"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When you have Nao Craft,
 sometimes she'll Craft a second time.
 ...Ah, must be a shut-in, huh?"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When you have Kai Craft,
 I hear he'll sometimes find a serving of food.
 ...Is he layin' eggs like a chicken?"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When you choose to have Gin Rest,
 sometimes all his stats'll go up.
 ...Those clothes won't fit if you get tall, y'know!"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 When Mishima gets injured Crafting, Foraging,
 or Training, sometimes all his stats'll go up.
 ...You one of those monkey aliens, or what?"

\."Here's a tip for ya!
 After Gonbee attacks in a battle,
 he'll sometimes attack for you again.
 ...No tellin' what a brutal criminal will do."

\."Hunger happens in about 4 stages!
 A green face is bad news - eat or you'll lose health.
 A purple face is on the verge of death - eat or die!"

\."You ever see wood on the ground around the base?
 Pick that stuff up!"

\."If you see an icon pop up on screen,
 you should try touching it! Should have an effect."

\."You know about Life Shards?
 I hear they can be used to raise Fondness.
 How to get 'em...? You'll know when you get one."

\."When a heart icon pops up, touch it!
 You might get friendlier with somebody."

\."Keep making new weapons, got it?
 It'll increase your Fighting stat.
 Seems there's a limit to that, though."

\."When you make armor,
 it'll only block a single enemy attack.
 Doesn't look like there's any upgrading it."

\."As the days go on, the enemies attacking the base
 will probably get stronger and stronger..."

\."To make the base bigger,
 you gotta gather materials and get to Crafting!"

\."Foraging has the highest odds of injury!
 'Course, if you just coop up indoors, you'll die."

\."Resting normally recovers you by one stage.
 But get a good sleep, and it'll be a full recovery!"

"...Welcome to DJ Gashu's All Night Island.
 This is the song we present you today..."

21-1-message: \."It seems it's about time for the base to get larger."

"We've done it!
 It's now a bigger base than before!"

\."And using the new workbench inside,
 we can now \C[2]construct the tools\C[0] we need!"

"Fantastic!
 It's now a sufficient base for habitation indeed!"

\."We can construct more on the workbench,
 and above all, the building looks better than ever!"

"Ohh! Just incredible!
 To think our base would become so splendid!"

\."At this size, we might as well make it a school!
 A school built on a deserted island! How dreamy!"

"What a thing to behold!
 We've built ourselves a castle...!!"

\."Provided we had a stable food supply,
 I might not mind spending the rest of my life here!
 Indeed!"

\."There's actually just
 one thing wrong in your reasoning..."
\."And I'll... tell you what it... is..."

 Maybe I shouldn't go touching it...)

\."Let's go back to the kitchen and hide!"
\.\C[4](I don't know who you are... but don't notice us...!)

\.\C[3]Keiji picked me up under his arm
and moved me into the kitchen.
\."...? The key that was here is..."
"Listen, don't let Gashu have his way."
\."He's trying to destroy the Death Game."

"The Monitor Room should have
 a \C[2]surveillance mode\C[0], correct?"

\."Connect the \C[2]blue wire\C[0],
 and keep a careful eye on Gashu."
\."You must retrieve \C[2]the chip in Ranger's head\C[0]."

\."That chip can destroy this place's security.
 It's a menace."

"Please be quiet...!
 What if someone heard you?"

"Eheehee...
 Then things would get quite fun, I suppose."
\.\C[4](Wha...?! The tablet?! This is not the time!!)

\."It didn't look like those two
 had captured him, at least."
\."...Let's think about what we can do."
\."Those two mentioned some very interesting things..."
\."Yep. Something about \C[2]a chip in Ranger's head\C[0]..."
\."Plus \C[2]a surveillance mode in the Monitor Room\C[0]..."
\."I don't know what sort of functionality it has..."

\."But if we could watch
 the security cameras on all the floors...!"

\."Sounds loads better than sneaking
 back onto the first floor and getting caught."
\."Just briefly, we should check our cards."
\."That annoying noise earlier signaled a trade..."

\."Ah, right.
 Someone's cards must've gotten traded."

28-1-message: \C[3]It's locked and won't open.
\."Ngh, this door... Was it always locked?"

\.\C[3]Taking a closer look at the doorknob,
I found a dial lock on the side.

\.\C[4](Looks like you have to set it to
 a number from 1 to 9.)

\.\C[4](I can just try every possibility,
 and I'll have solved it in 9 tries...)

\."Hold on, Sara.
 There are little holes on the knob."
\."...It might pop out poison needles."
\."...! Then I can't get this wrong."

\."Sure there's no hint somewhere in this room?
 You should know what's up before you try."
\.\C[4](Even though it was open the first time...)

"Keiji, please bust down the door
 with your brute strength like usual."
\."Eh...? Don't think that's in my wheelhouse."
\."These arms are for protecting people, see."

\.\C[4](Sure enough, I should consider how to solve this.
 I wonder if there's a hint anywhere...)

 who could and couldn't drink\C[0]."

4-1-message:
\."The place where Nao was hiding out
 and holding Professor Mishima's head..."

\.\C[4](It's pitch black...
 Was Nao sitting in the dark like this, too...?)
\."Amazing how she could recover from that."
\."...We're all getting a stronger, bit by bit."

\.\C[4](Hold on a second...
 Did no one notice this secret passage?)
\."I wonder if Kai noticed this secret passage..."
\."I wonder if Nao noticed this secret passage..."

\."Hmm...
 She had the time to look for it, but..."

\."You really think in all her distress,
 she was up for something like that?"
\."I wonder if Miley knew about this secret passage?"

\."She calls herself a Floor Master.
 Wouldn't surprise me if she knew
 the structure of the rooms."

\."Whether he knew it from the start
 or only noticed while searching, I don't know..."

\."But I'm thinking that's the fundamental reason
 the laptop ended up in the Room of Rubble."

\.\C[4](Kai came to the third floor,
 and placed the laptop there...)

 Q-taro is okay, right...?"

 he regains consciousness, it looks like."
\."...We'll meet up in the lobby later, Sara."

\."I'll give him a piggyback ride if I have to...
 'Cause you're onto a way to escape, right?"

\."Keiji... Could you take Q-taro and Kanna,
 and all gather in the lobby later?"
\."We... might know a way to escape."

\."Okie-dokie. I'm half-believing.
 But if you say so, I'll trust you."

looking for assistants as of late.

 Though it seems to be pretty old.)
\.\C[4](I knew we had an assistant when I was a kid...)

\.\C[4](But they only worked while I was at school,
 so I never saw them around.)
\.\C[4](Was Kai... really there, at my house...?)
7-1-message: \C[5]A file named "BACKDOOR.SMUT."

\.\C[3]Inside, there were long strings of text and symbols
I couldn't make any sense of.
\.\C[4](Urgh... I'm good at math and science, but...)
"H-Hey! Quit it with that!!"
\."I-I'm not exactly excited myself, but..."
\."...Well, it's not an image file, right?"
\C[3]I nervously opened the file.

\.\C[3]Inside, there were long strings of text and symbols
I couldn't make any sense of.

\."Can't make heads or tails of it.
 Hard to believe Kai was into this..."

\."Is this a, whatchamacallit...
 Some kinda programming thingie?"
\.\C[4](We can't decipher this sort of thing...)
8-1-message: \C[5]A file named "Order 59."

\C[5]Kai, the Death Game Project is finally
taking on tinges of reality.

\.\C[5]At last, your time has come
to be useful to the organization.

\.\C[5]Guard Sara Chidouin until the planned day,
and ensure she remains healthy.

\.\C[5]And as much as possible, keep an eye out
for her close friends Jou Tazuna and Ryoko Hirose.

\.\C[5]We can't add anyone else.
Understood? Fulfill your duty, Kai.

\C[5]Kai, the Death Game Project is finally
taking on tinges of reality.

\.\C[5]At last, your time has come
to be useful to the organization.

\.\C[5]Guard Sara Chidouin until the planned day,
and ensure she remains healthy.

\.\C[5]And as much as possible, keep an eye out
for her close friends Jou Tazuna and Ryoko Hirose.

\.\C[5]We can't add anyone else.
Understood? Fulfill your duty, Kai.

\C[4](Even Joe, and my best friend Ryoko,
 are mentioned in here...!!)

\.\C[3]The file contains investigative reports on,
and photos of, Joe and Ryoko.

\.\C[4](Don't tell me... Was it planned
 for Ryoko to get involved, too...?)
9-1-message: \C[5]A file named "Sara's Tastes."

\C[5]★Miss Sara's Favorite Things (Sweets Edition)★

Strawberry jam (jam in general)
Mashed sweet potatoes w/ chestnuts  Koshian toast

\.\C[5]★Taste Notes★
Miss Sara eats well with a balanced diet.
She especially likes sweet things.
I'm happy to understand her just one bit more.
\C[3]It goes on and on like this.
\C[4](Maybe I'm a bit of a glutton...)
\C[4](Did Kai make this file himself...?)

Mashed sweet potatoes w/ chestnuts  Koshian toast

She especially likes sweet things.
I'm happy to understand her just one bit more.

\.\C[4](Now that I think about it, there always was
 something paste-like at the dinner table...)
10-1-message: \C[5]A file named "To Miss Sara."
\C[5]Hello, miss Sara. I am Kai.

\.\C[5]I am truly sorry you had to get involved
in such an incident as this.

\.\C[5]Miss Sara, if you are reading this,
there is something I want to tell you.

\.\C[5]I, Kai Satou, was an agent
belonging to a certain vile organization.
\C[5]In addition, I was raised as an assassin.

\.\C[5]However, I could not carry out the assassination orders
I was issued in my youth.
\.\C[5]I could not kill another human being.

\C[5]My father was disappointed in me...
and my standing in the organization was low.
\.\C[5]Then one day, I was appointed to a certain task.
\.\C[5]It was to guard and care for you from the shadows.

\.\C[5]I say this, but it was not a task
I held in high regard at first.

\.\C[5]Not until the plans for the Death Game
were beginning to approach a reality.
\.\C[5]I myself do not know the Death Game's objective.
\.\C[5]However, while this is merely my impression...

\.\C[5]Miss Sara, it is possible that
this is all revolving around you.

\.\C[5]Of course, I do also believe
that you are merely a victim, miss Sara.
\.\C[5]Still, the organization needs you.
\.\C[5]And they will take any means necessary.

\.\C[5]The organization's name is \C[2]ASU-NARO\C[5].

It is a secret organization possessing
superb technology in a multitude of fields.
\.\C[5]This Death Game is not for pleasure nor revenge.

\.\C[5]To the organization, it is an inevitable mission.
...That is what my father believed.

\.\C[5]The organization drove my father mad.
There may come a time you must confront him.
\.\C[5]At that time, please, defeat my father, Gashu.

\.\C[5]I have collected all the data
I've researched in the "Sara" folder.
If I am already dead, please make use of it.

\.\C[5]The password is your mother's name.
I hope it can be of some use.

\.\C[5]I pray you will not be swallowed up
by the whirlpool of deception and slaughter.
\.\C[5]Please survive, even if it must be you alone.
\C[5]Hello, miss Sara. I am Kai.

\.\C[5]I am truly sorry you had to get involved
in such an incident as this.
\C[4](This was written during the Death Game...?!)

\.\C[5]Miss Sara, if you are reading this,
there is something I want to tell you.

\.\C[5]I, Kai Satou, was an agent
belonging to a certain vile organization.
\C[5]In addition, I was raised as an assassin.
\.\C[4](An assassin?!)

\.\C[5]However, I could not carry out the assassination orders
I was issued in my youth.
\.\C[5]I could not kill another human being.

\C[5]My father was disappointed in me...
and my standing in the organization was low.
\.\C[5]Then one day, I was appointed to a certain task.
\.\C[5]It was to guard and care for you from the shadows.

\.\C[5]I say this, but it was not a task
I held in high regard at first.

\.\C[5]Not until the plans for the Death Game
were beginning to approach a reality.
\.\C[5]I myself do not know the Death Game's objective.
\.\C[5]However, while this is merely my impression...

\.\C[5]Miss Sara, it is possible that
this is all revolving around you.

\.\C[5]Of course, I do also believe
that you are merely a victim, miss Sara.
\.\C[5]Still, the organization needs you.
\.\C[5]And they will take any means necessary.

\.\C[5]The organization's name is \C[2]ASU-NARO\C[5].

It is a secret organization possessing
superb technology in a multitude of fields.
\."Asunaro...?!"
\."Y-You startled me... What's the matter?"
\."That's the same name as the orphanage I'm from!!"
\."...Settle down. Let's keep reading."
\.\C[5]This Death Game is not for pleasure nor revenge.

\.\C[5]To the organization, it is an inevitable mission.
...That is what my father believed.
"His father..."

\C[5]The organization drove my father mad.
There may come a time you must confront him.
\.\C[5]At that time, please, defeat my father, Gashu.

\C[5]I have collected all the data
I've researched in the "Sara" folder.
If I am already dead, please make use of it.

\.\C[5]The password is your mother's name.
I hope it can be of some use.

\.\C[5]I pray you will not be swallowed up
by the whirlpool of deception and slaughter.
\.\C[5]Please survive, even if it must be you alone.
\.\C[3]The message ends here.

\.\C[4](...Kai.
 We're all working together now...)

\."...Hey, Sou.
 Don'tcha think this clears Sara of suspicion?"

\."Weren't you on about that? Saying Sara, Kai, and Joe
 were the masterminds working together..."

\."Well... that was just a little tit for tat.
 I wasn't exactly calm at the time."
\."Sorry, miss Sara. I'm glad we could reconcile."
11-1-message: \C[5]A file named "Personal Thanks."
\C[5]Hello, this is Kai.

\.\C[5]Apologies, but this message has
absolutely nothing to do with the Death Game.

\.\C[5]Miss Sara, I wish to express
my personal gratitude as Kai Satou.
\.\C[5]I owe a great deal to the Chidouin family.

\.\C[5]Your father hired me as an assistant
to help out with his job and housework.

\.\C[5]Of course... this was also a job for the organization,
to keep watch of you.

\.\C[5]At first, I felt disgusted with your father,
who treated me as if I was family.

\.\C[5]I was trained as an agent from a young age.
I had never experienced anything such as "affection."
\.\C[5]I was afraid. Afraid that I might be changing.
\.\C[5]But over time, I came to want to protect your family.
\.\C[5]I wished to see you grow to maturity with my own eyes.
\.\C[5]For the first time, I had a reason to live.
\.\C[5]I'm truly glad I could meet the Chidouins.
\.\C[5]Thank you very much, miss Sara.

12-1-message:
\.\C[5]I was able to use an old ID to successfully access
a very small section of the organization's database.

\.\C[5]There, I discovered data pertaining to
\C[2]participants in the Death Game\C[5].

\C[5]Unfortunately, data on most of the participants
was protected in such a way I could not extract it.

\.\C[5]But there was one man in particular
for which that protection was removed.
\.\C[5]It appears his file was at one time deleted...
\.\C[5]But for some reason or another, it was restored.
\."Sorry, I... I gotta use the toilet..."
\.\C[5]I do not even know his name.

\.\C[5]However, there is only one reason the organization
would delete a file on someone.
\.\C[5]If he passed away before the Death Game...

\."I know... I know I've seen this guy!!
 Somewhere or another...!!"

\."Kanna thinks so, too...
 But she can't remember anything...!"
\."He's wearing the same scarf as Sou...!"

\."Kanna... thinks she must have met him...
 But she can't remember anything!!"
\."The man... the man that I killed...!!"
\."What're you talking about?!\! I mean, Sou's..."

\."Dammit!! Why...?!
 How could I forget what he looked like?!"
\."And... just who in the world is he?!"
\.\C[5]I could not solve the riddle concerning him.
\.\C[5]And there is one more curious aspect.

\.\C[5]There should have been 20 participants
in the Death Game...
\.\C[5]But there were not enough files for everyone.
\."Urgh...!! But this ain't the time for that!!"
\.\C[4](Someone who isn't present initiated a trade...!)
\."Yeah! You guys make sure ya check yours, too!"

\."G-Guys! The info on the laptop
 is more important than our cards right now!!"
\."I-I mean... We can't not look, right?!"
\.\C[3]Q-taro and the others started up their tablets.
\.\C[4](We'll just have to check our cards first, then...)
\.\C[3]The third trade has just been performed.
\.\C[3]And of all things, they pushed on me the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[3].
\.\C[10]"How's it feel to have my card?"

\.\C[10]"No worries. It's not like that card
 means you definitely die, y'know."
\.\C[3]I feel a touch on my shoulder...
\.\C[4](I need... I need to trade cards...!!)
\.\C[4](Right, I left the wallet in my bedroom!!)
\.\C[3]Not caring about anyone watching, I start running.

\.\C[4](What should I do?!
 I can't borrow from anyone!!)
\.\C[3]Not caring about anyone watching, I start running.

Check my role
Focus on the laptop

1-1-message: \.\sw[324]"Ah, if it isn't miss Sara and the others!"\sw[325]
\."Meowww?! It's the old guy's monitor, woof!!"

\."The professor's been brought back again!!
 To protect us...!!"

\.\sw[324]"Please trust me. You require a \C[2]map\C[0]
 of the facility, do you not?"\sw[325]
\."Maybe it'll show us the secret room!"
\."Maybe it'll show us the layout of the facility!"

\.\sw[324]"With the laptop miss Nao has brought,
 I can send over the data."\sw[325]
\."That's why big sis Nao took the laptop...!"
\."Why did you make her steal it...?!"

\."I wouldn't think Laizer's chip
 has anything to do with all this..."

\.\sw[324]"...I can analyze it as well.
 I just thought I would do both at once..."\sw[325]

\."Sara!
 Please don't be suspicious of the professor, okay?!"

\.\sw[324]"Now, connect it quickly.
 There's no time."\sw[325]

\."Big sis Sara!!
 This sounds a little too good to be true, meow!!"
\."It kinda... doesn't feel like the real old guy, woof!"

\."I won't forgive you
 for doubting the professor's generosity!!"

\.\sw[324]"Come, miss Nao.
 Miss Sara and her friends are tired."\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]\C[10]"This laptop... this chip...
 They were major nuisances for the Death Game."\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]\C[10]"But now, Master Gashu can rest easy."\sw[325]
"Nao! Give us the laptop and chip...!!"
\.\sw[324]\C[10]"It's too late. Both are already connected to me."\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]\C[10]"I will destroy all the data on them.
 You'll never so much as dream of escape again...!"\sw[325]
\.\sp[15]\sw[324]\C[10]"Don't run from the Main Game, filthy humans..."\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]"Nao...! What did you do?! This is...!!"\sw[325]

\."Don't you dare say my name
 with the professor's voice and face!!"
\.\sw[324]"Don't tell me... From the very beginning...?!"\sw[325]

"Did you think my bond
 with the professor was that flimsy?!"

"Hey, miss Sara.
 Do you remember a mysterious program on the laptop?"

"Ahaha. Well, there was one.
 With the filename "BACKDOOR.SMUT"..."
\."Well... That was a last resort Kai prepared."

\."A file named BACKDOOR...
 that was really a \C[2]hacking program\C[0],
 used to get data from the organization."
"Ahaha. You're the one who's getting deleted."
"Oh, really. Did you legs give out?"

\."I'm going to get straight to analyzing now,
 so you do your part."

\."Gather everyone in the lobby.
 I'm counting on you."

\.\C[3]Paying no mind to me struggling to keep up,
Sou began fiddling with the laptop.

I can stand by myself

2-12-message: "Don't really get a scent from the monitor, woof."
4-1-message:
\."Did you figure out the whole thing...?!
 Amazing!!"
\.\C[4](Well, there are parts I don't get...)

\."When the trading phase began and we were given
 our role cards... the fake appeared on this monitor."

\."I believed it only at first.
 That the professor had been revived..."
\."But I quickly came to my senses."

\."The fake ordered me to
 collect the laptop and Ranger's chip."

\."And he said to do it alone,
 without discussing it with anyone..."
\."When did you team up with Sou?"

\."Just a while ago...
 Before I saw you in the Medical Office."
\."Everything just followed from there, I suppose."

\."Y-You've figured it out with
 just that part of the explanation?!"
\."Err... I'll explain it in full just in case."

\."At first, I immediately thought of
 discussing it with you, Sara."

\."But I thought the fake
 might have anticipated that, too."

\."If they found out I was wary,
 I was sure the fake would disappear..."

\."So I thought, I had to extract
 as much info from it as I could...!"
\."And so you talked with the loner, woof?!"

\."Right! The fake wouldn't expect me
 to discuss it with the l... with Sou."

\."And continuing to act like I was fooled,
 we sent the fake the hacking whatzit!"
\.\C[4](To think Nao was capable of that...)
\."The best way to get the fake to believe me..."
\."Was to antagonize you in front of him, Sara."

\."And that was all the loner's plan too, woof?
 Amazing, meow!"
\."T-That's true. I guess I'm a gloomy sort myself..."
\."No, big sis Nao's the chipper type, meow!"
\.\C[4](But getting help from Sou, of all people...)
\."Sou mentioned... a plan for escape, didn't he?"
\."Please, trust Sou, and bring everyone to the lobby!"

The rest followed from there

2-1-message: "Hey! Gashu! I have the right to an explanation!"
"Kinda feels like this won't be a normal Main Game..."
\."Transgression? I'm afraid I don't know what you mean."
\."Don't tell me it's about the wallet...!"

\.\C[4](Huh...?
 That reaction seems to indicate it's not...)

\."Understand that if there truly is a transgression,
 it should become clear in your discussion."
\."Supposing one is discovered, it will be addressed."

\."Yeah right, jackass! It's you who's gonna decide
 what counts as a transgression, isn't it?!"

\."Don't mock us, would you?!
 You're the one deciding what counts as one, surely?!"

"At least call Miley!
 So she can hand down a judgement on any misconduct!"

\."...Miley is the Floor Master for floors 1 and 2.
 I cannot do that."

"At least call Safalin!
 So she can hand down a judgement on any misconduct!"
\."Very well, if that will satisfy you."

\."Such determination to have a fair slaughter,
 without having to worry over misconduct...!"
\."Now then, let the second Main Game..."
\."D... Dammit!! So it's starting after all...?!"
\."Now, we shall begin the second Main Game."

2-1-message: \C[3]An extremely heavy air dominates the space.
\."...Keeping quiet's only making time pass, guys."
\."Let's at least decide our fate by our own hand, okay?"
\."It's okay. We've walked this road before, haven't we?"

\."We're allies by now!!
 We've spent way more time together...!!"

\."Let's find our resolve.
 You said that in the first Main Game, right, Q-taro?"

\."Everyone, the \C[2]card designs\C[0] have been
 displayed in the rulebook this time."

\."So be aware that you cannot judge using knowledge
 of the designs as in the first Main Game."

\."Well then. Please spend this cruel and dense time
 to your heart's content."
\C[3]Gashu quietly sat down in a chair.
\.\C[3]And... once again... the Main Game began.
3-1-message: \.\C[3]I can feel my strained nerves loosening.

\."It's just like I said.
 I'm not the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0], I'm a \C[5]Commoner\C[0]."
\."Four will advance to the final vote."

\.\C[4](You can't want to have a conversation
 when you feel like this...)
\.\C[4](Like Keiji did for me in the first Main Game...!)
\."Are you all going to give up here?!"
\."We've always done when we had to do...!"
\."No matter how cruel it is, you can't stop!!"

\."Even if someone is the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0]...
 We move in the same direction!"
\."We talk, and we advance the discussion!!"
\."Guess those of us who weren't picked should start!"

\."All right...! First, it's time for those of us
 who weren't picked to guide the discussion!"

\."Incidentally, I am a \C[5]Commoner\C[0]...
 Be at ease..."

\."Muscle gorilla! It's not the time to shrivel up, meow!
 Let's remember the card trades in order, woof!"
\."Now, please grasp your fate with your own hands."

\."Now, we're gonna proceed along
 digging into the details of the \C[2]trades\C[0]!!"

\."Now we will have an in-depth discussion
 on the \C[2]card trades\C[0]!! Understood?!"
\.\C[3]Gashu quietly sat in the chair again.

"There were four trades made in total!
 That ain't that many!"

"By the way, I've been a Commoner the whole way, woof!
 Didn't get traded with even once, meow!"

"Trading cards required 50 tokens!
 So only so many people could make trades!"

"Trading cards requires 50 tokens.
 It's not as if just anyone could do it."

Give a pep talk
Question them
3-5-message: Please choose who to vote for.
4-2-message: "Kanna! Are you fine with him just saying that?"\.\.

"Come on, Kanna! Um... hmm...
\! What should I say...? Get mad? Err..."

\."...Could you not get in the way
 of the discussion, miss Sara?"
\.\C[4](No good! I couldn't find the words...!)
4-4-message: "Be as silent as you want, it's no use..."\.\.
"Please say something... Q-taro...!!"
\.\C[4](No good! I couldn't find the words...!)
4-6-message: "Sou!! This is the moment to reveal your true self!!"\.\.

\C[4](I can feel his heart trembling!
 I should just be a step away...!)
6-1-message:
\C[3]The discussion is stuck in equilibrium,
failing to come to an agreement...!
"How about I hear the truth from your mouth?"

\C[4](Between the statements these two give, I should either
 \C[6]affirm correct ones\C[4] or \C[10]deny incorrect ones\C[4]...!)
7-1-message:
\.\C[4](Ack...! I can't upset the balance!
 Let's start over!)
8-1-message: "I didn't want to fight you, Sara, but... well."

\.\C[4](Can't let him mislead me...!
 I'll \C[2]choose words I can refute\C[4] and talk back!!)
\."Let's discuss the \C[2]victim video\C[0] Nao saw, how about?"
8-11-message: \."I give up... I can't beat you, Sara."
\."Please... tell us everything, Keiji."
\."The video... is real."
\."The victim video that Nao saw..."
\."And it... was also my First Trial..."
\."The woman's name... was Megumi Sasahara."
\."She was my boss ever since I joined the force."

\."I'm Keiji Shinogi. I've been assigned here
 starting this week. It's good to meet you."

\."Good to meet you too. I'm Megumi Sasahara.
 ...I suppose this makes me your trainer."

\."Well, well...
 Pretty impressive for your age, Shinogi."
"Y-Yes, ma'am."

\."...But you might be a bit too serious.
 Even if you have stamina, you have to think about
 how to spend it, or it won't last."
\."Um... I heard you were rather elite, Miss Megumi."

\."Why would you, err...
 serve as a trainer for the likes of me?"
\."Heehee... I wonder, indeed."
\."...I have high hopes for you."
\."But... then came the day of my nightmares..."
\."I... shot a person."
\."The criminal in a certain case..."
\."Miss Megumi..."
\."Why am I... not being punished...?!"
\."I've killed a person...!!"
\."...In self-defense, yes."
\."But... the criminal wasn't even holding a weapon!!"

\."...That's just what the law says.
 You've done nothing wrong."
\."Miss Megumi... I heard you made a backroom deal...!"
\."...So what?"
\."...Get back to your duty. You're police."
\."Wahaha... She's the benefactor who protected me."

\."I'll never forget it.
 I owed her the worst kind of debt..."
\.\sp[15]"Left her to die...?"
\.\sp[15]"But... I killed her... Megumi..."
\."Mr. Policeman...! Get a hold of yourself, meow!!"
\."...Sorry for keeping quiet, everyone."

\."Truth is, your friendly policeman's
 not a policeman anymore."
"Whew... Still find Mr. Policeman suspicious?"
\.\C[4](Urgh! He danced around it too well...!!)

\."Miss Sara... Don't tell me you went easy on him
 because it was Keiji?"
\."Of course not...!!"

\."Our lives are at stake in this discussion...
 If you can't be serious, you've got no value."
\.\C[10]"Will you die, Sara?"
\."...Quit it, Sou."

\."Then talk. If you don't say something,
 miss Sara might be the one dying."
\."...Alright, fine."
\."The video... is real."
\."Mr. Policeman...?!"
\."The victim video that Nao saw..."
\."And it... was also my First Trial..."
\."The woman's name... was Megumi Sasahara."
\."She was my boss."
\."You knew each other?!"
\."You knew each other?!"
\."She's a benefactor I owed quite a bit at work."
\.\C[4](Benefactor...?)

\."I'll never forget it.
 I owed her the worst kind of debt..."
\."M-Mr. Policeman...?"
\.\sp[15]"Left her to die...?"
\.\sp[15]"But... I killed her... Megumi..."
\."Mr. Policeman...! Get a hold of yourself, meow!!"
\."...Sorry for keeping quiet, everyone."

\."Truth is, your friendly policeman's
 not a policeman anymore."
\.\C[4](Keiji... How deep does your darkness go...?)

\.\C[4](\C[2]If I'd won that argument\C[4]...
 Maybe I could have heard more...)

\."I'm surprised. What a dangerous individual
 we've had lurking in our midst."
\."...If you vote for me, I won't complain."
\."Umm... Everyone..."

\."Speaking of voting,
 I think it's about time to decide..."

\."Who you'll vote for, and which four
 should enter the final vote..."
\."...Meowww?!"

\."H-Hold up!
 Don't we need one more person, though?!"

\."Troubling, huh? If it's down to three options,

\."We gotta suspect someone again, woof?
 *sniffle*..."

\."Then... maybe it's better to think of
 \C[2]who to leave out\C[0] from the final vote, meow..."
\."Who to leave out...?"
\."That's a good idea, Gin."
\."R-Really, woof?"

\."If you aren't chosen in the preliminary vote,
 and are \C[2]dropped out\C[0]..."

\."Because you can no longer be chosen,
 \C[2]there's no need to lie anymore\C[0]!!"

\."We can't run away, Gin!
 We just have to suspect each other!!"
\."Myaaah..."
\."U-Um, Sara!"
\."I think it's a good plan, actually...!"

\."Indeed, that could be our greatest ally...!"

1-1-message:
\.\C[3]This is a waiting room
for until the next episode is released.

\.\C[3]Well then...
Thank you very much for staying with it this far.

\.\C[3]Further down on the page is the official home page
with the latest information, so please take a look!

(A Your Turn To Die manga is also available!)
\.\C[3]Alice's body has been completely cleaned up.
\.\C[3]Reko's body has been completely cleaned up.
\."Of course... I also carefully transported the bodies."

\."Toying with us using nonsense like
 tokens and Clear Chips..."
\."And once we grasp hope, you take it away and kill us."

\."How must you feel about it...
 to be able to do things like this...?"

\."When we die, do you even collect
 all the tokens we earned? Haha..."

\."Did you lose your wallet?
 I haven't seen it anywhere..."
\."All of them, temporarily, for a certain plan..."
\."I planned to take them back, assuming survival..."

\."And we didn't hear anything about
 the dead's tokens being forfeit."
\."Sorry... I'm busy, so if you'll excuse me..."

\.\C[4](That's impossible...!
 Alice was one of the high-placers for tokens!!)

\.\C[4](That's impossible...!
 Reko should have had her own tokens, right?!)
\.\C[4](Urgh... Did someone do this to trap me...?)

\."Yeah... I can't muster the energy
 to think about anything anymore...."

\.\C[10]"In the end, I guess you weren't
 seriously thinking you could escape either, huh?"

\.\C[10]"Just the hunch I got. You find hope for
 everyone else... 'cause those without hope die.
 Is that how you thought?"
\."Yeah... I never thought I would die myself."
\.\C[10]"Pretty conceited in the end, weren't you?"
\."I was the one who needed hope."

\."As long as I'm looking forward...
 I can look away from the reality of killing you."

\."But the future waiting once I return...
 I can only imagine it as pitch black."

\.\C[10]"What the hell, Sara.
 You wanted to die that bad?"
\."Maybe so... Somewhere in my heart, I..."
\."Joe... Finally, I won't have to run from you anymore."
"Big sis Sara!! Stay with us, meow!!"

\."Big bro Joe isn't here, meow!!
 Don't give any attention to anything weird, woof!!"
\."So I can cheer big sis Sara up, obviously!!!!"

\."Believe in the real Joe!!
 Please, big sis Sara...!!"

\."You're not the only one
 who couldn't do anything, meow...!"

\."And yet... big bro Joe
 put on a smile to the end, meow..."

\."And everybody else who died...
 They were thinking of the ones who'd be left
 'til the very end, woof!!"

\."So I'm sure what he really wants
 is for everyone to get home alive!!"

\."You have to believe in the real Joe,
 big sis Sara...!!"
\.\C[4](I feel like... I've lost sight of him already...)
\.\C[4](That guy who was always by my side...)
\C[4](Do I have the courage to face him head-on...?)
1-1-choice:
Give up on the tokens
Trick Safalin
4-2-message: \C[10]No way you can forget me, Sara.
\C[10]You're already broken.
"Stay with us! Big sis Sara!!"
\."Big sis Sara...!!"
4-3-message: \.\C[10]"It's impossible to get rid of me for good."
\."I won't let anyone else's lives be lost."
\."I won't let the kidnappers have their way!"

2-3-message: \."Meow! It smells really sweet near her head, woof!"

\."Eheheh... It's actually as delicious as it looks.
 Would you like to have a bite?"

"I believe this machine to be
 one way of achieving happiness."
\."No matter what you think of it..."
3-1-message:
\."Sometimes... it's better to forget memories
 that are simply too painful."
\."And in reality, the human brain is made to do so."

\."All of you are too strong...
 So you can't erase your own memories."
\."And so... You wanna erase them yourself...?!"

\."Those fun memories as brother and sister...
 Those will remain, and you can just forget
 the bad memories."
\."I am the only one who can cure you..."
\."I don't have too many memories with him..."

\."If I lost the bad memories...
 there'd hardly be anything left."
\."So... I don't wanna forget even a shred..."
\."What were you doing in the dark here?"

\."I'll be in the lobby, Sara.
 Talk to me if you need me."

\."Sometimes... it's better to forget memories
 that are simply too painful."
\."And in reality, the human brain is made to do so."

\."All of you are too strong...
 So you can't erase your own memories."
\."So with this machine, you really can erase them."

\."Those fun memories as brother and sister...
 Those will remain, and you can just forget
 the bad memories."
\."I am the only one who can cure you..."
\."Make it quick. Before I change my mind..."

\."I see...!! What a good feeling!
 My head is clear...!"

\."Ahh, Sara Chidouin.
 How long have you been there?"

\."Well, yes... Mwahaha... I should have asked to earlier
 if I'd known I'd feel so refreshed."

\."Is that okay, meow...? Even your bad memories...
 were memories with big sis Reko..."

\."Hmph...?
 I've more memories than I know what to do with."
\."Is it okay to just forget Reko...?"

\."Hmph... What are you saying?
 Reko is my dear sister. I wouldn't forget her."

\."It's unfortunate she had to die...\!
 But Reko will surely live on in my heart."

\."Being able to say a thing like that
 all casually... It's not right, woof..."

\."Gin... Please, don't.
 If all you have is burdens, that isn't life..."
\."I can't say... Alice did anything wrong."

\."Indeed. Don't hamper my invigorated mood.
 ...I think I'll go rest in the lobby."

So you wouldn't use the machine
What were you doing in the dark?

So you used the machine
Is it okay to forget Reko?
