1-1-message: \.\C[3]Just as Keiji reached out his hand...

\."It's just a powerless doll.
 Not moving an inch."
\."Did Sue Miley, the Laughing Doll, break down...?"
\."This is the Miley we first met."
\."Did Miley run out of power and stop moving...?"
\."This is the Miley we first met."

\."She called herself the Laughing Doll, Sue Miley...
 But she must be human."
\."...Think back on what's happened so far."

\."\C[2]Dolls don't bleed\C[0]...
 The doll Ranger proved this fact with his own body."
\."When Miley was struck by Kai, she was \C[2]bleeding\C[0]."
\."That's why... I figured Miley was probably human..."

\."Wahaha... Great memory, Sara.
 You're exactly right."
\."This doll is probably the Miley we first met."

\."Our first mission was to search for
 the scattered parts of Miley's body, wasn't it?"

\."Come to think of it...
 We searched for the parts, then assembled her."

\.\C[4](And after a white gas filled the room...
 Miley suddenly started to move.)

\.\C[4](That's right, the room that filled with gas
 is connected to this room by the ventilation...!)
\."That's when the human Miley swapped herself in."
\.\C[4](So the real Miley is separate from this doll...!)
\."If you retrace your memories, you should realize it."

\."\C[2]Dolls don't bleed\C[0]...
 Ranger, the doll, proved this fact with his body."
\."All starting to line up, isn't it?"
\."Bet this room still hides some interesting truths."
\.\C[4](I wonder if Miley is still on this floor somewhere...)
1-1-choice:
Miley broke down?
She's out of power?
She's not the real one?
2-1-message: \."I didn't know!! I didn't know anything!!"

\."You're listening there, aren't you?!
 Help meeeee...!!"

\."What's going on over there?!
 Can you hear us?"

\."Hey! Say something back!!
 I won't tell anyone...!! I promise!!"

\."I've got no qualms!!
 I just want to live in peace...!!"
\."Were we all gathered for her sake...?"

\."All you organization members...
 And Sara Chidouin..."

\."...This is probably footage of
 a person who died in the First Trial..."

\."I don't know this person!!
 I've never seen his face...!!"

\."I have no idea what's going on...!!
 This... this video...!!"

\."You might just have an intimate connection
 to this Death Game."

\.\C[3]It's no use.
The more I say... the more suspicious I look.

\."Are you going to be our goddess of victory...
 or our angel of death?"
\."Doesn't sound too bad to bet my life on that."
\."Hm? That's been my plan for a while now."
\."...Can I trust my life to you, Sara?"
"I understand. I'll take your life in my hands, Keiji."
\."What if I am an angel of death...?"
\."Wahaha... Well, now I won't be lonely."
\."Okay, let's search around a little more."
\.\C[3]I've... always been a bit suspicious of him.
\.\C[3]Keiji never wants to talk about himself.

\.\C[3]There must be a past he can't talk about.
A truth he can't say.

I don't know this person
I have no idea what's going on
I'm innocent

I understand
That's a heavy burden

Fine by me
I don't intend to die
2-2-message: \.\C[4](I'll put in the disk from the drawer.)

\."This video's pretty long.
 We should probably skip to the important parts."
\."You could see things you don't like."

\.\C[4](That's true...
 What if some distrustful act got recorded...?)
\."You didn't do anything suspect, did you, Keiji?"
\.\C[3]Keiji began to play the rest of the video.
\.\C[3]Our actions up to this point played back.
\.\C[3]A recording from when we were all still alive.
\.\C[3]We skipped through, checking for anything suspect.

\.\C[4](It's one of the role cards
 used in the first Main Game!)

\."To think Q-taro was the one who
 \C[2]set the role cards in place\C[0]..."
\."We had a discussion like this before, remember?"
\."What do you mean...?! I mean, as I recall..."
\."The one who set up the cards should have been Sou!"

\."Sou executed a strategy in the bar
 so he could use Kanna!"

\."And traded her a \C[4]Commoner\C[0] card!
 To put her in his debt!"
\."And then Sou had Joe pick up that \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] card...!"
\."All of it... was a trap laid by Sou, I thought!"

\."But from what we can see in this video...
 It's Q-taro who placed the cards first."
\."Sou just saw him and adopted it, that's all."
\.\C[3]While trying to sort my head out, I pushed play.

\.\C[3]Sure enough, Q-taro was shown again and again,
secretly placing cards.
\.\C[3]And Sou picked up a few of those cards...
\.\C[3]And indeed, made a trade with Kanna.\.

\.\C[3]Keeping my hazy feelings in check,
I let the remaining bit of video play.
\."Are Joe and Kai talking about something?"

\."Such enigmatic faces...
 Just what were those two talking one-on-one about?"
\.\C[4](Joe never told me about anything like this...!)
\.\C[4](Ugh! If we could just hear their voices...!)
\."Hmm... That's everything of note in the footage."
\."Sure took up some time. We should leave here soon."

\."We made some findings...
 Now we search for Gin and work toward escape."
2-2-choice:
I believe in everyone
I'm prepared
Will YOU be okay, Keiji?

Think back on earlier
What do you mean?
2-3-message:
\."Sure, my life was pretty boring,
 and I didn't care about the future..."
\."Ain't it strange...? It doesn't hurt at all..."

\."When I'm bleeding this much from my gut?
 Why doesn't it hurt..."
\.\C[4](It's as if... he fell asleep at the end...)

\.\C[3]He was probably a high-schooler.
A human... about the same age as me.
\.\C[4](Maybe... he was one of the happy ones...)
\.\C[3]I just felt a tinge of envy, that's all.

\.\C[3]Being able to die without having to
experience those things is happy.

\."Whyyy...!!
 Why does this have to happennn...?!"
\."How could I possibly know which one's right?!"
\."I can't do ittt!! I can't fire these things!!"
\.\C[4](Urgh!! Is this from the First Trial, too...?!)

\.\C[4](It's just too cruel...!!
 How could you think up such a thing?!)
\.\C[3]From demons who make us do things like this...?
2-3-choice:
Victim E Disk
Victim F Disk
Cancel
3-2-message: \.\C[3]There are computer disks in the drawer.
\.\C[4](What are these? I'm not really sure...)
\.\C[4](Hm? This one has a label on it...)
"Well now... We might've been getting filmed."

\."It's not so strange... There's too many of us
 for just the Floor Masters to watch over."
\.\C[4](When you think about it, maybe so, but...)
"I wonder if there was an observer in this room..."

\."...Don't see many traces of
 there being multiple people here."

"I never saw any security cameras
 in all my searching so far..."

\."Could be hidden cameras.
 ...They probably didn't want 'em getting destroyed."
\."We can probably view the footage on that computer."
3-2-choice:
Was someone here watching?
I'm curious about the footage
There were cameras?
3-3-message: \.\C[3]The contents of the drawer are a mess.
4-2-message: \C[3]The door is shut fast.

\.\C[4](There's no handle...
 It probably can't be opened manually.)
5-1-message: \C[3]It seems to be a thick glass window.
5-2-message:
\C[3]Behind the thick glass, I can see a figure
that appears to be sleeping.
\."Keiji! There's a person...!"
\."Hmm... Not showing any signs of movement."
\.\C[4](Do they not notice us...?)

\."Can't imagine there'd be a new
 surviving participant at this point..."

\.\C[4](If they're an enemy...
 We'd better not let them realize we're here!)

\."Well, doesn't seem to be any way
 of getting to the other side anyhow."
\."Let's leave quietly once we're done searching..."

1-1-message: \."I don't... even have the energy to move."

\."If I'd known about this...
 I wouldn't even want to see hope..."
\C[4](I can't find the words right now...)
2-1-message: \C[3]Within the passage is an endless flight of stairs.
\.\C[3]Hurried yet careful, we advance step by step.
\.\C[3]Along the way, we notice doors on the sides.
\.\C[3]Lots of them, spaced some distance apart.
"I suppose these connect to the other floors..."

\."These are probably the victory stairs
 that only the survivors are allowed to climb..."

\."It must be built so that they can access these stairs
 no matter when the Death Game concludes."

\."Wahaha... Hearing that makes me hope,
 whether or not I want to."
\.\C[3]If there really is an exit like Sou says...

\."Even once we go home...
 Will you still see me, meow?"
\."But... I'm sure it'll make you remember..."
\."Yet... I'm sure when you meet, you'll remember..."
\."You want... to forget it all, woof...?"
\."There's no way... I could forget, meow."

\."The things we lost... the despair put in us...
 There's a lot that won't go back to normal..."

\."Peace... Our normal lives...
 That's real victory."
\."If we meet... I'm sure we'll remember them..."
\."It's better if we forget everything here..."

\."Just having those bad memories...
 and not being able to see all of you anymore...?"
\."I don't want that one bit, woof!!"

\."There's no way I can forget, meow...\!
 I don't want to... woof..."

\."These memories won't go away anyhow.
 Nuts to living in despair forever, I say."
\."Real victory for us isn't just getting home alive."

\."It's getting back the peace we should've had...
 Returning to life as usual... Isn't it?"
\."...Why don't we get back that peace together?"
\."Let's get it back together. Our peace..."

\."When you go back to life as usual...
 What will you do?"
\.\C[3]What did I want to do when I got out of here?

\."I wanna play video games at home, meow!
 Big sis Sara should come too, woof!"

\."First, well... I wanna hold one hell of a concert!
 My band's gotta be dying for me to come back."
\."Oh! Um...! Can I come see it too?!"

\."Well, duh!
 I'll show you some amazing stuff, Gin, Kanna!"
\."That's not fair! I want to see it too!!"
\."Hmm? Might have to think about that..."

\."Huh?!
 Why are you suddenly being mean about it?!"
\."Oh! That's great! Kanna wants to come with you!"

\."...Hey, detective.
 Shouldn't you go along with them?"
\."Really?! Let's all go watch something together!"
\."Meow? Do you not have anything, Mr. Policeman?"

"Then first, maybe you should look for
 something that feels worth doing..."
\."Maybe I'll think about a reason for living..."
\."I'd be glad to assist, if that's okay."

\."...Ahh, taking it literally, I see.
 Thanks, Sara."

"If you don't have anything to do,
 keep an eye on your health."
\."Urk... Yeah, sure... Maybe I'll eat more veggies."

\."That's good! Maybe you'll find something
 that makes you look sharper, and does away with
 those bags under your eyes."

"Since you're being set free and all,
 you should satisfy your desires."
\."Then maybe I'll go eat some meat..."

\."Sad, isn't it?
 Be a grown-up who dreams big, Gin."
\."According to the floor map, this is..."
2-1-choice:
Of course
It's better we don't

Let's find something worthwhile
Focus on health, maybe?
You should satisfy your desires
2-3-message: \."For what? To find a way to escape, meow!"
\."Well... Though I didn't find an exit or anything..."
\."But I found a smartphone on the stairs, meow."
\.\C[4](There wasn't anything like that when we came up...)
\.\C[4](What in the world is this trade...?!)
\."...You just had a scary smile, meow..."
\."More importantly, Gin, about the phone you found..."
\.\C[3]The moment I felt that, my senses cut out.
"H-Hey! Ain't there some way we can save him?!"

"Hrmm... With so much bleeding,
 I fear nothing can be done..."
\.\C[4](Did I just have... some kind of dream?)

1-1-message: \."Reko... you really were kind... such a good kid..."
\.\C[3]Just like... I lost my best friend.
\.\C[3]She was a trustworthy ally to me, too.

\."...I know how you feel.
 But the Main Game's going to start again...!"

\."They're giving an explanation...!
 Please, come to the Medical Office!"

\."It shouldn't matter to you
 if anything unfavorable happens to us."
\."In the Main Game, everyone is an enemy..."

\."Again, at least two people will die!
 It might be you and me next...!"

\."But I don't think giving up on living,
 and thinking, is the right thing to do...!"

\."If we diligently think about it...
 I'm sure... I'm sure there's a path!!"
\."I've long since passed up such a thing..."

\."Because I thought someday...
 my parents, or Reko, would repay me..."
\."Hey now, Nao Egokoro... What are you...?!"
\.\C[3]Nao removed the gloves from Reko's body.

\."There's surely someone else waiting...
 who treasures Reko as much as us..."
\."Alice... Please, you take one of these too."

\."...I'm going.
 I need to move forward...!"
\."Sara Chidouin... I will tell you this..."
\."The name of the man I killed...\! was \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0]."\.
\."I don't care about Sou Hiyori at this point..."
\.\sp[15]"Who I really need to kill is..."
\.\C[3]Revenge against our enemy who plotted the Death Game.

\.\C[3]Anger and hate...
Those made the only path that would move Alice now.
\.\C[4](The Main Game... I won't let it happen!!)

Take the hairclip
Cancel

1-1-message: \C[3]Sou is fiddling with a computer set up in the room.
"Yeah... No doubt about it, it's Gashu's room."

\."I'm using Ranger's chip right now
 to neutralize the security."

\."It's got a lot of important data
 that could probably be misused."

\."Almost makes me think Ranger was
 intended to inherit all that data."
\."Was he going to be a successor or something...?"
\."I wonder if he was... a stand-in for a son..."

\."I'm sure it's just a backup...
 They'd use it if something happened to Gashu."

\."The hacking is still going to take some time.
 Could you keep an eye out below for anyone coming?"
\."Big sis Sara, you watch the loner, woof!"

What are you doing?
Is this the secret room?

In place of a son?
It's just a backup
That doesn't matter
1-2-message: \C[3]Sou is fiddling with a computer set up in the room.
1-3-message: \C[3]Sou is fiddling with a computer set up in the room.
\."I did it, I did it! It went great, miss Sara!!"
\."I'm in the depths of their security now!"
\."Ahaha. Don't celebrate just yet, miss Sara."
\."...Quit it with the weird chipperness, miss Sara."
\.\C[4](Even though you went along with it...)
\."Things are going to get a little difficult from here."

\.\C[3]Sou stooped over further
and began to work on the computer.
\."Miss Sara, could you help me out?"
\."See the four monitors in this room?"

\."There's going to be red error screens
 appearing on them."
\."When you see one, tell me right away so I can fix it!"
1-3-choice:
You did it!
High five!
You sure are energetic
1-4-message: \C[3]Sou is fiddling with a computer set up in the room.

"Are you ready? When a red error screen appears,
 tell me what monitor it's on."
"Be quick, miss Sara...!"
"Okay! Leave this to me!"
1-6-message:
\C[3]I'm looking at the computer screen,
but I can't sense any particular change.
\.\C[4](Did he really hack in with this...?)
3-1-message: \.\C[5]Quite some time has passed since then.

\.\C[5]But even now, those hellish memories
are scorched into the back of my mind.
\.\C[5]In the first trial, I killed a person.

\.\C[5]I would never trust others.
That was what I decided.

\.\C[5]In the Russian Roulette that followed, too,
I didn't participate.

\.\C[4](This is describing the same things
 we had to go through...!!)

\.\C[5]At the end of their argument,
the challenger chosen was someone most surprising.

\.\C[5]With overwhelming charisma,
she had a talent for getting people in order.

\.\C[5]And in the first \C[2]victim conference\C[5],
she was a central figure as well.
\.\C[5]But there, she lost her best friend.

\.\C[5]A boy even younger than her,
and the man whose views most aligned with hers.
These two...
\.\C[5]Seeing her so exhausted, I felt pity.
\.\C[5]For the first time, I spoke my true feelings.

\.\C[5]By the time we were done talking,
I had acquired an admiration for her.

\.\C[5]To the point that I would be fine
with even my own death as long as she won it all.
\.\C[5]It was the first time I'd shed tears for a stranger.
\.\C[5]Even now, I see hallucinations of her.
\.\C[5]As many women as I try to love, I'm never satisfied.
\.\C[4](What in the world is this book...?)

4-1-message:
\C[5]■Floor Masters, let's carry out
  the Death Game with pride!

\.\C[5][1] For trials that require explanation,
    give one to the participants in advance!
\.\C[5][2] Floor Masters must not directly kill participants!

\.\C[5][3] Floor Masters cannot lie
    with the intent of deceiving participants!

\.\C[5][4] If there is misconduct during the Main Game,
    it either proceeds with the transgressor's death,
    or \C[2]must be retried 24 hours later\C[5]!

\.\C[4](Misconduct during the Main Game...?
 This is the first I've heard of that.)

\.\C[4](If a participant transgresses, they die as penalty...
 And if a Floor Master does, it's a 24-hour extension?)
\.\C[4](That seems to be how you'd interpret it.)

15-2-message: "Are you not taking your mischief a bit far?"
\."As Floor Master, I cannot overlook this act."
\."It is truly unfortunate... but I must take action."
\C[3]A white gas floods into the room.
15-3-message:
\."You probably can't tell at a glance...
 But things are getting really outrageous."

\."Hahaha... Let's save the celebration for later.
 Let's go, Sara!"

1-1-message:
\."You can't!!
 Even after you got your collar off...?!"

\."You said you wouldn't let the kidnappers
 do what they wanted, right?!"
\.\C[3]I keep shaking him, but he isn't moving a muscle.
\.\C[4](Whatever I do, as much as I struggle...)
\.\C[3]I hear a noise from the monitor.

\.\C[4](No, that doesn't matter...
 I don't want to think anymore...)

\.\C[4](Nothing is going to change now.
 My actions can't affect anything...)

\.\C[3]Looking closely at the keyboard by his hands,
there were bloodstains from him using it.
\.\C[3]Is this some kind of joke again...?
\.\C[3]The face of my best friend, who I always saw at school.

\."Is that... Sara?
 What's goin' on with me...?"

\.\C[3]It's another hallucination.
I've finally broken down.
\.\C[3]Because there shouldn't be an AI of Joe...
\.\C[3]But that doesn't matter to me right now.
\."Even though you were my best friend...!!"
\."I vowed to everyone that we would escape together..."

\."Professor Mishima, and Kai, and Alice,
 and Nao, and Sou...!!"

\."Professor Mishima, and Kai, and Reko,
 and Nao, and Sou...!!"
\."I can't protect anyone!! I can't save anyone!!"

\."We were hanging out all the time
 before we even knew it, huh?"

\."Having stupid talks on summer break, buying junk food
 after school, getting Ryoko laughing at us..."

\."And when my grades tanked, you were the one
 freaking out, Sara! Never asked to go studying."

\."Oh, and I remember all those
 dumb requests you made me sing at karaoke!
 I sang with all I had, so you were cracking up!"

\."And when bad stuff happened and it wasn't fun,
 you were there talking to me."
\."I feel nothin' but gratitude for ya."

\."I dunno about all this betrayal or dyin'...
 Don't have any memory of that part..."
\."You'll always make choices I can trust, Sara."
\."Were you thinking I hated you or something?"

\."Don't put me down, Sara!
 I'm not that self-righteous a guy!"

\."Well,\. it's hard for a guy and a girl
 to say this sorta stuff to each other,\. but..."

\."...I love ya, Sara.
\! You're my best friend!"
\."...I always wanted to say that, too."
\."Please, always watch me from close by...!"
\."We aren't going to kill each other anymore."
\."They won't make us do that ever again...!"
\."I'm going to end the Death Game...!!"
\."I'm on board. No matter how tricky our opponent..."

\."Yeah, that's right!!
 I'll avenge Nao and Alice...!!"
\."I... don't want anyone to die either!!"
\."I'll make them learn Sou's regret, meow!!"
To be continued in the Final Chapter\.\.

2-1-message: \.\C[3]Is this some kind of joke again...?
\.\C[3]The face of my best friend, who I always saw at school.

\.\C[3]It's another hallucination.
I've finally broken down.
\.\C[3]Because there shouldn't be an AI of Joe...
\.\C[3]But that doesn't matter to me right now.
\.\sw[934]"Yep. So, looks like you've been well!"\sw[935]
\.\C[3]This was a hallucination... a false Joe I created.
\.\C[10]\sw[934]"Lemme hear it! Who'd you kill this time?"\sw[935]
\.\C[10]\sw[934]"You sacrificed someone weaker than you to survive."\sw[935]
\.\C[10]\sw[934]"What's your excuse for this time, Sara?"\sw[935]
\."You left me... and died on your own...!!"
\."Just give me a break... Forgive me...!!"
\."Just give me a break... Forgive me...!!"
\.\C[3]The last thing I want to remember. Joe's end.

\."Thank goodness...!
 Sara... Nothing wrong, is there?"
\."Big sis Sara!! You came to, meow!"
\."You were passed out in the Room of Rubble."

\."That must've been an AI
 of big bro Joe, right, meow...?"

\."It was an AI of Jou Tazuna...
 Why in the world was that there...?"
\."It was a fake Joe somebody set up out of malice..."
\."Sara... Don't worry about anything it said."
Your Turn To Die:\.\. Chapter 2\| End
To be continued in the Final Chapter\.\.

You aren't Joe

1-1-message:
\.\C[3]It's nothing but rocks...
Almost like there'd been a landslide...
\.\C[3]But without a door... there was no point.
\."This shit ain't what I signed up for...!!!!"
\."Don't be ridiculous...!! What in the wooorld?!"
\."It can't be!! This is all... a lie!!"
"...This is the truth you sought out."

\."An external explosion was used to make a physical lid.
\! Long before the Death Game began..."
\."W-What's going on... That thing on your neck...!!"
\."Until it is all over... our fates are intertwined."
\C[4](A collar...! Even the Floor Masters are...?!)
\."WHAT THE SHIT?! What the hell are you guys?!"

\."Please forgive my rudeness.
 I do not wish to use violence."
\."Now, everyone, it is time to stop dreaming."

\."You must win...!
 Only for the victor will the path open!!"

\."You have only a brief time left...
 Spend your last moments before the Main Game well."

\.\C[3]Before I knew it,
everyone had gone off to do their own thing.
\.\C[3]To use this final time granted to us meaningfully.
1-1-choice:
Trust the others and accept death
Trick the others if I must to live
2-1-message: "Just can't find it in me to give up..."
\."It might be futile... but I'm gonna struggle."
\."What can you do without heavy machinery...?"
2-2-message: "Wonder if I can open a way. Even the tiniest gap..."

\."*pant*... *gasp*...
 Don't flap your mouth, move your hands...!"

\C[4](This seems like it's on a whole other level
 than what can be accomplished by human strength...)

1-1-message:
\."I truly thank you for once again
 participating in the \C[2]Main Game\C[0]."

\."I will omit detailed explanations,
 but I have one point of warning this time..."
\."It appears one of you lost your tablet."

\."Due to the need for fingerprint identification,
 others cannot misuse it, but..."

\."As it is a disadvantage to not know your own role,
 a spare tablet has been placed on your table."
\."Please use it if you are the person in question."

\."That is all for my warning.
 To proceed with the rules, please touch the screen."
1-2-message:
"Well then, allow me to explain
 the rules of the Main Game."

\."The basic rules are that one person to be sacrificed
 will be chosen by majority vote."
\."The vote will be split into two parts."

\."Through the first round, the \C[2]preliminary vote\C[0],
 half the total will be chosen as candidates."
\."As there are 8 presently alive, this would be \C[2]4\C[0]."

\."A \C[2]final vote\C[0] will be held using these,
 deciding the ultimate \C[2]victim\C[0]."

\."In other words, the sacrifice is decided
 by narrowing down from 8, to 4, to 1."
\."This is a normal role, which has no powers."

\."As one would expect, they hold the key.
 If chosen as the victim, all will perish."

\."By the power of holy divination,
 they can know who the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] is."

\."This is a card of reversals, which lets its owner live
 only if they are chosen as the victim."

\."But meanwhile... if not chosen, they will die.
 So it is also an accursed card."

\."And if they win, they can escape together
 with one person of their choice."

\."Incidentally, in the event that
 multiple people are tied for first..."

\."If the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] is in the tie, the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] wins.
 If the \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] is in the tie, all perish."

\."If both the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] and \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] are
 tied for first... The \C[2]Keymaster\C[0] takes priority,
 and all perish."

\."The distribution is 1 \C[2]Keymaster\C[0], \C[3]Sage\C[0], and \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0].
 All others are \C[5]Commoners\C[0]."

\."Best of luck... and may you avoid
 total destruction at all costs."
\."Well, everyone, please wait for the game to beg..."

\."Gashu, are you listening?!
 You've really gone and mucked things up...!"

\."You've made a flagrant transgression...!!
 One that shakes the very core of the Main Game!!"

\."Are you trying to appropriate
 the Main Game for yourse..."
\."The Main Game will now begin. Please enter, everyone."
1-4-message: "We have already opened. Please enter quickly."

1-1-message:
\."I'm gonna take you on a stroll down memory lane,
 recap the story so far. Be grateful, ya bastard!"

\."'Course, if you're thinkin' "thanks but no thanks,"
 you're free to leave, okay?"
"Right! Get down on your knees and listen!"

\."I'm gonna take you on a stroll down memory lane,
 recap the story so far. Be grateful, ya bastard!"
"Geez, what a bore... Alright, I getcha."

"I'm a masterpiece, sooo,
 I'll just tell you the short and sweet version."
"...You're gonna pay for this, y'know that?"

These guys are \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0]
and her best friend \C[2]Joe Tazuna\C[0].
They're a pair of dweebs who waltzed together
into the Death Game, all friendly-like!

Without having a clue what was what,
their \C[2]First Trial\C[0] began, and they cleared lots more...

And they chose to cooperate and survive
with all the other participants.\|\|

But their cooperation was for naught!
And high school teacher \C[2]Kazumi Mishima\C[0] died.

His ex-student \C[2]Nao Egokoro\C[0] went into
this hilarious panic over it, see.

So the self-described homemaker \C[2]Kai Satou\C[0]
made use of that to instigate her...

And she stole back the laptop that job-hopper
\C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0] got his hands on!

The laptop concealed proof that Kai
was colluding with the organization.

Ultimately, Kai died in the \C[2]Main Game\C[0].

All 'cause he grabbed the \C[3]Sage\C[0] card!
And Joe, too, he got the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0] card... and died.
\C[10]Seems hallucinations started to eat away at Sara...

The second stage was the Sub-Game,
where everybody traded \C[2]tokens\C[0] amongst themselves.
During all that, an AI of the dead Mishima showed up...

And so did a fake doll that looked just like Reko!
It was one huge calamity.

Amid all that, \C[2]Q-taro Burgerberg\C[0]
discovered that laptop again.

He was nearing the heart of the Death Game, but...

Lured by tokens, he handed the laptop over to Sou.

Man, ain't double-crossing just the best?

Q-taro gathered the most tokens,
and \C[2]Gin Ibushi\C[0] didn't collect squat.

I was looking forward to one of 'em dying, but...
"Which of these two was the one to actually die?"
1-1-choice:

Leave (Return to title)

Let me hear it
Hurry it up (Skip summary)
Is it long?

Let me hear it
Hurry it up (Skip summary)
1-3-message:
It was \C[2]Reko Yabusame\C[0] who died in the end.

...Stabbed by the fake Reko, in fact!

It was \C[2]Alice Yabusame\C[0] who died in the end.

...Caught by my lies, in fact!

\."Having feelings when you're killing each other...
 It'll only hurt you, y'know?"
What I didn't know... is that I'd be killed, too.
But I... I should've been dad's masterpiece...!

\."Now, everyone.\! If your memories are all in order,
 allow me to invite you once again."

A normal high school girl, \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0].
And her best friend, \C[2]Jou Tazuna (Joe)\C[0].
One day, they were pulled into a cruel Death Game...

Rather than submit to fear,
they chose to cooperate with the other participants...\|\|

But alas, high school teacher \C[2]Kazumi Mishima\C[0]
became the first victim.
There was no stopping that they would \C[10]kill each other\C[0].

After a cruel majority vote,
homemaker \C[2]Kai Satou\C[0] died...

And Sara's best friend Joe died as well,
unable to defy his fate.
As her heart crumbled, the peril only continued...
1-3-message: The next victim was singer-songwriter \C[2]Reko Yabusame\C[0].
The next victim was murderer \C[2]Alice Yabusame\C[0].

As desperately as they tried to grasp escape,
their enemies gave their very lives to stop it.

When the Main Game occurred once more,
art student \C[2]Nao Egokoro\C[0] died.
1-5-message: The next victim was middle-schooler \C[2]Kanna Kizuchi\C[0].

And \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0], who'd failed to protect Kanna,
was left with a strong hatred of Sara.
Due to a malicious Joe AI...
\.Sara forgot that Joe even existed...

The next victim was
self-described job-hopper \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0].

After removing his collar,
using the last of his strength...
He started up a Joe AI.

\.At last, Sara reunited with her best friend,
and awoke from her long nightmare.
The Death Game... is not over yet.
\C[10]6 Remain

\."This is the Your Turn To Die -Death Game By Majority-
 \C[2]Final Chapter (Chapter 3) Part One Demo\C[0]!"
\."Are you familiar with Your Turn To Die?"

"You see, Your Turn To Die is a story where
 the characters are trapped in a cruel Death Game,
 and take each other's lives by majority vote!"

\."As such! It's recommended you play Chapters 1 and 2
 before you start this demo!"

\."Worry not! Chapters 1 and 2 can be played for free
 on a site called... (checks notes)... vgperson.com!
 On a smartphone or on a computer!"

\."...Or else, if you don't give a care,
 are you prepared for spoilers galore?"

\."OK by me! Now let's get started...
 with a summary of the adventure thus far!"

\."Hey, thanks! You can scan the QR code on the package
 for a link to the Japanese site, but English-speakers
 should just do a web search for Your Turn To Die!"

\."Great! By the way, do you know what's happened
 up to the latest part - that is, Chapter 2, Part Two?"

"Oh! Well you see, Your Turn To Die is a story
 where the characters are trapped in a cruel Death Game,
 and take each other's lives by majority vote!"

\."Inevitably, this demo's gonna contain
 spoilers up to Chapter 2, Part Two!
 I recommend playing that far first!"

\."Worry not! Chapters 1 and 2 can be played for free
 on a site called... (checks notes)... vgperson.com!
 On a smartphone or on a computer!"

\."...Or else, if you don't give a care,
 are you prepared for spoilers galore?"

\."OK by me! Now let's get started...

\."Hooray! You're all set!

They chose to cooperate with the other participants

But their cooperation was in vain,

After a cruel majority vote, \C[2]Kai Satou\C[0] died...

unable to defy his fate.

Continuing onto the third floor,
a Sub-Game called the \C[2]Trust Barter Game\C[0] was held.

1-1-message: Hey, Keiji, tell me what it is.
"...Yer just exhausted. Y'oughta take a rest."
No, my head feels perfectly clear...
"T... Then nothin' to worry about, right?"
"...Hmph. Then what is there to worry about?"
I want to remember... everything that happened here...

\.Nao... and Kanna...
Everyone who had to be sacrificed...
"Then don't just sit around and think about it."
\."Let's move. ...So that nobody else has to die."
"Everyone... This floor will be closed off soon."

\."If you don't go to the next floor within
 about 5 minutes, your collars will activate..."

"That ain't good...!
 Guess we gotta move it quick, eh?"

\."Now look here...
 We can't leave that jerk Sou alone."
\."We should probably wait for him, meow..."

\."If he hasn't shown up yet...
 Could be he's gone on ahead."
\."Hmph... There's no need to wait for that man."
\."Meow... But if we left him and he died..."

\."Seems unthinkable to me...
 Don't you suppose he's gone on ahead instead?"
\.\C[4](I wonder where on Earth he went...)
\.\C[4](Maybe... he doesn't want to see us anymore.)

\."G-Got it, woof! I'll look for him, meow!
 So you guys just wait, woof!"

\."Quit it, you!
 You make it sound like we're being selfish!"

\."Ahaha. Try greeting me with a smile next time.
 We're allies, aren't we?"
\."Like I can be all smiles right now..."

\."Just stop it!!
 The one you were tryin' to protect...
 We just went an'...!!"

\."Well, it was too bad. In that Main Game,
 Kanna even went and got the \C[10]Sacrifice\C[0]..."

\."But alas, she didn't get the chance
 to choose me and have us escape together."
\.\C[10]"Couldn't use her after all... A shame."

\."Ah, how pitiful...
 If ever there was a world where that happened..."
\."Kanna wouldn't pick you, she'd pick Sara."
\."Haha... Did you really think she'd pick you?"
\."I know that...! Of course I know that!!"

\."You just want to laugh at me,
 'cause I'm fated to die no matter what!!
 Well, go ahead and laugh..."

\."You put your life on the line to protect Kanna.
 You were ready to throw your own life away..."

\."Those weren't rational actions.
 They were your heart screaming out."
\."That's... what Kanna wanted us to do..."
\."Enough. Let's hurry to the next floor."

\."During the discussion, I could've sworn
 you wanted me to die so bad."
"Let's go already. We can deal with him later."

\."I know, Gin.
 I wanna do something about it, too."

\."'Cause now I know even Sou's a human with a heart...
 ...Shit, man."
\."He was just desperate, meow... I'm sure of it..."

\."Very well, I suppose we're desperate ourselves...
 Now, to the next floor, so we don't die."
1-2-message: Kanna was always with her big sister.
\.But Kanna was always just a bother to her...

\.Even that time when it mattered most,
she couldn't do anything.
But that message... made her remember.
\.That surely, her big sister was watching over her...
\.That she had to stay strong on her own...
\.That it wasn't her sister who wrote that message...
...There's people who tried to protect Kanna.
\.There's people who worked to encourage her.
\.So... she doesn't want anyone else to die.
"Everyone... This floor will be closed off soon."

\."Please proceed to the next floor quickly...
 Or else your collars will..."
\."Miss Sara, could it be that you're..."
"It felt like I'd been having a bad dream..."

\."I tortured myself with
 hallucinations of my own making."
\."I... no, we... won't lose to the likes of you!"

"Just what I've come to expect...
 You always stand right back up, Sara."
\."It's not like it's on my power alone..."

\."Can't say I had a handle on 'im up to the very end.
 'Cause I kept getting used and falling for lies..."
\."But... it's the truth that he tried to protect Kanna."

\."Kanna, don't go thinking about
 giving yourself up ever again, alright?"

\."You gotta give the kidnappers the beating
 Sou would've given 'em, ain't that right?"
\."And not just for Sou... for Nao, too..."
\."Ya gotta live on for his sake, Kanna."
\."Don't go thinkin' about self-sacrifice no more!"
\."And... for big sis Nao's sake, too..."
\."That's why we've gotta pull out all the stops now."

\."And first up... is the next floor.
 'Cause it'll kinda throw a wrench in things
 if our collars activate."

\."Then should we not head to the next floor now...?
 I wouldn't care for my collar activating..."

\."We'll restart our escape plan
 once we're on the next floor, meow!"
\."This time... This time, let's escape for sure!"
\.\C[4](That's right... So no one's death will be in vain!)

1-1-message: \C[4](This isn't where that door went before...!)

\."It's nothing surprising at this point, woof.
 It's just an image, meow."
\."Y-Yer becomin' such a worn-down adult, Gin!"
\."It's like we're walking through the sky..."

3-1-message:
\C[3]At the top of the stairs is a door
that blends in with the background.

"I'm fine, meow! Hold on tight to the clothes
 of the person in front of you, woof!"

"Ahh, 'zat right... Thought my back smarted.
 So it was Gin's claws!"

"I-Is somebody near me...?
 Ah! Is this Gin?"

"Hm...? Hey, you lot!
 I've found a washtub of some sort..."

"Aaah...! That's Kanna's bucket!
 Please give it back...!"
"Mwahaha... Are you lot unsuited to such darkness?"

"Guess the guy who locked himself in a locker
 would be an authority, meow."
"Ah...! I can see a faint light!"

1-1-message: \."Hey there. Doing your best, I see."

\."It's a little early, but that's all for today...
 How about a short break?"

\."The next part is planned to be
 updated tomorrow, \C[2]February 26th\C[0]..."
\."So... I hope you'll wait a bit until then."
\."Sorry for my selfish request. But thanks!"

\."I know! Want to save here?
 You'll be able to start from here after the update!"
\."Well then... See you in another part!"

\."Guys, \N[4] might be on this floor.
 Be cautious..."

 if you don't handle it the right way, got it?"

 We can't fight against something like this, woof!"

 taking it on fair and square."

 We might jus' \C[2]figure out a weakness\C[0]!"

2-1-message:
\."I was sweatin'...!
 What the hell was that monster?!"

\."We managed to defeat it in a daze,
 but just what was that thing?!"

\."W-What...?!
 What are you thinking, locking me in here?!"
\.\C[3]The coffin has been destroyed with terrifying might.

\."Shit!! Hey, Anzu!
 Are you for real?!"
\."T-This is bad! Will it come for us next...?!"
\.\C[3]The monster stood up and walked into the darkness.
\."It went off the same direction as \N[4]..."

\."It was saying...
 it was satisfied having destroyed one of us..."

\."Can't you tell just lookin' at that coffin?
 She's been scrapped..."
\."She... really seemed to be suffering... Urgh..."

\."A doll meant to impede our objective...
 And who'll come after our lives... apparently."

\."It was saying... it definitely wouldn't be satisfied
 until it destroyed one of us."

\."That ain't funny!
 After all this, suddenly we gotta use violence?!"

\."Putting our heads together,
 and sometimes having someone risk themselves...
 That's all we can do."
\."We don't want to meet a fate like that either..."
\."I mean... we don't wanna die, either..."

\."Seeing that happen to Anzu right in front of me...
 I'm still distraught, honestly..."
\."We know the fear of death better than anyone..."
\."Hmph... Perhaps it's fine to trust them."

\."I learned how elaborate these AIs are
 from the incident with the fake Reko..."

\."These fellows are alive.
 They're not just dolls."
\."...Whether that's a good thing or not aside..."
\."It's makin' me remember that fake Reko business..."

\."These guys ain't just
 artificial things either, I'm sure."

\."They're alive.
 ...Hell if that ain't cruel, though."

\."Well... guess it's fine.
 The more people, the more fight we can bring."
\.\C[4](No use suspecting them for now, I guess...)
\."So, uh... Let's keep it up, Sara."

\."Alright then. First up...
 Let's go after \N[4]."

\."I think this might be usable as a weapon
 if it's reinforced... I'll hold onto it."
\."Nah... No need. Right, Sara?"

\."I think you need to protect yourself...
 You should take it."
\."See, miss Sara says so too! Leave it to me."
\."...Really itching to take it for yourself, huh."
\."Hmm... I think you should leave it here."

\."W-Why? If you're just going to leave it,
 you wouldn't mind me taking it, right?"

\."Sure, but...
 I'm uneasy about trusting you guys with weapons."
\."W-What's that? You still won't trust me...?"
\."Give it up, Hayasaka."
\."Mr. Policeman's got his eye on us."
\."Wahaha..."
\."If we can't be trusted, it's over for us..."
\."I know... Haha... What low status we have."

\."Meow! Relax, suit-and-specs!
 Weapon or not, you've got me, woof!"
\."O-Oh, really... How encouraging... Hahaha..."

there is an escape route known to no one.

we shall build a new underworld.

 his left hand is also using normal parts."

\."Let's hope you can find some good parts
 and upgrade him!"
"That I can answer for you later, alright?!"

\."Currently being displayed is
 the information for \C[2]Ranmaru Kageyama\C[0]."

\."In the center, you can see the
 remaining battery for the head and torso."

"And the right and left hands here
 display your \C[2]Upgrade Parts\C[0]."
"Upgrade parts? What in the world are...?"

"Also, if there's personal info you want,
 such as preferences, learned knowledge,
 or people he likes..."

"Uhh... If they're hand parts...
 then I guess you'd like, attach something, yeah?"

"Hmph... If these are hand parts...
 perhaps they're something you can equip?"

\."And when Hayasaka died...
 I saw his body..."
\."But still... some part of me just..."
\.\C[3]Even being shown a video of his own death...
\.\C[3]Somewhere deep down, he still felt he was a human.
\.\C[4](Now... he's had the reality thrust in front of him.)

\."Do dolls cry over shit like that...?"

\."Thinking to yourself you've given up,

\."Humans always struggle on,

\."The way I see it... you're plenty human."

\."So... don't let such foolish things sadden you."
\."So stop bein' a wuss and get moving."
\."...Stand up already. We haven't the time."
\."Some man you are, blubbering on the floor..."

\."But... do you really know everything about him?"

\."What is this? Height, weight...
 Everything from blood composition to allergies!"
\."It's like a physical exam or something..."
\."Um...! Can we stop looking at that for now?!"

\."H-Hold on!
 I didn't research this because I wanted to...!"

\."Is this your computer?!
 What's your aim, you damn pervert?!"
\."Hoh... So it really was information you researched..."

"Hayasaka, please tell me.
 What is this?"

\."The company I work for deals in
 medical machinery and information, and..."

\."Because of that job...
 I got to know a man from Asunaro."

\."On the surface, Asunaro is an upstanding company
 that does clean research..."
\."But I learned that it has another face."

\."They're connected to shady businesses,
 and produce illegal medicines...
 Things of that nature..."

\."I even heard rumor that among those
 were illegal drugs and euthanizing medicines..."

\."I also heard about...
 inhumane research that wasn't to be spoken of..."

\."Thinking about it now,
 that was probably research into reproducing humans..."
\."And so you just gave them my information...?!"
\."I was told... to get information on everyone...!"
\."Bastard!! Don't tell me that covers us too?!"

\."I didn't know...!
 I had no idea what they'd do to me if I resisted!"

\."Their power is too immense...
 It's hardly even an exaggeration to say
 they control the dark side of society..."

\."Shaddup...! What'd you use this data for?!
 Depending on your answer, I may just have to
 kick your ass right here!!"

\."Why am I being carried around, woof?!
 Meooow! Let me down, suit-and-specs!!"

\."Good for you, suit-and-specs!
 You stopped the ceiling trap, meow?"
\."We were able to stop it thanks to you, Gin."

\."I knew it, meow!
 You should be grateful, woof!"
\."Tch! Took the wind outta my sails..."
\."I'm the leader, meow! It's only natural, woof!"

\."Yer a big man, Gin!
 C'mere and show me that wound."

\."Come to think of it, my head kinda hurts, meow!
 Do something, muscle gorilla!"

\."Whew...
 I was nearly scrapped by my allies there..."

\."All thanks to Gin.
 He seems fond of you."

\."Is he really?
 Even though he calls me "suit-and-specs"...?"
\."Yeah... Maybe because of that, in fact."

\."When we first got here...
 There was someone else in a suit and glasses."
\."It wasn't for long, but Gin and him acted together."
\."Still not sure where his head is, even now."

\."Think of it from Gin's perspective.
 It was the first time he'd seen a person
 he had conversations with die before his eyes."

\."..."Couldn't he have been saved?"
 Maybe he had regrets like that..."
\."And that's why he tried to protect me..."

\."What an idiot... He nearly died over that,
 for the sake of someone he barely even knows...?!"
\."Wahaha... Doesn't seem that part matters to Gin."
\."Let's go... You don't wanna get separated."

who meet Gashu's requirements.

\."Well? Are you done passing around

\."That's not it at all!!

\."Is that sooo! That's perfect in its own way!

\."A gun is against the rules of tag... right?"

\."...Sure.

\."Hmph... Your life as a runaway is over..."
\."Hmph... Your life as a runaway is over..."
\."I won't forgive you even if you apologize, meow!"

\."I can't see this futile chase

\."You mean the Dummies are gonna do something...?!"
\."Do the Dummies have some other objective?!"

\."That's right. Ultimately,

\."Maybe they have some kind of mission...?"

\."But, but...! But suit-and-specs and the others

\."Come to think of it...

\."\N[4] isn't being serious

\."...He never once said

\."I'm sure he's just waiting

\."Is try to destroy us from the inside..."

\."It's amazing how ridiculous you can be

\."You don't mean...
 He's gonna make the Dummies do something?!"

\."Surely you don't mean...

\."But, but...! But suit-and-specs and the others

\."I've met you before...!

\."And it wasn't just once...!
 We must've met a bunch of times!"

\."After it, too...!

\."Back then... you made a request of me!"

\."You made up this shitty murder case...
 and pinned the crime on Alice!!"
\."...I was thinking I'd call upon this."

\."How cruel... I really did die then!
 Have some sympathy!"
\."Why would a dead man come back to life...?"
\."I'm sure it flows within you! A vile black blood...!!"

\."As if I don't know that!!
 I'm not some kind of moron, you knooow?!"

\."Could you not be so irresponsible?!
 Obviously he's prepared to shoot me down!!"
\."...I was just thinking I'd use this."

\C[3]\N[4] took the hand out from the wall.

\."Just so we're clear, miss Reko...
 I'm deeply angry."
\."Even I didn't plan for such an incident."

\."It made me lose my seat in the Death Game
 that I was so looking forward to..."
\."I'd hoped to kill Alice for that by my own hand."

\."And also... you haven't properly
 remembered everything yet."
\."That lantern... it'll reveal the truth for you."

\."Go try it out.
 ...Not just on miss Reko, but on everyone."

\."Still, I definitely think seaweed-head
 framed Stripey, meow..."
\."Alice was... a weak person... nicer than anyone..."

\."Thinking about it now...
 It'd all make sense if it was all that guy's fault!"
\."I should have... believed in my bro..."

\C[3]\N[4] took the hand out from the wall.

\."Even I didn't plan for such an incident."

\."And also... you're barking up the wrong tree

\."That lantern... it'll reveal your true sin."

\."Go try it out.

\."Basically... it means giving yourself

\."You could take it to mean... "I won't complain
 even if you play with my life in a Death Game.""

\."It ain't possible!

\."What would happen if I wished

\."Would it all end... at the cost of my life?"
\."There'd be no point! I wouldn't want that!!"

through a crack in my heart.

that I wanted to live, that I didn't want to die.
\.\C[3]And yet... the opposite feeling tugs at my heart...
\.\C[3]If I died... everyone could be saved.
\C[10]I want to survive, no matter who it costs.

21-1-message: \C[3]Some sort of coffin.
\.\C[3]Inside is a boy wearing a school uniform.
"Meow... Respond if you're alive, woof..."
22-3-message: "Nice to meet you, miss Sara."

\."Ahaha. Sorry to pop out of the darkness.
 Did I startle you, I wonder?"
\."Y... Ya mean you weren't a corpse?!"

\."As you can see, I'm super duper.
 So, did you enjoy it?"

\."As if anybody'd enjoy that!
 The hell's wrong with you?!"

\."Who the hell's gonna enjoy that?!
 Jes' who or what are you?!"
\."Huh...? So sure enough, you don't remember..."

\."That's perfectly fine, though!
 I'm your Floor Master this time! Hello!"
\."Floor Master, you say...?"

\."Yep! I waited for 5 hours in that coffin!
 It's so cruel of you guys to keep me in suspense!"
\."Now now, gather closer to me!"
\."Heeheehee... You too, \C[2]Shin\C[0]... Come on."
\."And you, Alice... my murderer."
\."As I thought... You're the real Sou Hiyori...!!"
\."As I thought, you're...!!"
\."There's no time. I need to introduce you..."
\."To the dolls who will be supporting you!"
"Nwah?! Whoa, nelly...!!"
\."Ooooh... Just the worst way to wake up..."

\."Can't stand it...
 We have to support these guys...?"

\."Bwahaha... Well, fine by me.
 So? Which of you's my partner?"
\."Partner...?"

\."Ahem! That should be "master," you know?
 You guys are the supports, after all."
\."H-Hold on! Supports? Aren't these...?!"

\."Ahaha, I'll introduce you.
 They're known as the \C[2]Dummies\C[0]."

\."They're the tragic victims
 who died before they could meet anyone..."

\."Eeeee! Sara, you're just so cuuute!
 Relax! We're on your side!"
\.\C[4](She knows my name...!)

\."Naturally, they're dolls...
 So they got the necessary info input in advance."

\."T... This is desecration of the dead...
 Let me go back home..."
\."It's no use struggling now..."

\."This time, we'll be having you make pairs
 with the Dummies to take on a game!"
\."Pairs, you say...?"
\."Now, Red Thread of Fate... activate!"
\."...? My collar...?"
\."What's this?!"

\."The people connected by the Red Thread of Fate
 are the pairs for this game!"

\."A kid...? Alright then, I'll protect you.
 ...I'm \C[2]Kurumada\C[0]."

\."Bwahaha... Good to meet you.
 ...I'm \C[2]Kurumada\C[0]."
\."...Same here."

\."Eeeee! So Q-taro's my master!
 My name's \C[2]Mai\C[0]! Let's get along!"

\."S-Sure...
 'Zat the right mood to be in...?"
\."Middle-schooler or so? Must be rough..."

\."Err... Reko, isn't it?
 I'm \C[2]Anzu\C[0], a high-schooler."

\."Right. Dunno what's going on, but...
 Nice to meetcha."

\."Waugh, my partner's a murderer?!
 \!I... I'm \C[2]Anzu\C[0]... Be gentle... Ahaha..."

\."...Hmph. Murderer...?
 It hurts to hear it said to my face... Quit it."

\."I'm \C[2]Hayasaka\C[0].
 H... Hoo boy... A kid, huh..."
\."I'm the one who's worried, woof!!"

\."...Uhh, Sara, was it?
 I'm \C[2]Ranmaru\C[0]. I'm in high school like you."
\.\C[4](A high school student...)
"...Nice to meet you."
\."S-Say somethin'... This is awkward..."
"I'd like to request a trade!"
\."Huh?! Damn, don't reject me immediately!!"
\."How nice! Everyone looks like they'll get along!"
\."Well, lastly... I'll introduce myself too."

\."I'm a poor doll killed by the murderer Alice Yabusame,
 \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0]!"

\."Of course...
 Sou Hiyori is a name of the past to me now..."

\."Seeing as Shin used it with such care.
 I'm not going to just claim that name now!"

\.\C[4](Shin Tsukimi...
 That's the real name of the Sou we know.)
\.\C[4](So he took the alias of "Sou Hiyori" from this guy...)
\."Poor Shin... I'm truly, truly sad, I am."

\.\C[10]"Since he was going to die anyway,
 I wanted to kill him with my own hands..."
\."H... How can you say that?!"

\."Ahaha, don't get so mad.
 You all can't understand my affection."
\.\C[4](This person... He's a little like Sou...)
\.\C[4](But something is distinctly different...!!)

\."Seeing as Shin's using it with such care.
 I'm not going to ask him to give it back now!"

\.\C[4](Shin Tsukimi...
 That's the real name of the Sou we know.)
\.\C[4](So he took the alias of "Sou Hiyori" from this guy...)
\."Hey, Shin... It was a pity about Kanna..."
\."...Shut up."

\."You've got such a wonderful look on your face now...
 Ahaha..."
\."I don't care about you. You're just an enemy."
\."...I see you've grown."
\."Anyway, it'll be inconvenient without a nickname."

\."Hey, miss Sara. You act as a representative
 and give me a new name!"

"Huh? Were you even listening, I wonder...?
 I won't use Sou Hiyori anymore."

"Hiyori won't do either. Doesn't it make me seem
 like I'm still clingy about my old name?"

"I gave Sou to Shin.
 He's already Sou by now, you see."

"You want to give me the same name as you...?
 How disgusting, miss Sara."

"Ahaha, like I'm your brother-in-law? No thanks.
 Pick another name."
"If you'll remember, Sara Chidouin is you!"

"...Joe was such a cheerful and kind boy...
 It's really a shame."

"Tazuna is Joe's surname.
 Naturally, I have to decline."

"There was a survivor named Joe Tazuna...
 ...Did you forget that? Pick another name."

"Ahaha, you're making Mr. Policeman blush!
 ...Just kidding. Pick another name."

"Shinogi is Keiji's surname.
 Naturally, I have to decline."

"Keiji Shinogi...?
 I'm not fond of sounding like a ladykiller.
 Pick another name."

"Poor Kanna'd weep! I think a more worthless name
 would be better for someone like me."

"Kizuchi is Kanna and her sister's surname.
 Naturally, I have to decline."

"Kanna Kizuchi...? Sorry, I don't have a bucket.
 Pick another name."

"Ahaha, Q-taro is a name for gorillas only.
 I'd prefer a more spindly name."

"Burgerberg is Q-taro's surname.
 Naturally, I have to decline."

"Q-taro Burgerberg... It's just too long.
 Pick another name."

"Reko...? Only sisterly bongo players get that name.
 Pick another name."

"Yabusame's the surname of the one who killed me!
 Naturally, I have to decline."

"Reko Yabusame...? Nah, I'm not a band girl.
 Pick another name."

"Yes, I am Kai! ...Nope, I'm not.
 It'd be inexcusable for me to use that name."

"Ahaha, no way. As I see it,
 Satou's the same surname Gashu has."

"Kai Satou...? I don't think I can cook very well.
 Pick another name."

"Nao was a kind and heartfelt girl.
 It's cruel to die before seeing adulthood..."

"Egokoro is Nao's surname.
 Please repent, and rethink it."

"Nao Egokoro...?
 I like sculpting more than drawing.
 Pick another name."

"I'm not Gin, meow! Woof woof!
 ...Just kidding. Pick another name."

"Ibushi is Gin's surname.
 Think it over again, woof."

"Gin Ibushi...?
 I'm a grown-up, so I can't go imitating a cat.
 You should pick another name."

"That's not funny. He killed me.
 And I'm mad, believe it or not."

"Alice Yabusame...? I do really hate him, personally,
 but I'm on the job here. Just pick another name."

"Ahaha, Miley, huh? I think she's pretty,
 but her personality's scary. Pick another name."

"Ahaha, Gashu? I could never grow
 such a stupendous crabstache. Pick another name."

"Ranger... Wasn't there a doll named Rio Ranger?
 We're not the same model number, so quit it."

"Laizer... Wasn't there a doll named Rio Laizer?
 That's rude to Safalin, so quit it."

"There's already a doll named Rio Ranger...
 I'd be fine with Rio, though. Rethink it."

"There's already a doll named Rio Laizer...
 I'd be fine with Rio, though. Rethink it."

"Safalin... She looks kind of scary, huh?
 Ahaha. Pick another name."
"...Pick another name."

"\C[2]\N[4]\C[0]... That's a good name.
 You sure you want to name me that?"
"Thanks. I'm glad to get such a wonderful name!"
\."So? What're you going to make us do this time...?"
\."Ahaha, you just can't wait, can you?"
\."Relax! It's a very simple bonus game!"

\."You just have to join forces to \C[10]kill\C[0] a certain target.
 That is to say, it's a hunt!"

\."You can use any method! Shooting, stabbing,
 striking, strangling, anything goes!"

\."It should be a piece of cake for you guys
 who've killed a bunch of people, albeit indirectly!"
\."Cut the crap!! Kill...? Who?!"
\."Who exactly do we...?"
\."Your target is \C[2]Keiji Shinogi\C[0]...\! nooot!"

\."Did I make your heart skip a beat, miss Sara?!
 Obviously that's a joke!
 I wouldn't make you kill your allies!"
\."Alright, already. Just move it along."
\."Serious, huh? I'd say that's a good thing."
\.\C[4](I can't let myself get caught up in his tricks...)
\."For a Floor Master, you're pretty meddling."

\."Miley did tell me you were cute
 when you got mad, miss Sara."
\."Ooh, ya got meee!"
\."...We're having a serious conversation, miss Sara."
\.\C[4](Gah!! What's with this guy...?!)

\."Your target is \C[2]\N[4]\C[0].
 In other words, \C[2]you just need to kill me\C[0]."
\."Say what...?"
\."Ahaha, no, no, I won't say it twice!"

\."Now begins the Sub-Game, the \C[2]Murderer Game\C[0]!
 ...I'm looking forward to the finest of bloodlust."
\."W... Wait! Is the explanation over?!"
\."We have to... kill that person...?"

\."Kill Sou Hiyori...
 No, kill \N[4]..."

\."Bwahah... You alright?
 Now might've been our best chance, y'know?"

\."Like hell! Who could just up and do that
 after havin' it sprung on 'em?!"

\."...I bet that guy fled to
 the furthest ends of this floor."

\."There's nothing for it. First, we'll share
 the information we have with everyone..."
\."Hm? There's still more info...?"

\."That's right! He said it was too much bother,
 and so we should give the explanations!"
\."Seems like we should ask them for details, Sara."

50-1-message:
\."Never been more glad about
 workin' on my body than today, I tell ya...!"

\."What a moron!
 To get killed before you could even...!!"

\."Jes' knocked her away a li'l...
 She probably just shut down..."
\."Are you stupid?! Why would you go easy on her...?!"
\."She seriously meant to take your life...!!"
\."That goes for all you guys, right...?"

\."\N[4]'s got your lives in his hands...
 So yer just bein' forced to do this, right?!"
\."I'm sick of us pinnin' death on each other!!"
\."We won't do nothin' to you guys, Hinako!!"
\."So let's get through this! You guys, too...!!"
\."Don't be stupid! Didn't you hear the rules?!"
\."One or the other has to die! We...!!"
\."Is doin' as yer told gonna lead to victory?!"

\."We're gonna win...!
 No more draws or defeats!!"

\."If somebody turns traitor,
 how are we gonna see victory...?"

\."We all gotta believe...
 Or no miracle's gonna happen!!"
\.\C[3]Not from the pain of his wound.
\.\C[3]His heartfelt cry is shaking the room.
\."Ranmaru...! Idiot! How can you fall for that?!"

\."Shoot... We have nothing to use for treatment,
 but I wonder if we can do something..."

\."All I've got is this hood,
 but should I tear it up to help stop the bleeding?"
\."I mean, why not? These guys are interestin'."

\."Seriously now... You picturing defying us
 and winning, little miss middle-schooler?"

\."Hey, I can't touch him right now...
 You help out here, Kurumada."

\."Awright...! The bleedin's stopped!
 It ain't as bad as it looks!!"
\."Doesn't really seem that way to me..."
\."Sit down. At least get some rest..."

\."Mai can't move either...
 You can't leave an ally behind, right?"

\."If we find anything for medical treatment,
 we'll bring it right away...!"

\."Don't sweat that...
 Focus on doin' what you gotta do!"
\.\C[4](I feel it... a sense of unity.)
\."Now... It's about time to end this game of tag."

\."Hey, Keiji... Since you won,

\."To face the dead... That's another reason
 why Asunaro makes artificial intelligences."

\C[3]While Keiji was distracted,
\N[4] forcefully pushed him away.
\.\C[3]His face pale, he loses balance and backs away.
\.\C[3]...No human can beat the fear of death.

\."Ahaha. My coffin was in just the right spot."
\."Hey, I'll let you in on something neat, miss Sara."
\."These coffins come with a very handy feature."
\."Da-dunnn! They can cremate right on the spot!"

\."The timer's already running!
 If you aren't quick, he'll soon be steak!"

\."Let him out!!
 Mr. Policeman's gonna die...!!"
\."So here's my suggestion as Floor Master..."
\."I never said that losing at tag meant death, did I?"

\."Like Shin said...
 I never said losing at tag meant death."
\."If you would hear out just one wish of mine..."
\."I'll tell you a way you can save Keiji."
"...I'll have you sign that consent form."
\."Once you sign it, it'll be complete..."

\."Or stick to your intentions, and kill Keiji...?"

54-1-message: \."Huh? Did I bring back some bad memories?"
"Huh... So that's why you sought to join the force."

\."Then was your goal to become
 a friendly neighborhood policeman?"

\."No... I just want to return it as promised.
 His good luck charm..."

\."Haha. Then go and give it to him.
 If he's still police, you'll see him soon."
\."Him, huh... No, that won't be possible."

\."Even though he had his child...
 I suppose he took another path."
54-2-message: \."Yep... But I wouldn't get involved with him."
\."It's hard to say it here, but..."

\."He was fired for... trying to expose
 a certain darkness among the police..."

\."He was always devoted to justice,
 so he could be a parent his kid would look up to..."
\."Dunno... If I did, I might get fired too."
\."W... Well, then who had him fired?!"

\."You keep an eye on her too...
 So long as you wanna stay with the police."
54-3-message: \C[6]"Calling all units! The suspect has a gun!"

\.\C[6]"No civilians present! You are authorized to fire!
 Don't let him flee the scene!"
\."There's nowhere to run! Drop your gun!"
\."I'll fire a warning shot...! We need to stop him!"

\."That shouldn't have happened!!
 I wasn't aiming for...!!"

\."I'm all right!!
 But, ahh...!! The suspect...!"

\."What a strange thing...
 Turns out the criminal didn't have a gun."

\."There were no witnesses, so Megumi
 used her position to suppress the incident..."

\."She wanted to hide the murder
 of a subordinate as self-defense."
\."How much of a grasp do you have on the police...?"
\."Enough to feed false info about the gun..."

\."And enough to insert a fired policeman
 into your tragic story, maybe...?"
\."Ahaha. Just as good an actor as I was then, aren't I?"
56-1-message:
"Huhhh?
 What's happened to Keiji, I wonder?"

2-1-message: \C[4](It seems Maple's emotions are all over the place...!)
\."Give it back! Give it back! Give it back!!"
"I do feel a little guilty, honestly..."
\.\C[4](We have to get through this somehow...!)

\.\C[4](Maple attacks when she's angry!
 We need to watch her and act accordingly...!)
2-2-message: \."I won't forgive you!! Any of you!!"
\."You're bullying me... You're all bullying me..."

\."Heehee, heeheehee.
 I'll give you something good, heehee..."
\.\C[3]Maple took out a handkerchief from a shelf.
"What's this all of a sudden? A trap...?"
\."But... it might help us get closer with her!"
\."Could be... It'd take guts to accept it."
"I dunno how to deal with all'a this!"
\."Don't be afraid! I'm sure we can get along!"
\."It's tough... If only we had some hints..."
\."I won't forgive you!! Any of you!!"
"I can't keep up with all this, meow!"
\."I've had enough... So sad... So sad..."

"Smiling, then angry, then crying...
 Ain't her emotions changing in order?"

"Joy, anger, sadness...
 Hmph... It appears they're changing in order..."

\."Heehee, heeheehee.
 I'll give you something good, heehee..."
\.\C[3]Maple took out a handkerchief from a shelf.

"W-What should we do?
 Should we accept it this time...?"

"Geez! Even if it's creepy, I'd rather
 she just smiled all the time, meow!!"
\."No one understands me... So cruel... So cruel..."

"W-We'll understand!
 Please believe us, miss Maple!"

\."Heehee, heeheehee.
 I'll give you something good, heehee..."
\.\C[3]Maple took out a handkerchief from a shelf.

"T... The third time...
 Will we accept it this time?"

"Ugh, so stubborn...
 Will we accept it this time...?"
"At least she isn't attacking when she's smiling..."

\."Come on already!! I've told you again and again!!
 Give it back...!!"
"...Might want to get ready to run."

\."I don't want to kill you...
 I thought we were friends..."
\."Eheheh. I want to say goodbye with a smile..."

"Y-Yikes!!
 She's gonna come for us soon!"

"A... Ahemmm?!
 Is your smile not looking rather sick?!"
\."This is the end!! I'll kill you...!!"

"This is bad, Sara!!
 We gotta reconcile, now...!"

\.\C[4](Everyone's here...!
 Is there any way to resolve this without fighting?!)

\.\C[4](We have to raise Maple's friendship level...
 Let's watch her emotions and consider our actions!)

5-1-message:
\C[3][Letter]
A letter Maple received from \N[4].
Just touching it makes her furious.
5-2-message:
\C[3][Maple's Instruction Manual]
It describes how you need to
\C[2]wait until her friendship is high\C[3] to \C[2]reconcile\C[3].
\C[6]The strongest doll, Maple, is a lonesome girl.

\.\C[6]You shouldn't use violence with her. What's important
is sympathizing with her and being her friend.

\.\C[6]Understanding her emotions and
becoming a good friend is the key to peace.
7-1-message:
\C[3]Green books from the library.
They're about the strongest doll, Maple.

\C[6]Hey there! It's me!
For Death Game participants around the nation
troubled by Obstructors, I bear good tidings!

\.\C[6]Believe it or not, I'll tell you the weakness
of the strongest Obstructor doll, Maple!

\.\C[6]It's the crevice in her back!
Remember this, and you'll soon be an Obstructor Master!

\C[6]A follow-up report! A new weakness has been discovered
for strongest of the dolls Maple!

\.\C[6]The key is the link between emotions and colors!
Red is anger, blue is sadness, yellow is joy! WOW!

\.\C[6]Knowing is half the battle!
Remember this, and you'll soon be an Obstructor King!

\C[6]The secret's out! The hitherto unknown weakness
of strongest doll Maple, laid bare!

\.\C[6]"When she's happy, have fun together!"
"When she's angry, hear her out!"
"When she's sad, show her kindness!"

\.\C[6]Be sure to treat her with care!
Remember this, and you'll soon be an Obstructor God!

2-1-message: \C[3]Ranmaru's collar is making a warning sound.
"Now, take a look at the monitor on the ceiling."

"That's the number of people
 who will be sent a shock next."
\."What happens when the shocks come in...?"

\."That's the first shock!
 You get more \C[2]electrified\C[0] each time you're zapped!"

\."That was the second shock...
 And if you get more and more electrified..."

\."If you take \C[2]a fourth shock\C[0]...
 You'll \C[2]pass out\C[0]!"

\."If \C[2]just one person faints\C[0], you \C[2]fail\C[0] this game.
 And you know what that means..."

\."But there is just one way
 of resetting your charge back to zero!"
"Tadaaa! Wires connecting your collars to one another!"
\."Hey, miss Sara? Press that switch next to you."

\."Ahaha! Electricity flows to
 \C[2]the person who pressed the switch\C[0]!"
\."In exchange... well, just take a look!"
"\C[2]The other people on your circuit\C[0] got reset, see?"

"Absorb charge onto yourself to protect others...
 That's what the game is!"

\."Didn't I say that already? Unlike everyone else,
 Ranmaru has to gather electricity."
\."Plenty of it... enough to make him faint."

\."So basically, \C[2]give charge to Ranmaru,
 and keep it off the others\C[0]. That's it!"
\."Well then, it's about time to get started."

\."Why...? Because I'm still electrified!
 That's unfair!"

\."I've put everyone at 1 charge to make it even!
 Okay, now have fun!"

\."Ahaha, nice and obedient!
 Well, good luck!"
\."Your goal is \C[2]to gather electricity on Ranmaru only\C[0]."

\."Every turn, shocks will be sent
 to a few people at random."

\."If you press the switch, you'll receive a shock,
 but those on the same circuit as you will get reset."

\."If you've taken three shocks, you're in danger.
 \C[2]A fourth will make you faint!\C[0]"
\."Try your best to send your charge to Ranmaru!"
\C[3]Ranmaru's collar is making a warning sound.

Clear my charge first
Let's start now

3-1-message: "Grab the electrodes, everyone! I'm turning it on...!"

\."Whoa there, you'll fail if you let go!
 Just stay riiight where you are."

\."Listen up! The objective of this game
 is to \C[2]gather electricity on Ranmaru\C[0]."

\."The electrodes you're holding onto
 will \C[2]be sent electric shocks at random\C[0]..."
\."So do your best sending that current toward Ranmaru!"

1-1-message:
\."Aw, c'mon... Not even a hello?
 They're fine, just fine. You'll meet 'em soon..."
"What in the world is this place...?!"

\."Oops, pardon me. I'm Meister,
 who'll be overseeing proceedings for the banquet."
\."Now, I'm gonna have you select a \C[2]challenger\C[0]."
\."What are you gonna make us do, meow?!"
\."Whoa now... Can't tell you that yet."

\."The game is \C[2]Russian Roulette\C[0]...
 It's a test of luck between the challengers."
"Allow me to introduce the other challenger..."
\."Ahaha. Now, which coffin will you pick first?"
\."The challengers... will go in these coffins."

\."Why, they're just the same kind
 that were in the cemetery! No traps here."
\."And they're brand new and unused... Lucky you!"
\."If you're scared, want me to pick first?"

\."A-At any rate... Let's look 'em over
 to make sure there's nothin' suspicious!!"
1-1-choice:
Where is everyone?!
What is this place...?
1-3-message:
"A-Alright...
 But let us check 'em a li'l more...!"

"No need to put your sticky hands all over them...
 There's no difference between the two coffins."
\."Nothin' suspect. We'll go with the one Sara picked."

\."Okie-dokie!
 Then I'll go in the one you didn't pick!"

\."Now for you to decide on a challenger...
 Feel free to take your time thinkin' it over."

\."Though not so long the Dummies
 run out of battery, 'course."

\."W-What should we do?! Who's gonna be confident
 once we know what the game's like...?!"

\."H-Hey! What do we do?! Should we volunteer ourselves,
 or recommend who would be best...?!"

\."What to do...?
 Guessing the challenger will be in danger, as ever..."

\."I'm offering you a hint...
 seeing as you have the disadvantage."
\."I'm... always the one being protected, woof..."

\."You're all nice, so you'd never pick me
 at times like this, meow..."
\."But... if that meant only I survived..."

\."I'm sure I'd regret it, woof...
 I'd feel like I was a burden...!"
\."So I want you to let me do it, woof...!!"

\."I wanna know there were people
 who I saved by being there, woof!!"
\."Because... I love all of you guys...!!"
"Now let's move on... It's about time to start."

1-4-message: \C[4](Ah...?! The platform rotated?!)

"Incredible, eh? Using this machine,
 you guys gotta locate \N[4]."

\."Yep... in one of these nine coffins.
 Whoever \C[2]hits their target first wins\C[0]!"
\."That is the Russian Roulette Banquet!"
\."Y-You mean..."
\.\C[10]"Naturally... the challenger dies if they're hit."
\."Then... Gin's life is on the line...?!"
\."That means..."
\.\C[10]"Naturally... the challenger dies if they're hit."
\."So Gin's life is on the line...?!"
"Hey! Let us out of here!"
"Are you outside, meow?! Big sis Sara!"

\."They're completely soundproofed in there,
 but as you can see, you can talk via monitors!"
"Ahhh... I can't see anything from here, meow!!"
\C[4](If only I'd known... I should've gone in there!!)
"...Don't get it twisted, Sara."

\."We're the ones who can properly
 observe the situation from out here...!"
"Hmph... What has you down, Sara Chidouin?"
\."I mean..."

\."We are the only ones who can properly
 observe the situation from outside!"
"...Don't be thinking anything foolish, miss Sara."

\."We're the only ones who can properly
 observe things from outside... got it?"

\.\C[4](That's right...
 What's important is winning and surviving...)
\.\C[4](I'll win, and save Gin...!!)

\."Ah, and by the way, it's a team battle,
 so \N[4] needs a button-pusher too..."
\."Meaning I'll push the buttons in his stead."
\."You ain't gonna cheat?!"

\."...My cheating is \N[4]'s cheating.
 We'll share responsibility."

\."You better not cheat, yourselves.
 Rule-breakers... get death."
\.\C[4](As if we even could...!)

\."Well then, once we decide the turn order,
 we can get started..."

\."I'd say it's fine for Team Gin to go first,
 having the disadvantage."
\."...Alright."
\."Went a little long, huh? Let's start already..."
\."Russian Roulette: Banquet Edition... Begin!"

1-1-message:
\C[4](I have to pick the statements of \N[4]'s
 that seem most \C[2]refutable\C[4]...!)
\.\C[4](I'll make him unable to think this over properly!!)
3-1-message: \C[3]An extremely heavy air dominates the space.
\.\C[4](From what we heard... the rules are simple.)

\.\C[4](Nine coffins... If Gin is picked, we lose.
 If \N[4] is hit, we win.)
"Of course, I can't imagine it's that simple."

\.\C[4](Above all... It's strange that \N[4],
 who should be in a coffin, isn't saying anything...)

\.\C[4](It doesn't change what we have to do!
 We'll discuss it together and find an answer...!!)

"By the way, you can \C[2]rotate\C[0] the coffins during
 your discussions if you want. Make good use of it!"
4-1-message:
\sw[324]"Be quiet!
 Stop trying to just rile me up."\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]"I want some time to think about this!"\sw[325]
\C[4](It's better to refute him with logic...)

"\C[2]No way Keiji's inside\C[0]...?
 Why are you able to say that?!"

\."Shouldn't it be most natural for you
 to think that Keiji is inside?!"

"Gin is inconceivable...?
 It's a \C[12]blue\C[0] coffin! It's possible!"

\sw[324]"No it's not! Because Gin's coffin is \C[2]new\C[0]!
 It'd be \C[2]a glowing coffin\C[0]!"\sw[325]
4-3-message: "Did the Coffin Control System really work?!"
\.\sw[324]"I'll explain it to you, so listen up..."\sw[325]

"I'm sure you weren't watching
 whether the videos played or not!"

\sw[324]"Ehh? Anyone could watch them
 if you went to the control room later."\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]"And you brought up the videos
 during your discussions, didn't you?"\sw[325]

"\C[2]The dying moments of the six Dummies\C[0]...?
 That's wrong, \N[4]!"

\."\C[2]Hinako's video\C[0] showed the death of the real Hinako!
 Someone separate from the Dummies Hinako!"
\sw[324]"B-Be quiet! What do those details matter now?!"\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]"What's important is...
 The Coffin Control System \C[2]functioned properly\C[0]."\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]"Because the victim videos were set to play
 as a \C[2]reward\C[0] for activating it!"\sw[325]

\sw[324]"At any rate, the real question
 is \C[2]Keiji's actions afterward\C[0]...!"\sw[325]
4-5-message: "The \C[2]Shin\C[0] AI was only in the control room on Floor 5!"

\."There's no way Keiji could've talked to him
 while he was \C[2]stuck on Floor 4\C[0]!"

\sw[324]"T-Then he heard it from Maple!
 That settles it!"\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]"Having learned about the banquet,
 Keiji began his \C[2]scheme\C[0] to ensnare me...!"\sw[325]
4-7-message:
"Put something else in...
 How would you know that?!"

\sw[324]"Because \C[2]the banquet won't start\C[0]
 if any of the coffins are empty."\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]"These coffins can \C[2]detect their contents\C[0], you see."\sw[325]

"A doll of you, \N[4]...?!
 Where would he acquire something like that?!"
\sw[324]"You didn't see it, but one was on that floor!"\sw[325]

\sw[324]"I'd prefer if you didn't blame
 your deficient searching efforts on me."\sw[325]

"The contents are identified by the \C[2]type of collar\C[0]...?
 That's the first I'm hearing this!"
\.\sw[324]"Right, because it's the first I'm telling you."\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]"After all, both \C[2]humans and dolls\C[0] would be
 reduced to \C[2]cinders\C[0] by the \C[2]cremation system\C[0], right?"\sw[325]

\.\sw[324]"So only \C[2]things that can withstand the heat\C[0]
 would \C[2]remain in the coffin\C[0]..."\sw[325]
\sw[324]"And Keiji must have thought like so...!"\sw[325]
4-9-message: "No, I'm sure he thought of another way!"
\sw[324]"Then by all means, tell me what that way is...!"\sw[325]
\C[4](I can't answer that, but...!)

"He \C[2]used your collar\C[0], \N[4]...?
 That's impossible!"

\."Your collar would show
 the same thing as the Dummies... \C[10]red\C[0]!"
\."But what actually came up was \C[12]blue\C[0]!!"
\."How do you intend to explain that contradiction?!"
\.\sw[324]"You're being so annoying right now!!"\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]"I don't know, so I'm thinking about it!!"\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]"And you're getting in the way...!"\sw[325]
\."There's only one answer that makes sense."
"It's simple..."
\."Your reasoning... has all been \C[2]way off the mark\C[0]!!"
\C[4](I did it... I refuted them all...)
"What you wanted...?! What do you mean?!"

\sw[324]"I had it purposefully prepared
 as a gimmick for the banquet."\sw[325]
\.\sw[324]"Knowing someone would use it for deception!"\sw[325]
\C[4](How far has he planned this out...?!)

3-1-message:
\.\C[5]"...I'd like to know soon.
 About that Death Game you were involved in."

\.\C[5]"I just find myself wanting
 to hear your story again and again..."

\.\C[5]"It's not anything too difficult, is it?
 I'm begging you..."

A normal high school girl, \C[2]Sara Chidouin\C[0].
And her best friend, \C[2]Jou Tazuna (Joe)\C[0].
One day, they were pulled into a cruel Death Game...

Rather than submit to fear,
they chose to cooperate with the other participants...\|\|

But alas, high school teacher \C[2]Kazumi Mishima\C[0]
became the first victim.
There was no stopping that they would \C[10]kill each other\C[0].

After a cruel majority vote,
homemaker \C[2]Kai Satou\C[0] died...

And Sara's best friend Joe died as well,
unable to defy his fate.
As her heart crumbled, the peril only continued...
3-1-choice:
I told you once before
Understood
3-3-message: The next victim was singer-songwriter \C[2]Reko Yabusame\C[0].
The next victim was murderer \C[2]Alice Yabusame\C[0].

As desperately as they tried to grasp escape,
their enemies gave their very lives to stop it.

When the Main Game occurred once more,
art student \C[2]Nao Egokoro\C[0] died.
3-5-message: The next victim was middle-schooler \C[2]Kanna Kizuchi\C[0].

And \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0], who'd failed to protect Kanna,
was left with a strong hatred of Sara...
So he started up a malicious Joe AI, and...
Sara forgot that Joe even existed...\|
\.The Death Game... is not over yet.

The next victim was
self-described job-hopper \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0].

After removing his collar,
using the last of his strength...
He started up a Joe AI.

\.At last, Sara reunited with her best friend,
and awoke from her long nightmare.
The Death Game... is not over yet.
\C[10]6 Remain
Very good... Now, try to remember more.
After this... a new game begins.

The location: a cemetery.
Inside one of the 7 coffins was...

The real \C[2]Sou Hiyori\C[0]...\!\SE[poka01,90]\sw[324]
The one thought killed by the murderer Alice Yabusame.
That reminds me... What name did you call him by?
No... Surely that wasn't it.

\C[2]\N[4]\C[0]...
Is that right?
Alrighty... Back to the story.

The coffins also contained
6 people known as the \C[2]Dummies\C[0]...
\.Doll copies of those who died before meeting anyone.\|\|
\.Work with them to \C[2]kill \N[4]\C[0]...
\.That was the goal of the \C[2]Murderer Game\C[0].

However... the Dummies' secret objective
was to \C[2]kill the survivors\C[0]...
Those pitiful dolls were made to turn traitor.

\C[2]Q-taro Burgerberg\C[0] was stabbed in the back,
but even so, chose to trust the Dummies...

Yet as it came to light \N[4] was involved
in \C[2]Keiji Shinogi\C[0]'s past, the situation took a turn.

Realizing he had been tricked into
killing his benefactor by his own hand...
\.Keiji tried to kill \N[4] in a rage.

But with the Dummies refusing to cooperate...
he failed.
Keiji's execution was at hand...
However... there existed just one way to save him.
For you, Sara... to sign this consent form.
Now... let us resume the story.
