360-0-message:
Sara Chidouin
Protagonist of the story. A normal high school girl
attending Sonobeno High School.

\.Coming home from school, she encounters her stalker.
When she hurries home, she finds her mother collapsed.

\.She comes to in an unknown room.
Enduring various death games with 11 participants,
Sara wins their trust.

\.But in the Main Game, she loses her best friend Joe.
With the deaths of high school teacher Mishima
and homemaker Kai, there remain 9 survivors...
361-0-message:
Jou Tazuna
Protagonist Sara's classmate.
A cheerful and agreeable best friend.

\.He clumsily tried to assist Sara after learning of her
stalker. Sara's lone acquaintance in the Death Game.

\.His fate was sealed by drawing the \C[10]Sacrifice card\C[0].
At the end of the Main Game, he left the remark
"all of you must be good people," then perished.
362-0-message:
Keiji Shinogi
A suspicious man calling himself a policeman.

\.Acts casual, but feels somehow shady.
He often seems to be guiding others
into giving Sara their trust.

\.Confessed that he once shot a person,
and hasn't been able to fire a gun since.

\.He promised Sara he'd tell her his past
if they survived the Main Game, but who knows...
363-0-message:
Kanna Kizuchi
A middle school girl. Lost her older sister
in the First Trial.

\.Filled with self-loathing after losing her sister,
Sara and Mishima told her a kind lie. But Miley's
"sister-killer" remark meant it only wounded her more.

\.In the Main Game, Kanna notably made statements
implying she was working with Sou. What might have
transpired between the two of them... is unknown.
364-0-message:
Q-taro Burgerberg
According to him, a baseball player
on the verge of a comeback.

\.Despite his giant, gaudy appearance, he's very wary.
Apparently he was raised in an odd orphanage,
so his dialect is all over the place.

\.Found his resolve faster than anyone in the Main Game,
showing a willingness to doubt others to survive.

\.Unable to fully believe Kai's parting
confession of having contact with the kidnappers,
he's showing signs of looking into the truth.
365-0-message:
Sou Hiyori
A self-described job-hopper.
He was a timid-looking man who spoke with a smile...

\.Though unbelievably weak for an adult man
and seeming as if he disliked conflict,
everything about him gives off a "darkness."

\.He was very shocked to be attacked by Nao
and have the laptop clue stolen from him.

\.In the Main Game, Sou lost trust and transformed,
seemingly filled with malice and madness.
The sight struck fear and hatred into the survivors.
366-0-message:
Reko Yabusame
A singer-songwriter starting to get enough attention
to appear in magazines.

\.A flashy band player worried for her dear bongos.
Kind to the weak, and often harsh on men.

\.In the Main Game, revealed Alice was her brother.
Ever since Alice committed murder,
the two became effective strangers.
367-0-message:
Nao Egokoro
An art student in college.
Respects her high school teacher, Professor Mishima.

\.Has a deep relationship of trust with Mishima,
and beat the First Trial by cooperating with him.

\.After losing Mishima in the so-called practice vote,
Nao ran amok, stuffing his head in a box and fleeing.

\.Threatened by Kai, she attacked Sou to get Kai
the laptop, but because Mishima's head disappeared,
she realized Kai betrayed her.
368-0-message:
Kai Satou
A self-proclaimed homemaker.
...But also, an extremely skilled fighter.

\.In spite of the aloof impression he gave,
Sara remembered that Kai was the stalker
who came after her that day.

\.Threatened Nao and took the laptop from Sou,
and it's suspected he hid the Mishima head
Nao was protecting somewhere.

\.Confessed to having contact with the kidnappers
in the Main Game, but shows clear hostility
toward the kidnapper Miley.

\.Sou revealed emails indicating ties to the Chidouins
(Sara's family) and an affection for Sara. But killed
as a victim, can the truth about Kai be known...?
369-0-message:
Gin Ibushi
A somewhat cheeky grade-school boy
who ends his sentences with "woof" and "meow."

\.Adores "big sis Sara," and acted tough through
the harsh Death Games, but was wracked with fear
upon being trapped in a cage.

\.The paper Gin found in the shredder revealed
the truth that Alice Yabusame was a murderer.
370-0-message:
Kazumi Mishima
A high school teacher who looks extremely suspicious,
but is really a man of noble character.

\.Deeply trusting of his former student Nao,
together, they conquered the First Trial.

\.But not taking any chances regarding his student,
he gathered votes for himself in the practice round,
and thus lost his life.

\.This threw Nao's heart into disarray, making her
lose control, stuff Mishima's head in a box, and flee.
371-0-message:
Alice Yabusame
A murderer who lied that he was
a thief named Gonbee Yamada.

\.While the other survivors endured traps,
he locked himself alone in the Red Room,
hiding there until Sara found him.

\.In the Main Game, he confessed to being Alice Yabusame,
a murderer, and Reko's older brother.

\.Furthermore, after the Main Game,
Alice discussed something with Keiji.
"The name of the person I killed was Sou Hiyori"...
372-0-message:
The Laughing Doll, Sue Miley
A woman with the kidnappers. When her scattered doll
body was assembled, the room suddenly went white,
and she began to move.

\.Calling herself the Floor Master,
she explains the Main Game and distributes
necessary tools for the Death Game.

\.With malicious words and actions,
she puzzles the participants and takes their lives,
and destroyed the hearts of Kanna and Sara.

\.Kai and Q-taro's resistance has made her bleed,
and she's often chagrined. ...Is she really a "doll"?

"Okay, not the time for that negotiation crap!

"Want me to be honest?"

\."Ahh, good.
 I've got somethin' to say, so I'll call everybody!"
\."We got the raggedy bunch all together now?"
\."Stop callin' us names, you!!"

\."The Sub-Game's three days... The date hasn't changed.
 Shouldn't be over yet, should it...?"

\."Oh yeah, there's still time!
 I want you to enjoy the Sub-Game, but see..."

\."Y'all are fallin' apart!
 Makes me sick to my stomach to see."
\."Then... let us go home, please!!"
\."Not like that, dummy."
\."What I am telling you is this: come and take a bath!"
\."A... Are there baths?!"

\."Yep, and we'll do laundry too.
 So hand over yer clothes!"
\."Say what?! What're you planning to do?!"
\."I've got no interest in your filthy garb!"
\.\C[10]"I only like clean clothes from corpses... Ahaha."
\."Your heart's dirtier than mud, meow!"
\."But if we can have a bath... I'm glad about that."

\."E-Everyone! It's dangerous to resist...!
 Let's go in! Let's all take a bath!"
\.\C[4](She's right...! We should go along with this!)
\."Not like you got any right to refuse!"

\."We'll be taking men to the men's bath
 and women to the women's bath!"

\."Ah, come to think of it,
 which one do you wanna go in, Alice?"
\.\{"I'm a man, I tell you!!"
\."Man, I'm spent..."
\.\C[4](There really are baths...!)
\."Wooow! Amazing!!"
\."L... Let's get in quickly!!"
\."Wait, wait! Gotta take off my makeup super quick!!"
\.\C[4](Everyone's full of energy like never before...!)

\.\C[4](For just a moment...
 Let's forget about everything and soak!!)
\."Haaah..."
\."It's paradise..."
\."Yes, it really is..."

\.\C[3]However temporarily, I forgot about
all the bad things that had happened.

\.\C[3]Everyone's smiles naturally returned to them,
and we chatted without worrying about little things.

\.\C[3]Even if we'd be thrust back to reality when we left...
I felt like staying in this dream as long as I could.
\.\C[3]Even Kanna... I could talk to normally right now.
\."Haha... What is it, Kanna?"
\."...Excuse me...!!"

\."W-Waugh?!
 Stop it! Kanna!!"
\.\C[3]And so we had the most wonderful time.

\.\C[3]Suddenly, my attention was caught by
the rock wall across from me.
\.\C[4](Do I hear... voices coming through...?)
\.\C[4](Don't tell me...)
"Something up, Sara?"
"N-Nothing...!"

\.\C[4](There's a tiny hole in this rock wall...
 the size of one of my fingers!)
\.\C[4](You don't suppose... the men's bath is through here?)
\.\C[4](What do I do? It's pure luck I even noticed this...)
\.\C[4](It... might be wise not to let the others know.)

\.\C[4](Y-Yes, that's it... One of them might have been
 peeking at us! I should inspect to make sure!)

\.\C[4](It's not like I want to peek at them, of course!
 This is just... to uphold justice!)
\.\C[4](A-All right, here goes..! Urk...)

\C[3]I peeped through the hole with unclouded eyes,
so as to ascertain the truth.
\{"Hwooooohhh!!"
\."I ain't gonna lose this race, y'hear?!"
\."Don't be ridiculous! I'm the fastest, yooooou!!"
\."Hah... Don't tucker yourself out early, now."

\."Muscle gorilla! And the rest of you!

871-0-message:
"If we or any of the pairs get too far apart,
 only my collar'll activate. So careful, Sara."
"Uhh... So is just Sara fine?"
\."Of course. We're probably about the same grade..."

\."You sure? You aren't gonna come to me later
 saying you were actually my senior?"

\.\C[4](I don't think this is the time to be
 worried about junior-senior relations...)

 Got it, Ranmaru?"

 That's weird, right?!"
\."...Well, Ranmaru is the only name I heard..."

\."Ah... right... No, well, look, we can just use
 each other's first names, right? Less of a pain..."
\."Could you call me Mistress Sara?"

\."Now that's just weird!
 Don't go making this a master-servant relationship!!"
\.\C[4](Guess that's a tough demand...)

\."You're just wanting to make fun of me

\."More importantly, do you have any info?"

\."It's about these red threads on our collars
 that connect us..."

\."If the people in a pair get some distance apart,
 their collars activate and their heads fly off."
\."What the...?!"

\."Well... actually, that's only for us supports.
 Your collar won't activate, Sara."
\."So only your collar would...?"

\."S-So don't get too far from me, okay?
 Let's put our differences aside..."

872-0-message:
"Our real selves died in the First Trial...

\."Y-Yeah."

\."Urgh... I can't think of anything."

873-0-message:
"Apparently six victims of the First Trial
 who had no acquaintance with you guys
 were chosen as the supports."
"...Hey there, Sara-senpai."
\."Senpai...?"

\."You not a fan of that?
 To me, high school students are like adults..."
\."You can call me what you like, Hinako."

\."Great, Sara-senpai.
 ...Glad you're someone who talks sense."
\."Oh yeah, I'll tell you a piece of info."

\."The requirement for us being chosen as supports...
 It's that we're dead people who never
 had any contact with you survivors."

\."I heard 8 people died in the First Trial,
 so 2 of them must've already known survivors."
\.\C[4](Kanna's sister... and Megumi Sasahara, I suppose.)

\."I have another big piece of info...
 But I can't say it yet."

\."Haha... If you just reveal your entire hand...
 You'll get used as a pawn, right?"
\."Nobody likes being used..."
"I'd never do such a thing."

\."When their life's on the line,
 who knows what kind of evils someone will do...
 I thought you'd know that even better than me?"

\."This is my means of defense...
 Don't be mad at me, Sara-senpai."
"I want us to be friends, Hinako."
\."Oh, neat. Are we going on a date?"
\."Don't tease me."

\."It might take a little more time to hit "friendly."
 ...I'm shy, you see."
\C[10]"Mwahaha... You saw right through me."
\."...You're a terrible actor, Sara-senpai."
\."Haha... I'll tell you whenever I can trust you."

\."You saw my victim video, did you...?"

875-0-message:
"'Parently monsters lurk on this floor.
 Oughta round up some weapons."
"Bwahaha... You're Sara Chidouin, ain't ya?"
\."Is something funny, Mr. Kurumada?"
\."Sure is. You're just a plain ol' high schooler."
\."Way to survive, am I right? Straight-up amazin'."

"It's been a close call at every turn.
 I've just been lucky..."

\."Strong folks are blessed by luck.
 'Course, I had zilch."

\."If you're all focused on winning,
 things can fall apart pretty quick, y'know?
 Oughta keep that in mind."
\."W-Winning..."
"It's thanks to my allies. We all help each other..."
\."Allies, huh?"

\."Well, alright then. Guess that was
 the right call after all if you're still alive."
"Even if I have, we've made many sacrifices..."
\."I've lost... countless allies..."
\."Don't go makin' allies, dumbass."
\."My bad, my bad. Forget I said it."

\."Oh yeah, but really, I should tell you.
 'Parently there's \C[2]monsters\C[0] lurking on this floor."
\."Monsters?"

\."Probably just dolls, really, but it'll spell tragedy
 if we don't get weapons. You ever been in a fight?"
\."Not the violent sort, naturally."

\."Then you have your fluffy-mop buddy give 'em hell.
 Maybe if you give 'im a good smooch,
 he'll work his butt off for ya."

\."No, if someone else is going to fight for their life,
 I'm going to fight for my life too."
\."I see, I see. You're real interestin'."

1793-0-message: "Mind if I ask you for the details?"
It was... when I was young still.
\."Well, I'd hope as much... from a test such as this."

\."E-Erm...! Be careful, Father! If you stay here,
 you'll breathe in the gas yourself!"
\."...You need only think about your own self."

\."After poison resistance training, we move onto
 shock resistance training. Master it."
\.\C[4](I have to do it... for Father's sake!)
"Erm... could I be given a break, though...?"

\."You can't mean to say...
 such a trifling thing as this has exhausted you?"
\."Do you think you get the choice, Kai?"
\."Please, let me do the next round of training."
\."Very well. Never speak something so spineless again."

\."And once you've completed your tasks,
 there is someone I shall introduce to you."

\."You wouldn't be able to taste it properly
 if it followed poison training, yes?"
\."So give this next training your all."
\C[4](Who will he be introducing to me, I wonder...)
\C[4](Haha, I wonder what kind of cake it'll be?)

\C[4](Chocolate cake? A Mont Blanc...? Ooh...
 I'll have to get my sense of taste back to normal!)

\."You're being watched.
 Don't show such miserable weakness."

\."He has similarly undergone training by
 the organization, at the same age as you...
 and is similarly excellent."

\."Certain circumstances have left Sei
 with nowhere to stay at present."

\."So from today forth, I have arranged for him
 to become part of our family."

\."Whoa, really slow on the uptake, aren'tcha?
 Didn't you just hear him?"
\."I mean that Sei will be your sibling, Kai."

\."Don't goof with me!
 Why the hell would I be below you, huh?"
\."S-Shaddup! You tryin' to rile me up?!"
\."Listen here, punk, I'm not your little ANYTHING."

\."The superior one must be called "big brudder"!
 Got that, bastard?"
\."No, the eldest son must be the superior one."
\."Become a person worthy of carrying the Satou family."
\."Indeed. Have you anything else to say, Kai?"

\."At any rate, you two will undergo the same training.
 It is a settled matter."

\."Both of you, show me your capabilities
 to their fullest extent. I expect much of you."

\."Gotcha, pops.
 ...Err, old man Gashu, I guess."

\."Well, that's enough introduction.
 Let us eat the cake."

\."...?
 Well, tiramisu is the most delicious."

\.\c[4](Did Father bring in that crude boy...
 because he considered me a disappointment...?)
\."Do I freak you out that much, bastard?"
\."Shut up! I'm Kai! Call me by my name!"
\."Hmm, maybe if you call me "big brudder"...?"
\."Nuh-uh, you're definitely a shorty next to me."
\."D-Don't pet me! How rude can you be?!"

\."I was taught by Father!
 I won't stand for you disparaging him!"
\."Your pops has gotta shave that stubble."
\."Ooh, what a good little listener you are, Kai!"
\."D-Don't pet me! How rude can you be?!"
"Bastard...! You gonna lash out at me?!"

\."Cheeky little squirt...
 This calls for some discipline!"

\."We're gonna be killers, aren't we?
 What's "fairness" mean there?"

\."Might makes right - end of story.
 Smell ya."
"Guess that's all you got, huh, little bro?"
\."Gonna reply? Gonna call me big brudder?"

\."We're gonna be killers, aren't we?
 Oughta learn that might makes right, yeah?"
\."I can't lose... to someone like him...!"
\."You must at least maintain your promise."
\."You did promise in front of me, did you not?"

\."Hmm? What's wrooong?
 Something stuck in your ears, Kai?"
\."Ha ha ha, sure thing! I'll forgive you!"

\."If you're regretful, then crawl your way up.
 ...For that was not yet a real battle."
\."Hey dad, you got anything for me?"
\."...Heh heh! Right?! Aren't I the greatest?!"

\."...Ahh, hmph. Tiramisu resistance training
 might be the toughest of all..."
\.\C[4](Father... He hasn't forsaken me, I'm sure of it!)
\.\C[4](I need... I need to be stronger...!)

\."H-Hey, take a little break.
 Any more than this would just be..."

\."Alright, alright...!
 I'll teach you if you stop glaring like that!"
\."Okay, I'll let you pick. What do you want to train?"
\."Alright! Attack training it is! Pay close attention!"
\."Augh, that's dirty! You sent me into a trap, bastard!"

\."Incorrect, Gashu.
 The one you took in."
\."You don't look too happy about it, considering."
\."The biased affection of a parent... creates tragedy."
\."Ah, it seems those two are training outside."

\."You're still at it...?!
 You two... you're going to die like that, I mean it!"
\."Heh heh... Then let's bring him an early death, huh?"
\."As if I'd die before you, big brudder...!"

\."Stop it already!
 Fine, what do you want to learn next?"
\."Alright! Attack training it is! Ready yourself!"
\."Huh?! If you're sleeping, so am I!"
\."Did you come to watch us train, dad?"

\."An executive came to visit today.
 And offered the greatest of praise for you."
\."This will not cut it... you can grow further still."

\."Heh! That's right! I'm gonna be way more amazing
 than somebody like Kai, for sure!"
\."I-I'm not letting you beat me either! ...Uh, sir!"
\."I have high hopes for you, Kai, Sei."

\."I definitely did the better job
 showing my stuff today, don'tcha think?"

\."Big brudder... you haven't been
 speaking to Father with respect."
\."He never tells me I gotta do that."

\."Geez, that's a weakling for ya. Scrambling for ways
 to score points even where it doesn't matter..."

\."Whaaat?
 I gotta beat you senseless again for you to get it?"
\."You were always just... an outsider, and yet...!"
\."Fine, I get you. You really want a butt-kicking, huh?"
\."I'll spoil you rotten, my useless little brother!"
\."If you're... gonna be a killer... y'know?"
\."If it's gonna be this way... then what even am I...?!"
\."I'm just... At any rate, I'm just...!"
\."No matter how hard I try... I'll just be a pawn...!!"
\."I'm a rival, brought in to raise you up...!"

\."I-It's not like, like he...
 invited me into the family because he wanted to..."
\."No one's s-seriously looking at the likes of me..."
\."He... he's dead. My pops... my real dad..."
\."All this shady organization crap... it's so stupid..."

\."If we can't meet anymore... then you should've
 died before I was born, you bastard...!!"

\C[3]I felt like I was hearing Sei's real voice
for the first time.
\.\C[3]I get it. Because.. I wanted recognition for winning.
"So his moments of kindness... are very few."

"I didn't want even those short moments...
 to go to someone else..."
\C[3]And yet, perhaps we were both starved for it...
\."D-Don't be stupid! We've still got two tasks left...!"
\."Ahaha! Then let's give this next one our all!"
\."Sei, have you gotten a bit taller?"

\."It seems... I may be able to get a rare holiday.
 Only for one day, but..."
\."Let us go on an outing somewhere. ...As a family."

\."Ahem. Very well then, that's enough talk.
 Get to your training now."

"...So you see, Kai and Sei have undeniably
 grown to be essential assets to the organization."

\."These results exceed those of any other house.
 Those two may just..."
\."I don't doubt they'll be first-class assassins."
\."...So. Regarding the matter of our holiday..."
\."When someone is first-class... you don't need two."

\."There may come a time...
 for a trial meant to test assassins."

\."Why do you think we began raising assassins
 from a variety of houses at all once?"

\."Was it not... to form a powerful group with which
 to take root in the underworld...?"
\."Surely you jest. We've long since taken root."
\."What we require is a powerful right-hand man."
\."And indeed, one needs only one right hand."
\."Oh, but I'm sure you do, Gashu."
\."There should be no cause for fear, you know..."
\."Do you plan to have my sons... kill each other...?!"

\."Gathering assassin candidates from each family,
 a single assassin shall be decided upon."

\."Whether they're able to kill another human...
 That is the final, and most essential quality we need."

\."Surely the more talented assets you have,
 the better...?!"
\."Don't tell me... you would defy the organization?"

\."It would seem you've raised them
 with considerable affection..."
\."...Your true loyalty is now being tested."

\."The organization is God.
 Yes? Isn't that right?"

\."God is preparing to offer you a fantastic seat...
 You, and your family..."

\."However, should you defy God...
 their blood will surely spill."

\."Go on, make your choice.
 Will you perish in fear of God's power..."
\."Or devote yourself to him, and become a hero?"
\."Let's run, Sei! Let's get off this island...!!"

\."What do you mean, why?! You don't know?!
 They... they've all gone insane!!"

\."That one in the green clothes back there...
 He killed someone! The others... killed each other...!"

\."The hell, man... This ain't the time
 to suggest fighting together, is it?"

\."Idiot! Assassins don't need to
 murder each other like this!"
\."There's no reason to take part in this...!"
\."If we aren't able to kill... our life has no value..."

\."If you're that torn up over it,
 then I'll take you out, ya bastard."
\."What's the problem? You're worthless right now."
\."I don't want... to kill you, Sei...!!"

\."Ever since... those holiday plans he promised...
 fell through..."
\."Dad... became cold all of a sudden..."
\."He had us do the most hellish training..."

\."Even though, not too long ago...
 he was the kinda guy to give us cake..."

\."He simply... imposed a higher level
 of training on us, that's all..."
\."We were doing... the same training! But..."

\."It was different... it definitely was!
 When he was teaching you... dad... dad...!!"

\."Well, fine! So that's why...!
 That's why I can't beat you anymore, Kai!"
\."I'm not inferior to you, Kai! I haven't been bested!!"
\."Don't you dare go easy on me!!"

"Kai... I thought you...
 at least you would actually look at me...!"
\."Take this seriously... I... I don't really..."
"Dammit... if I'd just offed you two..."
\.\C[4](No!! A wound like this is...! Ahhh...!)
\."I always... thought it'd end up like this..."

\."Dying a damn miserable death...
 Still without anybody's recognition..."

\."Don't speak!
 I'll... I'll find a way to treat this!"
\."It wouldn't... feel... as lonely... that way..."
\.\C[3]Just barely... I could still hear his breathing.
\.\C[3]A quiet sound, nearly erased by the wind.
\.\C[3]After a swell that sent leaves into the air...

\."With this... you will be able to conduct a duty
 that is close to God indeed."
\."How does it feel, having served your God?"

\."Right, then. You ought to get your appearance
 in proper order, Gashu."

"Think only of your duty.
 Discard all unnecessary feelings."

\."Obey the organization, and be honored
 to devote yourself to it."
\."I shall present you your first duty."

\."Ultimately... I made it to the present day
 still being unable to kill anyone."

\."As hard as I tried...
 I kept remembering the sight of Sei's death."
\."A coward and a weakling... That is what I am."

\."If I had been aware of my own foolishness
 from the beginning..."

\."Perhaps such tragedy would not have unfolded...
 nor would I have aimed to be a first-class killer."
\."So you didn't have to stain your hands with blood..."
\."It's the reason you're here now, being so kind."
\."Well... Sara's gonna be coming home soon."
\."Oh my. I shall hurry to make dinner, then."
\."...Perhaps I should make a cake on occasion."

1797-0-message: \.\C[3]What would you say...
\.\C[3]...is your dream...?

\."...Tch. Finally open your yap again,
 and that's what you got to say...?"

\."Don't go askin' dumbass questions
 right before a show, dammit!"
"Now that's a rare sight..."

"Seein' Reko give Alice a scoldin'...
 That's gotta be a first for me!"
\."Stronghold... It's not like it was a scolding..."

\."Don't sweat it, man! Ain't nobody on the planet
 can live up to Reko's demands, y'get me?"
\."Like, not even Ursheen can! Right?!"
\."You said it, Ursheen!"
\."...I think you misunderstand."

\."I'm just here to round things out at any rate.
 I don't so much as enter Reko's consideration..."
\."...I know. Don't worry about it."

\."\rb[Sa,3]\rb[mu,6-]\rb[rai,Rai] \rb[Ya,8]\rb[i,1]\rb[ba,8] exists thanks to you,
 right, Alice? So quit lookin' so gloomy!"
\."'Sides, fans only got their eyes on Reko anyway!"
\."...Yeah, 'course Ursheen's a fan of Reko too."
"Hey, you guys... What are your dreams...?"

\."Just gettin' to be with Reko...
 That's a dream come true right there, ain't it?!"

\."But always dream bigger, yeah?
 We could get enough lady fans for a harem!"
\."...Does that strike you as feasible?"
\."A dream that could happen ain't a dream!"

\."Right... Well, at any rate, it's clear you two
 are actually finding it enjoyable here."
"Do you two enjoy being in Samurai Yaiba...?"

\."Whoa, Ursheen! You're soundin' like
 a real Reko stalker over here!"

\."I mean yeah, her talent's somethin' else!
 How much can ya learn even seein' it up close?"

\."But I'm fine takin' it easy, y'know?
 For now it's not like I wanna quit, y'know?"

\."I see... You two seem to be enjoying yourselves,
 surprisingly enough..."
"What do you two like about Reko...?"
\."Careful with the love overload, Ursheen!"

\."Me, I see her a li'l more objectively?
 She's got a pretty cool look, y'know?"

\."Thought about kissin' her while she slept once,
 but she broke my nose... Bled like crazy, man!"
\."K-Kiddin'! I'm joshin' ya!"

\."You should well expect a broken nose for that...
 Anyway, it's clear to me you two are having
 a surprisingly enjoyable time."
\."Hmm? You mean you're not havin' fun, Alice?"
\."...Well, yeah, I get it."

\."When you're next to a prodigy like Reko,
 you start to lose sight of who ya even are."
\."..."Who you are," hm..."

\."Bein' connected by blood,
 bein' raised in the same house..."

\."Though to turn that 'round...
 ain't that all that bein' siblings gets ya?"

\."When it comes to your points of view,
 what you can see... you ain't the same, are you?"
\."Feel like ya shouldn't beat yourself up about it."

\."Do you think it's a mistake
 for me to be at Reko's side?"
\."Well, if it were me, I'd run."

\."You'd take his place, Ursheen...?!
 What lengths wouldn't ya go to for Reko?!"
\.\C[4](Once... I asked you the same question...)

\.\C[4](Back when we were...
 still close as brother and sister...)
\C[3]Hey, Reko... what's your dream?
"Huh? What're you asking embarrassing crap for?"

"It's fine, you can tell me!
 See, mine is..."
\."Ugh, I know yours, bro!"
\."Eh? Do you really?"
\."Oh! Could it be... your dream is the same as mine...?"

\."Ah, shaddup! Just get climbin' already!
 We're almost to the secret base!"
\."Ah, wait for meee!"
"We're heeere! Nobody saw us, right?!"

\."Yeesh, I'm exhausted...! This is no park!
 It's like a mountain! A mountain, I tell you!"
\."Quit your whining! We're here now, so who cares."
\."Huh? What's that drum thingy over there, Reko?"
\."Heheh... oh, this?"

\."I cobbled it together from some good-lookin'
 wood I gathered and some tools I bought!"
\."Wha?! You made this, Reko?! That's amazing!"
\."Heheheh! You think so?!"
\."Yeah! I'm suuuper impressed!"
"Hey, Reko, what's it sound like?"
\."You that curious, huh? Well, fine by me!"
\."Hooray! Let me hear it!"
\.\C[4](I wonder... did Reko want to show me this?)
"Hey, Reko, let me have it!"

\."Wha?! I ain't giving it to you!
 Not after my hard work makin' it!"
\."But I wanna try playing it!"
\."I'll play it for ya, then. Be happy with that!"
\."Hooray! Let me hear, let me hear!"
\.\C[4](I wonder... did Reko want to show me this?)

"Could it be the reason you had me
 come to the secret base was to show me this...?"
\."H-Huhhhhh?! What're you on about?!"
\."I-It's nothin' like that!! Don't be a dummy, bro!"
\."I-I'm sorry! Yeah... I must be wrong..."
\."Hey, let me hear that drum, Reko!"

\."Oh? Well geez, if you wanted to hear it,
 you should've just said so!"
\."Hooray!"

\C[3]The cheerful sound of Reko's drum
echoed through the park.
"...Oh? The sound of a drum..."

\."Because it's a day off, perhaps?
 Maybe they're preparing for the festival..."
\."Heehee! Thanks, Reko!"
\."...What's wrong?"
\."How was it? What'd you think, bro?"
"It worked! It actually sounded like a drum!"
\."Not that, dammit!"

\."Don't you get this feeling?
 Like there's something off about the sound..."
\."Something? Like what...?"
\."So you dunno either, bro? Hrmm..."
"That had a great timbre, Reko!"
\."For real?! What about it...?!"
\."Um... what about it? Err..."
\."What the hell! Don't give me a half-hearted remark!"
\."I-I'm sorry... It just sort of felt that way to me..."
"This won't do at all, Reko!"
\."W-What? What part...?!"
\."Err... you know, like..."
\."Your... posture?"
\."The hell?! Don't just say whatever!"

\."Guess I got my hopes up a little.
 Thought you might be thinkin' the same thing I was..."
\."Huh? What do you mean...?"
\."Well... it's just..."
"I didn't really feel much of anything..."
\."W-What the...?! After I played it for you?!"

\."C'mon, bro... You've gotta give me
 a "good" or a "bad" at least!"
\."S-Sorry..."
\."Tch... Well, fine."
\."This sound kinda... doesn't feel good to me..."
\.\C[4](My... Reko feels there's something off, does she?)
\.\C[4](She must have worked hard to make it...)
\.\C[4](In that case, I have to help her...!)
\."All right! Let's try to improve it together, Reko!"
\."Wha?! You mean it, bro?!"

\."You can count on me for anything with instruments!
 I mean, I'm always teaching you piano, right?"
\."Good point! Guess I'll trust ya!"

\."But let's go home for today, okay?
 Our parents will get worried."
\."Huh?! Man, fine..."
\."But next time we're here... you just gotta!"
\."Brrr... It's cold today..."
\."Look out the window. It's really pouring..."
\."Shoot! I gotta go!!"
"Reko...?! Ah, hold on!"
"*pant*...! *pant*...! Reko...!"
\.\C[4](Sure enough, she was here...)
\."Sheesh! Don't worry me like that, Reko!"
\."A-Are you listening?! Hey!"

\."Let's get home, Reko...
 I brought you an umbrella..."
\."H-Hey, Reko... what's wrong...?"

\."Why'd you come to the secret base, Reko?
 You're not, um, running away from home, right...?"
\."H-Hey... At least tell me why..."
\."Heh... heheh..."
\."Hey, bro! Look at this!"

\."I thought I was in deep crap
 'cause this base doesn't have a roof, see!"
\."But the drum got all moist, and... see?!"
\."W-What're you talking about...?"
\."Just listen and you'll hear it! Here goes!"
\C[3]Reko happily played the drum.
\."See, see?! It sounds super good now, right?!"
\."Bro!! This must be what they call a miracle, yeah?!"
\.\C[4](I can't tell... Did it actually sound different...?)
\.\C[4](Reko... you're out here in the cold rain...)

\.\C[4](And yet you look entranced...
 What exactly are you enjoying so much...?)

\.\C[4](I don't... have a clue...
 About the sound, or about Reko...)
"Hey! Bro! Look at the sky!"
\."Urgh... I'm still sleepy, Reko..."
\."See?! It's sunny!"
\."Today's our day to go to the secret base!"
\.\C[4](Reko sure is energetic...)

"*pant*, *pant*...
 It really is rough climbing up here..."

\."Hurry it up, bro!
 You promised we'd improve the drum together, right?!"
\."Ah... so that's why you were so excited..."

\."Hang on a second...
 I don't see that drum anywhere, do you?"
\."It was right here, wasn't it?"
\."It's gone! Gone!! Why...?!"

\."L-Let's look around for it!
 Perhaps someone took it away...?!"
\."You gotta be jokin'! I'm gonna look over there!"

"*pant*... *pant*...
 I wonder if it rolled down below?"
\."If so, it would be around here..."
\."I found it..."
\."So it was... here..."
"*pant*! *pant*...!"
\."Hey! You find it...?!"
\."Nah... it wasn't anywhere..."
\."...Let's go look again..."
\."Come on... we won't find it..."
\."T-The hell's that? You givin' up that quick?!"

\."I mean, we searched the whole park, didn't we?
 It's nowhere..."

\."Don't gimme that! There's gotta be
 somewhere we haven't checked yet...!"

\."Why don't we go home, Reko...?
 If you want... I can teach you piano..."
\."...So it's like that, huh?"

\."You big dummy! I can play piano
 without you teaching me, dammit!!"
\C[4](I'm sorry, Reko...)
\.\C[4](The drum... was in pieces, in the trash...)

\.\C[4](I'm sure the people cleaning the park...
 mistook it for garbage someone left...)
\.\C[4](...She'll forget about it quick, I'm sure.)
\.\C[4](I'll teach her some more fun songs on piano...)

\.\C[4](We'll work together to find
 a sound Reko finds pleasing... yeah.)
\.\C[4](...I should at least get it back to how it was...!)
\.\C[4](Hold on just a moment, Reko...!)
"It can't be... why...?"
\."It was just in this trash can earlier...!"

\."You all right? If you're looking for something
 in there, the trash collector just came for it."
\C[3]...If I'd been able to protect that drum then...
\.\C[3]Would it have changed our fates...?
"R-Reko..."
\.\C[3]Reko was playing the piano with intensity.

\.\C[3]And using techniques far more difficult
than what I'd taught her.
\.\C[4](Wh... What the...)
\.\C[4](When did she learn to play like this...?)
\.\C[4](I can't... do anything as advanced as that...)
\.\C[4](Hey... stop it, Reko...)

\C[4](I'm... not going to have
 anything I can teach you anymore...)
\."Ahh... I feel kinda refreshed!"

\."Sorry about before, bro.
 I just wanted to try harder songs..."
\."...Where the hell you going?! Ugh...!"

"...At any rate, just give me a call
 if you ever change your mind."
"...Phew. Finally gone..."
\."Who was that visitor...?"

\."...I dunno. Came to offer me some kinda invitation.
 To get some famous musical education, I guess...?"
\."It's just boring junk! I don't wanna!"
\."Dad's sure insistent I rethink it, though..."
\."...Why not accept?"
\."I-In that case, you do it with me..."
\."...I haven't been invited, though."
\."Reko... you and I are different."
\."Huh? Whoa, bro..."
"Alice...!"
\."Tell me... what's your dream, Alice?!"
"...I don't have one of those."
"Alice...!!"
\."...You said you would, didn't you...?"
\."Someday... together... we'd form a..."
"Tch...! That was the worst anniversary concert ever..."

\."Sorry 'bout the mess-ups!
 But look, the audience was goin' wild, Reko!"

\."You goddamn... If you aren't willin' to take this
 seriously, then get the hell out of the band!"
\."Ooogh..."
\."Reko... do you have a moment?"
\."Today IS the anniversary of our band, is it not?"

\."Ohh! A gift for Reko, our leader?!"
 Bet you're happy, huh?!"
\.\C[3]I handed Reko the bongos from my bag.

\."...Wait, are those drums or somethin'?!
 Ain't she gonna be mad?! Alice?!"

\."Listen! Next time you screw up that bad,
 you're fired, I mean it!"
\."So Stronghold, Ursheen, get some damn practice in!"
\."...Indifference, hm..."
\."...Though... I expected as much."
\."...Should I toss these out?"
\."Shit... This is irritating..."
\C[3]In a hallway with no one around...
\.\C[3]A large trash can sat beside a vending machine.
\.\C[3]Standing before it, Reko held the bongos reluctantly...
\.\C[3]And, giving them a light tap...
\.\C[3]For just a moment... she closed her eyes.

1800-0-message:
\.\C[3]The culprit is a middle schooler!
But watch out, he's gotten four of us!
\.\C[3]Dammit! Where'd he go?! Find him, now!!

"This the best the cops can do?
 Bad guys must be gettin' loose all the time."
\."Bring 'em on. I feel like havin' some fun."

\."I'm warning you... You're only tightening
 the noose around your neck!"

\."Then ya better catch me quick
 to help loosen it, huh?"

\."I'll show you what happens when you
 mock the power of the state!!"\.
\.\C[3]An angry Policeman stands in your way!

\C[4](Hah, this guy's an open book.
 I can tell just what he's thinking!)
\C[3]The Policeman is stumbling and can't act!\|

\."Whoops, gotta go. It's gettin' noisy.
 Smell ya later, officer."

"It's best not to cause adults
 too much trouble, y'know."

\."The police are meant to be good guys
 who keep the peace, after all..."
\."Nobody worth mentioning... Just an ordinary fighter."

\."A fighter? A weird old man like you
 ain't exactly the kinda fighter I know."

\."You're just some second-rate loser, I bet.
 Whaddya want with me?"
\."The hell?! Don't get cocky, you second-rate punk!"

\."Again with "second-rate"... Insults do tend
 to be things you're concerned with yourself..."

\."Sure you aren't feeling self-conscious
 that YOU'RE second-rate?"

\."I mean hey, you sure did enjoy teasing
 a cop who couldn't go full force against a kid."

\."That's enough, asshole...!
 How about I kick your butt right here?!"

\."Then I guess I'll teach you
 that some adults aren't so kind, boy."
\.\C[3]A Mysterious Fighter stands in your way!
\.\C[4](Dammit...! I swear I hit him dead on!!)
\C[4](I can't counter if he doesn't hit me...!)
\C[4](I can't counter if he doesn't hit me...!)
\.\C[4](W-Why's it feel like I'm not doing anything?!)
\C[3]The Mysterious Fighter observes with a grin.\|
\."How'd you like the punches of a pro, boy?"

\."I could give you my name...
 or I could tell you something even better."

\."The difference between a first-rate fighter
 and a second-rate fighter."

\."When you're second-rate, you go looking
 for people crappier than you to beat..."

\."But when you're first-rate, you go looking
 for people stronger than you to beat."

\."Just keep that in mind, and you're already
 on the road to betterment."
\."Oh, and don't snitch to the cops. See ya."
\."Good work! That was some intense practice today!"

\."N-No, uh...!
 I'm still recovering from an injury, so...!"
\."Well, shucks. Tell me when you recover, okay?"
\."Hahaha! So you came to the gym, boy!"
\."Oh, is that the kid you were talking about, Kobushi?"

\."That's right.
 Thought he'd be here sooner, though."

\."I was stuck in the slammer, dammit!
 I swear that cop cheated or something!"
\."Hahaha, I see! My bad, my bad!"
\."Gotta be shittin' me! There's no way I can win!!"
\."So? If you're done here, gonna leave?"

\."Even a second-rate punk should have enough pride
 to say what he means, and not make a guy guess."

"...Look, you gotta have guessed as much, right?
 Why I came here..."
\."Who can say... I'm slow on the uptake."
\.\C[4](But I've never met an adult this strong...!)

\."I did catch your interest, didn't I?
 Curious about my fighting, aren't ya?"
\."Hoo, boy... I don't get how kids these days think..."
\."What, so you want me to join your gym?"
\."If you invited me... then sure, I might join..."
\."...Don't need people with that kinda attitude."
\."Follow your own will, and you can cut paths open."

\."Sure thing.
 What we do here is boxing."

\."Just throwing punches at close range...
 a fighting style where there's no running or hiding."
\."If I'm teaching you, you better aim to be a pro."

\."A pro?!
 No prob! Sounds great to me!!"

\.\C[4](Oof... He's got no idea...
 Kobushi's stricter than strict...)

"Hey!! I'm tracking all your break time!
 Don't go sleeping!"

\."Haven't even barfed once yet?! Not bad!
 Barf away!!"
\."W... Who the hell...! I'll kick your ass...!"
\."Hey! How you gonna dodge with that posture?"
\."Aaand the stomach! You really suck, huh?!"

\."Gaaaaaggghhh...!!
 What's this got to do with boxing?!"

\."Oh, you know. It'll improve your
 locking techniques and such..."
\."...So I'm gonna take a break for a while..."

\."What the?! You quittin'?!
 Guess I worked you too hard..."
\."Wrong! I got exams! For middle school!"
\."Huh, so you actually go to school..."

\."Well, better at least give your attention
 for exam season. When do the exams start?"

\."I'm confident in my cramming skill!
 And I'm a pro at all-nighters...!"

\."But won't it keep up for like a week straight?
 You're gonna die."

\."Hm? But then why aren't you able to
 come right back the week after exams?"
\."If I fail... I'm gonna have retakes, right?!"
\."You...! You're accounting for days of retakes too?!"
\."Leave me alone! I know I'm stupid, okay?! Dumbass!!"
\."Yo! You got back sooner than I thought."

\."Hey, cheer up. I didn't know squat
 when I was in middle school either, y'know?"

\."What's important is whether
 you can think on your feet in the ring."
\."When you're in the ring... even you can be a genius."
\."I mean, I haven't even gotten in there yet..."

\."Hey, about the training regimen...
 Could you put in some more weight lifting?"
\."You can just do that sorta thing in moderation."
\."Your growth spurt's still to come, ain't it?"

\."Wait 'til you're tall before you try to get buff.
 Don't rush it."
\."...And what if I don't get tall?"
\."Your weight class... is way up there, right...?"
\."...You wanna have a go, do ya?"
\.\C[4](A real match with me, in the same class...!)
\."Then let's have a title match someday, Naomichi."

\."A decisive fight with no holds barred...
 throwing our very lives behind our punches."

\."But if you're dissatisfied with the regimen I gave,
 maybe that's too much to hope for?"

\."S-Say what?!
 I only complained 'cause it was too easy!"
\.\C[4](When I beat you... will you admit it?)
\.\C[4](I'd better sleep well and grow tall, huh...)

"A ten-round knockout victory!!
 The winner is Kobushi!!"

\."Whoaaa! Welcome back, Japan champ!
 Have your injuries healed?!"
\."Yep! Pretty long vacation by my standards."
\."Man, though, that was an amazing title match!"
\."Sure, sure. More importantly, where is he?"

\."Oh, right! He's been looking for you!
 Kurumada!"
\."Listen to this! I passed the pro license exam!"
\."I got it in one!! Aren't I amazin'?!"
\."True enough! That's nothing to sneeze at!"

\."But see here, Naomichi! While you were doing that, 
 I became Japan's champ, y'know?"
\."I don't intend on chasing you there..."

\."You're gonna be world champ, right?
 Go right ahead. I'll come to challenge ya."

\."And I'll defend it as many times as it takes
 'til you arrive."
\."Don't you lose your debut match either!"
\."It's finally here. Your first match as a pro."
\."Makes me nervous... So this is how it feels..."

\."Whoa now, that's uncharacteristically honest.
 You really gonna be okay...?"

\."Stay in control with jabs! If it looks like
 your opponent's about to hit hard, counter it!"

\."Likewise, when you use a big move of your own,
 careful it won't be countered!!"

\."Hahaha...
 Sorry, but I'll be scoring a victory off you."
\."Y'know, I was thinking the same thing!"
\."An energetic newcomer... I can admire that!"

\."The winner is Kurumada!
 How's your first victory feel?!"
\."It's the best!! Winning feels crazy good!!"

\."Can we look forward to more satisfying
 KO victories from you?!"

\."'Course, that doesn't mean
 I'm lookin' to fight just anybody."
\."Which is to say... you're seeking strong opponents?!"

\."I'm only gettin' started!
 This ain't enough to satisfy me!!"

\."I'm gonna beat the strongest of opponents
 and come out on top!!"

\."...From the second-rate practice
 of hunting weaklings, that is."
\."Ohhhh!! So you'll only fight strong opponents?!"

\."My target is Kobushi!!
 I'm here to beat you down!!"
\."Wahaha! Going up against a fellow student?!"
\."What an idiot...! Haha... I'll cheer for him!"
\."Ahh... Guess the cat's outta the bag..."
\."Be sure to bring that belt back with you!"
\."You got it. In a few days' time, I'll be world champ!"
\."'Course I'm angry!! You've been fooling me!!"

\."You never told me you can't go head to head
 if you're in the same gym!!"

\."Hey, not necessarily.
 If the president approves, that's different."

\."We can discuss that later.
 For now, just think about that title match!"
\."I've got it for sure! Trust me!"
\."Don't worry, we'll all be here to console you."

\."What a guy, talking assuming I'm gonna lose...
 Just watch the match, Naomichi!"
\."Alright, we're off. Don't go slacking on training!"

\."It's all right, Kurumada.
 Kobushi can definitely do it."

\."Besides, that "champion" he's up against
 is just a second-rate punk who plays rough..."

\."He's a whole 3 kilograms overweight...
 What's going on here?!"

\."A-At any rate, we're done measuring! I'll contact
 the respective managers, so please leave for now...!"

"Did you hear?!
 Kobushi... agreed to the match...!"

\."You can't blame him... He prepared so much.
 He was completely ready to go and win..."

\."If he forwent the match, it'd be quite a while
 until he could make another challenge..."

\."Still, there's a huge weight disparity!!
 It's goddamn nonsense...!"

\."That champion... Win or lose, he'll be deprived of
 his title. Why break the rules like that...?"

\."Why should I care?!
 At any rate... I gotta watch the match!!"

\C[3]"Our main match for today
 sees Kobushi pit against our champion..."

\C[3]\."No surprise there. This title match is built upon
 the champion paying off a rule violation!"

\C[3]\."It's a match where only the challenger Kobushi
 can earn the title, should he win."

"Please, Kobushi!
 You gotta beat down this second-rate punk...!"
\C[3]"And it's begun! The champion steps forward!"
\C[3]"Whaaat?!\.\. What was that all of a sudden...?!"

\.\C[3]"It looked like the champion just did a headbutt...
 But the ref isn't saying a thing!"
\.\C[3]"He's following into a flurry of punches...!!"

\C[3]"Kobushi can't take it! He's on his knees!
 He's down!!"
\C[3]"This is looking to be a brutal match..."
\C[3]"The match is over! Kobushi can't get back up!!"

\.\C[3]"It was all too one-sided...
 Maybe it'd be better not to have had this match..."

\.\C[3]"Is Kobushi all right?!
 They're taking him out on a stretcher...!"
\.\C[3]In a blink, Kobushi lost to that second-rate punk.
\.\C[3]With this defeat, Kobushi was badly injured...
\."Yeah... He might not come back here..."
\."...I'm quitting too. Got no more reason to be here."
\."Don't gimme that shit! You're responsible, too..."
\."They'll pay... I'll tear into that damn champion!!"

\."Why don't YOU tell me, huh?!
 Don't look so damn nonchalant!!"
\."...Do you despise me for not stopping the match?"

"That ex-champion's asking us for
 a sparring opponent!!"

\."Apparently he's looking to have a title match
 to get back the belt he was stripped of."
\."And to that end... he wants a training partner."
\."But why us, with our history with him...?!"
\."Hmph... Wants to put on a show of "making up," maybe?"

\."Bet that loathsome ex-champ's struggling
 to find anybody who'll give him the time of day."
\."But... if it has to be someone in his weight class..."

"Hahaha! I'm grateful for your cooperation
 in this public sparring match!"
\."That fight was an unlucky one for us both..."

\."Soon, we'll finally be able to reclaim
 the belt that was so unfairly stolen from us...
 Yes, we must both move on! Hahaha!"

\."Two teams overcoming tragedy to join hands...!
 A peace that reaches across national borders!"

\."Precisely, my good audience!
 Now watch the sparring attentively!"

\."Former champ Gruusem!
 I'd like to hear your feelings at the moment!"

\."Hahaha! He said "I never fight a worthless match,
 even during training"!"

\."Well, I'll play with you, young'n. You can brag
 to your friends you got to train with a champ."
\."I'll get a workout... then end this quick-like."

\."You're kidding...?! It can't be!!
 Our most valuable asset, bested by this novice?!"

\.\C[4](Kobushi lost... to this dumbass...
 that even I could beat...?!)
\."S-Stop the cameras... I'm done... for today..."
\.\C[10]A weakling's fate... is mine to decide.
\."Dunno if he'll even be able to walk again..."
\."Get the hell out of here, you punk..."
\."Sure, do whatever the hell you want."

\."You think I'm gonna say I'll forget all about it
 and keep working with you?!"
"Well then, I'll keep it up at another gym."

\."Idiot... After this, you think you'll get to
 see the light of day in the boxing world?"

\."You're a violent, uncontrollable criminal
 with a screw loose...!!"
\."Nobody's gonna train you or root for you!!"
\."Even Kobushi... wherever he is, I bet he's crying!!"

\."Part of you was kinda expecting this might happen
 when you offered me up, wasn't it?"

\."Both of us just weren't gonna stand
 for that irrational crap."
\."I don't wanna have to look after you."

1805-0-message:
\.\C[6]Hello hellooooo! (^^)/
Didja know? Sara's going to a board game meetup!

\.\C[6]Wonder if she's goin alone....
Papa's worried she might make sum bad friends....

"...The usual, I see.
 Well then, I shall reply..."

\.\C[3]Miss Sara is looking forward to the games.
Surely her friend will also take part.

\.\C[3]I would encourage you exercise discretion and not
complain that she should "spend days off with dad."

\."And when I'm the one who invited him...
 It's dad's fault..."
\."Nah, it's not good to put blame on others..."

\."Next time... I'll be sure to be on time,
 even if I have to drag dad along!"
"U-Um! I'm waiting for a friend, see...!"
"Hmm? And where is this friend of yours?"

\."You've just been here looking bored forever,
 haven't you?"
\."We can chat with you while you wait!"

\."It's not some dubious offer or anything.
 Just head with us to that cafe... 'kay?"
\."Nope, I'm good! Got a soda and everything!"
\.\C[4](He's looking at me with puppy-dog eyes...)

\."Get what across...?
 I mean, you had this "c'mere, boy" look..."
\."Well now... So she really showed up."
\."Here, I'll treat you to something. What do you like?"

\."That there is my friend! And you're bothering him,
 so release him at once!!"
\."Coming to his aid, huh? Good for you!"

\."I-I'm a high-schooler...!
 Don't treat me like a child!"
\."Yeah, yeah! And she's great at kendo too!"

\."When you say it like that,
 don't I sound even more like a child?!"
\."Here, I'll treat you to something. What do you like?"
\."W-Why do you know my na... wait..."
\."Oh dear... So she really showed up."
\."Beats me. They just came up all of a sudden..."

\."...So you say, but you sure you're not
 finding it a little amusing?"
"You're a hit with the ladies, huh, Joe?"

\."They were absolutely up to something sketchy!
 I mean, really!"
\."It's my fault for being late anyway. Sorry..."
\."Yeah, it's unusual of you to be late, actually..."
\."I-It was all my fault! I overslept...!!"
\."You replied to me in the morning."
\."Be honest. It was your dad, right?"

\."You're right... The front door was defended.
 "You must defeat dad before you can leave"...!"

\."But I managed to escape out the window
 and leave without incident!"
\."Hahaha! Your family sure is fun, huh?!"
"It's embarrassing... living with such a family..."

\."I like it, myself!
 You, your dad, all that jazz!"
\."Yeah! I don't think it's embarrassing one bit!"
"Anyway, I'm sorry! And after inviting you...!"
\."I-Is being late that much of an offense...?"
\."Hahaha! Kidding! I was just teasing ya."
\."From now on... I'll aim to arrive 1 hour early!!"

\."You got it wrong! I really like it, honest!
 You, your dad, all that jazz!"
\."Yeah! I don't think it's embarrassing one bit!"
"A soda.... Can I really have this?"
\."Of course! It's your favorite flavor, y'know?"
\."If you want it, I'll let you have a sip."
\."Ah, give it back! Not fair, Joe!"
\."So this is the town board game meetup..."
\."They've even got stands! It's like a festival!"

\."People who came with their family, too...
 Huh, it's a lot more peaceful than I imagined..."
\."You did say you were scared to go alone."

\."Well... That's why I invited you. 
 I'm just fine with you here, Joe."
\."Right? Enjoy it to your heart's content!"

\."I didn't say that...!
 I just... wanted you to come along, so..."

\."Hahaha! Well, guess I'll do my best
 to make it a fun time for ya!"

\."Board games use your noggin, right?
 Seems like your kinda thing, Sara."
\."If you get into it... you might get really entranced!"

\."To see who's the best player among us!
 The winner gets to issue one order to the loser!
 How about it?!
\."When it's a battle I'm clearly going to win..."

\."Bold words, Sara!
 Just you see, I'm lucky in times like these!"
\."Okay, let's get signed up! Hurry, hurry!"
\."You didn't get flirted with this time..."
\."There BETTER not be a second time!"
\."Right, so it seems we're a team of two..."

\."So for our little contest,
 we'll compare our individual performances!"
\."And as for the game we're taking part in..."

\."Yep! Apparently all the games they have here
 are custom-made originals."

\."Hey, hey! Sara, they said all the games
 they have here are custom-made originals!"
\."Ack! My bluff, called on the first move...?!"

\."As it happens, it does seem to be a game
 that involves some bluffing, yeah!"

\."They say if any of 'em draw a lot of excitement,
 they might get sold in stores someday!"
"Hey there! Here's to a fun game!"
"Hahaha... Let's make this a good match..."
\."Well then, shall I explain the rules?"

\."Heheh, your eyes are sparkling!
 Think you're suited to it, Sara?"
\."Nothin' like that! I'm having more fun than you!!"

\."Feels like if I don't enjoy it with all I got,
 I won't be able to win!"

\."Yep! And I won't lose to you in
 individual results, either!"
\."Hahaha... What shall I order you to do?"
\."M-Maybe I shouldn't have given you time to think...?"

\."Huh?! Sorry, Joe!
 I just slammed a fist into your palm...!"
\."Owww...! I thought it'd be a high five!"
\."If you do that... alas, I would win..."

\."What do you mean "alas"?!
 And hey, I'm not quittin'!"

\."I'll get back for the pain in my hand
 in our matches, Sara!!"
"Whoa now, that's a bit much for a single win!"
\."Guess so! Are we a good pair or what?!"

\."Ah! L-Looks like Game 2's starting!
 Let's take our seats!"
"We've won all the way to the finals!"
\."What are you saying, Joe?! After coming so far!"
\."Haha, got a little too heated there, Sara!"
"I guess so... I did a foolish thing..."
\."Y... You look a little too dejected..."
\."Eh?! You're acting way too sullen, Sara!!"
\."You're... drawing on the ground with your finger..."
\."Stop it, Sara! That's too sulky out of nowhere!"
\."C'mon, let's rest. Get somethin' to eat."

\."Actually...
 This kind of thing has happened before..."
"I get too focused... and hurt those around me."
\."Back in middle school... I did kendo."
\."At first I just sort of joined because it was cool..."

\."But I got absorbed... and really came to
 appreciate martial arts..."

\."And also, my father taught me...
 "It's rude to your opponent to ease up.""
"I sent it flying... My opponent's mask..."
\."I'm scared!! I don't wanna do this anymore!!"
"Afterward, that girl stayed away from kendo..."

"It was honestly a shock... That's why my own kendo...
 ended in middle school..."
\."Ain't it fine to have a memory or two like that?"
\."I bet it was memorable for that girl too, y'know?"
\."She can be like, "I had this wild friend back then"!"

\."Fact is, getting a chance to interact with
 someone that serious is pretty uncommon, right?"
\."That kinda seriousness sticks in your memory!"
\."I'm sure she freaked out at the time, but..."

\."Who knows, she might be working at something else
 thinking "I'll try just as hard as her!""
\."...I never... thought of it like that."
\."Is it okay... for me to get more serious?"
\."Yeah! If things get too scary, I'll stop ya!"
\."Yep! Hey now, Sara, beggars can't be choosers."

\."Come to think of it, is that why you don't
 get involved with other people too much?"
\."That's wrong, Joe! There's other reasons for that...!"

\."Then all the more reason
 you'll have to put up with me!"
"Ahem... Are our opponents for the finals ready yet?"
\."No way! It's the guy from this morning!"
\."Heehee... It must be fate we met again, isn't it?"

\."I was thinking of asking you to be our cameraman,
 in place of my sister who's sick with a cold..."

\."But if you're our opponent in the finals...
 Nothing could be juicier!"
\."Wherever there are prizes, we shall appear...!"
\."We are the Treasure Sisters, hunters of prizes!!"

\."...That's the name of the channel we post videos on.
 Thanks in advance!"
\."T-They turned out to be oddballs, huh...!"
\."Just so you know... We're not losing, okay?"
\."If we win it all, it'll be great footage... Heehee."

\."If you win, we'll be asking permission
 to leave your faces unblurred...!"
\."Be sure to get me on video!"
\."I take it that means we can include your face...!"
\."Don't really follow, but we're gonna win!!"

\."We don't have to compete against
 their team name too, y'know!"

\."How funny...! If you win,
 we'll introduce you with that name!"
\."And get permission to use your faces!"

"Well then, are you ready...?
 This final game will go for 3 loops!"
\."Let's celebrate! A round of applause for the victors!"
\."And now, our grand prize... A pair of wristwatches!"
\."What, Sara, you wanna wear them as a pair?"

\."T... True, it'd become a hassle
 if an acquaintance saw us..."

\."Oh yeah, and I haven't forgotten!
 About our personal battle!"

\."The contest between you and me?
 Whoever got the most coins, I suppose?"

\."It's amazing, frankly!
 We're totally equally matched, I guess?"
\."Maybe we're two peas in a pod!"
\."Um... You're supposed to retort that I'm a flirt..."

\."...Even if it came to a draw,
 I was incredibly late today, so..."

\."I'm fine calling it my loss.
 Joe, I'll obey your order."
\."It's fine! I won't be satisfied otherwise!"

\."There's your dutiful side showing...
 Let's see now..."
\."So I couldn't win... What's your order?"
"Very well, I'll have you be my obedient dog."
\."You gonna look after me or what?"

\."If you learn some tricks, I'll give you food.
 And I'll walk you twice a day."
"I'll have you carry my stuff home."
\."That really all you want?! Piece of cake!"

\."Good idea! I'll buy castella cakes, takoyaki,
 apricot candy... Everything I can get my hands on!"

\."Shopping 'til I drop?!
 Keep it to as much as you'll actually eat...!"
"I'll have you treat me to dinner."
\."Well, all right! Whaddya want to eat?"

\."Hmm... cotton candy, castella cakes...
 chocolate bananas... apricot candy..."
\."That's all sweet stuff! You'll get tired of it!"
"Shall I have us exchange sake cups?"
\."That's an order! Make me a vow of eternal trust!"

\."He'll love it, getting something like this from ya!"

\."Your best friend... Above even me... Ngh..."

\."The game uses four types of cards:

\."I'll raise the bet! \I[30]\V[443] coins!"

 \C[2]the same number of coins\C[0]!"
\."This gives us a total pool of \I[30]\V[445] coins!"
\."Now for the showdown!"

\."Whoever has the most of \C[2]the same animal\C[0],

\."Gyaaaaah!!"
\."Not so loud, please!"

\."So is it a tie?"
\."In that case, check the corner of the cards!"
"See the numbers etched into them?"
\."O-Oh yeah, huh! The numbers...! Yiiiiikes!"

\."No, it's really nothing "yikes"-worthy.

\."When hands are of equal strength,

"The skinny one there?"
\."Ah, no. Think about it a little more."
\."Compare your numbers against his numbers!"

"You startled me... Well, correct.

\."Yiiiiikes!!"
\."Please, keep it down..."

\."Heh, heh, heh... Sara!

\."How do you like this hand?!"

\."Ohh!! A hand of \I[32]\I[32] plus table card \I[32]

\."A \C[2]trio\C[0] is stronger than a \C[2]pair\C[0]!!

"I concede... It's my defeat..."
\."You were strong, Sara...!"
\."Um... Keep handshakes for after the game, please..."
"Hyeeeeek!"
\."What is with you people?!"
"I see... So these are the rules."
\."Yes, you get the idea!"

\."Well, since Joe won this round,

\."Heheh! If only this were the real thing!"

\."Afterward, the role of starting player is passed

\."Those are the rules.

\."Please go over the rules again."

\."First, a table card is drawn, and a hand of two cards

\."Beginning with the starting player, all players

items-76.description:
Un appunto con alcuni nomi, incluso il prof. Mishima.
C'è anche il nome Alice Yabusame.

items-82.name: Freccetta
items-82.description: Una freccetta costosa. È davvero robusta.

items-84.name: Rivoltella
items-84.description:
Un'arma che spara proiettili. Può contenere fino
a 9 proiettili nella culatta circolare.

items-86.name: Proiettili a salve
items-86.description:
Proiettili finti. Premendo il grilletto
con questi dentro si sentirà solo lo scoppio.

items-88.name: Proiettili veri
items-88.description:
Possono essere caricati in una pistola e sparati.
Estremamente letali.

items-90.name: Tagliasigari
items-90.description: Un arnese per tagliare i sigari prima di fumarli.

items-92.name: Sigaro
items-92.description: Un sigaro con una confezione di alta qualità.

items-98.name: Chiave della camera
items-98.description: La chiave della camera di Sara.

items-140.name: Stop Viewing
items-140.description:
Stop viewing personal info or victim death videos
in the Monitor Room.

items-155.name: Web of Happiness
items-155.description:
A long white rope.
...Not sure what the "happiness" part means.

items-157.name: Band Breakup Article
items-157.description:
An article on 36-Rai 818 (Samurai Yaiba)'s breakup.
Vocalist: "I can't sing this band's songs anymore."

items-159.name: \I[19]Four Papers
items-159.description:
Papers listing participants in the Death Game.
There are only 16 names here.

items-161.name: Email Log
items-161.description:
A log of emails sent and received on Kai's computer.
...Not an actual item, just remembered in my head.

items-167.name: Laizer's Chip
items-167.description:
A small chip removed from Rio Laizer's head.
Capable of nullifying the facility's security.

items-169.name: 1F Security Footage
items-169.description:
Filmed by 1F security cameras. Shows our past actions.
Sou witnessed Q-taro placing the cards.

items-171.name: Key With Tag
items-171.description: A mysterious key found in the kitchen on 1F.

items-173.name: Tablet
items-173.description:
A tablet you can use to check your role card.
Found it next to passed-out Q-taro in the Rubble Room.

items-175.name: Stun Gun
items-175.description:
A disposable stun gun that can immobilize a person.
It's dangerous, so Gin and I took it in secret.

items-177.name: Victim Video
items-177.description:
The victim video Nao had. It shows a policewoman
dying in the First Trial. Is the man in front Keiji?

items-179.name: Red Book
items-179.description:
A red book from the Discussion Room.
On the back, it says "Please return on time."

items-181.name: \I[17]Transceiver
items-181.description:
A battery-powered communicator.
Should work if they're within close enough range.

items-183.name: \I[18]Voice Recorder
items-183.description:
A voice recorder seemingly used in a First Trial.
It gives instructions to cooperate with a partner.

items-185.name: \I[16]Green Book
items-185.description:
A green book from the classroom.
On the back, it says "Please return on time."

items-187.name: Yellow Book
items-187.description:
A yellow book from the office.
On the back, it says "Please return on time."

items-189.name: Blue Book
items-189.description:
A blue book Kurumada found.
On the back, it says "Please return on time."

items-191.name: \I[13]Lantern
items-191.description:
A small lantern with a switch.
What might happen when you turn it on?

items-193.name: \I[15]Note
items-193.description:
A printed note.
It reads: "Game Start: Blue 1, Red 6, Yellow 0"

items-195.name: \I[20]ID Card
items-195.description:
An ID card with \N[4]
(real name Sou Hiyori)'s face on it.

items-197.name: \I[21]ID Card
items-197.description:
An ID card with \N[4]
(real name Sou Hiyori)'s face on it.

items-198.name: \I[22]First-Aid Kit
items-198.description: Stocked with implements for treating wounds.

items-202.name: \I[22]Paintbrush & Paints
items-202.description:
Tools for doing watercolor painting,
found in the Discussion Room.

items-204.name: \I[24]Upgrade Parts
items-204.description:
Replacement body parts the Dummies can attach.
They can give special abilities.

items-206.name: \I[26]\N[4]'s Head
items-206.description:
A doll head found in a box. Will function if charged.
A letter noted its left eye was repaired.

items-208.name: \I[25]Small Key
items-208.description: A small key Maple had on her.

428.警棒でぶん殴ってやる！: I'll beat him with my baton!
428.オレの警棒を食らえ！: Get a taste of my baton!
428.カウンター狙ってんだろ？: Going for a counter, I bet?
428.危ねえ…カウンター狙いだったか: Close one... Was he gonna counter?
428.チッ!! お互い必殺狙いだったか!!: Tch! We both tried special moves?!
428.一旦距離を取るか…: I'll move away for a bit...
428.こんな相手でやる気出るかよ…: Can he even get me motivated...?
428.見せてやるよ…これが本物の必殺技…!!: I'll show you a real special move...!
428.この動き…お前に見切れるワケねえだろ？: No chance you can parse my moves...
428.この程度で休むワケねえだろ: As if I need a break so soon...
428.なんだ 休んでいいのか？: Huh, guess I can take a break?
428.そんなもん引っかからねえよ: I'm not fallin' for that one!
428.お前も必殺狙いか…: You're going for that too, huh...
428.今のはちょっと危なかったな: That was a little close there.
428.やれやれ…踏み込んでたらまずかったな: Whew... Would be bad if I'd stepped in.
428.お前の攻撃なんざ…全部いなして打つ…！: I'll parry any attack to punch you...!
428.顔と腹どっちを殴られたい？: Want it in the face, or the gut?
428.このジムのヤツはザコしかいねえな: Nothing but losers at this gym...

1066.おお！ ほぼ最強の手だ!!: Whoa! That's practically the ultimate hand!!
1066.凄いぞ！ ほとんど負けることは無いハズだ！: Amazing! Hardly any chance I'll lose!
1066.おお！ かなり強い手だろう！: Ooh, this should be a strong hand!
1066.うん 強力な手だな: Yep, this is a powerful hand.
1066.そこそこ強いんじゃないか: Should be pretty strong, I think.
1066.可もなく不可もなく…って感じだ: Could be better, could be worse.
1066.うーん…微妙な手だな: Hmm... kind of an iffy hand.
1066.勝負になりそうな手ではないな…: Doubt this hand will stand a chance...

extra.itemextradesc39: Se sono meno di 4 alle preliminari, verrano usati loro.\nSe solo 1, sarà lui la vittima senza votazione finale.
extra.itemextradesc41: Se sono meno di 5 alle preliminari, verrano usati loro.\nSe solo 1, sarà lui la vittima senza votazione finale.
extra.itemextradesc42: Saggio: Sa chi è il Custode della Chiave,\nma non può mentire sul responso della divinazione.
extra.itemextradesc84: A che serve quel grosso buco al centro...?

extra.itemdesc55: Un tappo dal fondo della vasca.\nPiccolo e pesante.
extra.itemdesc57: Un dipinto di qualcuno che impugna una pistola.

extra.itemdesc65: Un fiore preso da un vaso.
extra.itemdesc67: Un ago lungo e un ago corto.\nNon abbastanza appuntiti per perforare qualcosa.
